tmpd %% 19 #Test if remaining is 0
## [1] 0
cat("The digits sum of this big number is", tmpd)
## The digits sum of this big number is 779
cat("number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmp))
## number of digits on this big number is 227

Also, here is the “227” digits length big number. Recall that not this number but the digit sum of it is multiple of 19 and it is just presented as a fact but not as an evidence.

“19341942242831343319243332282040263349282534282631303338372126252841353545473624393328223538383038322622303340413638312518212632293130303521253119313231343639262125322423343040292630272326343029433112917171621152718211118192019”

4.1.2.6.2 Fact

There is also an interesting relation between Evidence 4.1.2.3 and Evidence 4.1.2.5. As I mentioned before, both of these two evidences are based on the two clue evidences of Al-Fatiha and one of the same clue patterns exist in Evidence 4.1.2.3 over all the verses (6348 verses) and the second clue evidence of Al-Fatiha exist in Evidence 4.1.2.5 over all the numbered verses (6236 verses). As mentioned before, this suggests that both text types are under 19 based coding of the text of Quran. Here, in this fact, I will present an interesting relation between these two evidences as a fact.

The relation between both of the numbers of the two evidences, Evidence 4.1.2.3 and Evidence 4.1.2.5, is as follows. The tested number of Evidence 4.1.2.3 is 800 digits in length. The tested number of Evidence 4.1.2.5 is 227 digits in length.

The fact is that, the digit lengths of these numbers are 800 and 227. The digit sum of these numbers is exactly 19 as if they complement each other.

4.1.2.7 Verse level Harmony among Chapters, Verses and Words as Evidence

This evidence is based on the key coding pattern that we observed in Al-Fatiha at the its verse level numbers. Therefore this evidence is also part of the Main 19 System presented in this book. In this evidence, we will witness that chapters, verses and words are in harmony at the verse level numbers too and within the Al-Fatiha based 19 system. We had already observed the 19 based harmony among chapters, verses and words in Evidence 4.1.2.3 and Evidence 4.1.2.5 at the chapter level numbers. In this evidence, Evidence 4.1.2.7, we will again witness 19 based harmony among chapters, verses and words, but this time, at the verse level numbers.

As you will recall, in Evidence 4.1.2.3, we had learned the rule to get the key coding pattern of the evidence to be tested from the most well known chapter of Quran, Al-Fatihah. Here, we learn another key coding pattern from Al-Fatiha to get the evidence coding number and use it in this current evidence, Evidence 4.1.2.7.

Here is the key coding pattern that we observe as a 19 based coding in the first and most well known and recited chapter of Quran, Al-Fatihah:

In the chapter Al-Fatihah, at its verse level numbers, for each verse, we sum the chapter index, verse index and the number of words in that verse. Since there are 7 verses, I will present the calculation here and get the single number to be tested that represent Al-Fatihah.

Chapter index of Al-Fatihah is 1 as it is the first chapter of Quran. The first verse of it has 4 words. Then, we get the representation number of the first verse as this: 1+1+4=6. If we perform this for all the 7 verses of Al-Fatihah, the we get the representation numbers of each of the 7 verses as follows:

1 + 1 + 4 = 6

1 + 2 + 4 = 7

1 + 3 + 2 = 6

1 + 4 + 3 = 8

1 + 5 + 4 = 10

1 + 6 + 3 = 10

1 + 7 + 9 = 17

Now we have the representation number of each verse of the chapter Al-Fatiha. We then concatenate them as the classical operation of this book by concatenating them in their natural order. We get the following single number that represent the 19 based coding design in Al-Fatiha as : 6 7 6 8 10 10 17

6768101017

Now we observe, this number is multiple of 19 as follows:

tmp <- "6768101017"

#Test if the remaining of mod 19 is 0
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19 
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
cat("number of digits on this number is", nchar(tmp))
## number of digits on this number is 10

As we witnessed, there is an apparent 19 based coding on the text of Al-Fatiha with its verse level natural text numbers. I have not seen this particular 19 based code on Al-Fatiha before anywhere else. Therefore, if it was not published anywhere else before, this code of Al-Fatiha should also be cited among the novel contributions of this book.

Before testing the evidence code of this key coding pattern let me briefly talk about another interesting fact on it. The digit sum of that single big number, 6768101017, is 37. Also, when divided by 19 to test whether it is under the 19 based coding system, the quotient is 356215843. Interesting enough, the digit sum of this quotient is also 37. I recalled this number instantly because at the chapter level sums, Al-Fatiha has this number as follows: Al-Fatiha is chapter 1, has 7 verses and has 29 words. When summed this also gives 37. This might or might not be a coincidence but I wanted to share it here as a tiny interesting fact.

Back to the main point, we just witnessed that there is the above mentioned 19 based key coding pattern in the first and most well known and recited chapter of Quran, Al-Fatiha at the verse level data too. The hypothesis I put forward was that the same code should also exist over the full text of Quran as it might be left as a clue. This means, we infer the rule of coding pattern from Al-Fatihah to get the coding number of the full text of Quran to be tested. As we witness below for this current evidence, the same 19 based coding of Al-Fatiha also exists over all the text of Quran as well.

Let’s first remember the head part of the table of the verse level numbers of the full text of Quran from all the 6348 verses.

x<- unQuran
x$VerseI <- NULL
x$vletters<-NULL
knitr::kable(head(x), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of the numbers of verses in Quran.')
Table 4.3: Table head of the numbers of verses in Quran.
chapter verse vwords text
1 1 4 بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم
1 2 4 الحمد لله رب العالمين
1 3 2 الرحمن الرحيم
1 4 3 مالك يوم الدين
1 5 4 إياك نعبد وإياك نستعين
1 6 3 اهدنا الصراط المستقيم

Let me summarize the key coding pattern to be tested over all the text of Quran. In this Evidence 4.1.2.7, we first sum the chapter index, the verse index and the number of words of each verse, which gives the representation number of each of the 6348 verses. We then concatenate each of those representation numbers in the natural order and get the single big representation number of all the 6348 verses of Quran. As we witness in the following, this representation coding number is also multiple of 19 and thus under the key coding pattern based 19 system of the text of Quran, which uses Al-Fatiha as the key source in this particular case.

Also, here is the illustration of the coding pattern I described:

[Chapter 1 + Verses 1 + Total Words in Verse 1] [Chapter 1 + Verses 2 + Total Words in Verse 2] . . . . . . [Chapter 114 + Verse 6 (last verse of Quran) + Total Words in Verse 6]

If we use the real numbers regarding the 6348 verses in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 1 + 1 + 4] [ 1 + 2 + 4] . . . . . . [114 + 6 + 3]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

67 . . . . . . 123

Below is the proof of Evidence 4.1.2.7.

x<- unQuran
tmp <- x$chapter + x$verse + x$vwords
cat("The head and tail of the numbers that represent each verse.")
## The head and tail of the numbers that represent each verse.
head(tmp)
## [1]  6  7  6  8 10 10
tail(tmp)
## [1] 119 118 119 122 124 123
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = "")  
cat("Mode 19 test of the big coding number:")
## Mode 19 test of the big coding number:
#Test if the mod 19 is 0:
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
cat("Number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmp))
## Number of digits on this big number is 15430

As we see, the mod 19 is zero and thus the big number is under Al-Fatiha based 19 system of the full text of Quran.

We also have to try this coding pattern in the text type of 6236 numbered verses. Thus, we have two trials and one success for this evidence. As per the rules, since we used the sum operation in Al-Fatiha, we do not use digit sum again as their results are identical. Sum operation has always the priority over digit sum in this book as defined in the general rules. Because, as per the Rule 5 of Chapter 4.1.2.2, we only use one of the coding operations, and use the one with higher importance only, if the resulting coding numbers are identical. Because the numbers of the Al-Fatihah is single digit, that coding pattern could also be interpreted that way but because of the priority of operations rule we do not test it as the sum operation has higher importance than the digit sum operation as per the rule. Let’s add the trials and successes into the special counters of the chapter Al-Fatihah based coding patterns as follows.

alFatihah_tested_nums <- alFatihah_tested_nums + 2 
alFatihah_success_nums <- alFatihah_success_nums +1

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, just like all the other evidences, Evidence 4.1.2.7 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself. In case if I find out Evidence 4.1.2.7 had been available in another article, then, in such a case, I surely add a citation and update the online version of this book.

One can just copy the below printed big coding number of this evidence and paste it into a web based big number calculator and test it herself.

Also, here is the 15430 digits length big number:

“6768101017641113181519212121242421343224293626404735474539616749435060484658495657505751566152525655566169696265626283726577807990123888079797789938989978486113961018891105105969411410113610111710011711912310512211310612311711211111212517811711913212712612814412913113114614612913213014413115313813614314514915814314714715014215116215115216915815015517215816519018017916215616916818317016016616916916816818418117317617317420919818019218718219419118920020518819223021819019819620020021823120525420721820521820021021821127122922621322621721223022322122022022622322923323426424623924327623624724826225124124024124123627027726227826729926128426327424825626924925127325526330229228031126728026330727830728228330332830128728827630529430329928328728729330230529332228929829429829629841331731431433775121725192256262529282445414230263948494236464243545158545948464744566375566260645854676956735697726275656389727168777089807299848984848582859210885114881071101109611792100116101107991001031071181101201081091091251141221181211181401211221261201221231361251501301321271371431521501441351371361401431461391431481461391401471501611541531471511671501581581741721701691611651591731951812321791961741681921811851781741921881782031871851921851901931921892011921982182132061942141992112132112112012042152062162112412062072222322148342235222547302528278610435314134414658413643817087444440574747635678617256605859576096625888807267647567677670808187929480828391889777759181869396991101001291181019610999117110111105108114121130127156113138132108128114113135128168127130124117125133132127126130150144139140132130144131132147147144146142171161155145167146149152177169161148157177181165163166160168162166167176163173194177181166195170177178179192192182184183182184184198229194203190194230930606940537331402422406250444439645353484145494643455649474462777252546554565864114736390817768104876579857397737286758592828081116829597104949495111103871059710610094104101113109105104981101051391111161101221231511211291121151211321161291331301631381351291791291391331411371661511341481361021222121234329272429274328443031403162394140414063435050445564515362695262666261595963706075676963847483748767838578968884808680988178978712111686103949097101102971111099910311198100102110112112141120148129118114119117149121125124118125119125126139136129139141131143132140134134155138147152144159159141143170143164147147157147160173163170167166178164172190190180166191163183199193176177169176198201184182183177177199192119222421241920242728343633262630393743523357424339536557525354656952615481856070586486796271676971777769989370789382877679808385888785821039410392115106105911009110110099102979913011711311713810910411211611412012111311411612613111812612013012412012112512412512313112613313413513113013013213214913913714915515115814716015115316415315417316915615616617219116617218916717717419616917417417620319320719717421018818619719019018419318921618719720519518619521319319521620119519719520221420323122322520920520621221522821221421721321722021623321922822412272717232425382328364143342835444632514037404253465347465654565953635665636263588285717166677292757168777979737675807510181829181100100958688103921259410010519254435403339333129333942343549445052454039526657534865676263565672638177766492657465676870737373757483748581757783879196838890879195931101051041059412996941019810811411799117111110113107111111116126124121133122119122123135134132128128129130127140140145134157137142145142142153158137181148153149151146151157151153141638424238303224343439494034644441574646537359774652645649566853536174636964686266636464757169658172727574858171827889891138277898510192103889311598100106999698104951001089911510710510111312711012710811612712611511411512912412412512712314112413214114113015222239233533494131343250424140436752415541404846454867596351735754635864596860776373777471817778797976818081738589838288100959793879586919599919698969110210111610310212210510212211110811913512311012111912412311611311811811912013612513012012612613313714013913213514113913315313613914514814113615016182031323343263535383532383544324848484165435855605749535160756362565875757661847372806468807375728492768080758576798882798892931031021071109797889697929812111310610412911110511310910911112012211112511211511711811312811811912515913412812112612812513313715014114617294140444339353627375934455439747258474047545144615559525071955885616774697260667073711831303337404632356057544343383437475447396980545351535954475666715663626577706663636966847372727269707579192224252727303032313234323538383837404543474944464749495553495356595456575657645961686267656472717070707675777779777980818181858394908689889092929197959497989910010110310110511410610911810910911011011111511311911911911920263626282929373335394343425142364044414644495249566364635366626071608380677266667563747277697181797379798180778480839488100959694979998971091061091091041001181211121091131211221041061141121211131171291221271401261291261271311221251251341311351321321461361351321441421521381431531541381491541471441471511571631541571522139312934393447364236365243385347475348494948655354535357595961577268636967627468687266827482837475729378868587869293971029194901009197102100108104103100103100104106105109108111107112112112116116113124120117119121136126126124141129139131137135129135131132142133131149149223035242839353632374436394251515369587551717348595167607675607764626565667164767367807271867776829594828381869292105958591909210191959591949710010498101108102107119108114108108135110112105129118119110123115113124132125133123131128123130134126133137133135132145152232126273737333941424241393839434547454750554656535263575958576157616270636768706768777673767876818278807879848383791068991919291101969396959897999910810211910810410410710410810711111011011011511111211811411712211711912412613124222727302938343633483641384545464251434548534749504951505452545556565962626481956370687275738878747976839283838285928786968796949798929410598117111107107105108115106104115118111109113114133122120121127120120117134120132145130132128128130129136132129133141141140140143147151146145150145145154156148161156153154159165158170169164166173166252934393540354238383942404441444449525346495650676155546463696561656566746666767175767883777988777878818479838390858788889090939295989796989610010110911110210911011311411111611511412111311313111712113012312112012712312713813012912813113213514113813313314014313914014326334637379741414346415848455359476177584847566755726463705976746366767285797371978073697781918381808081101919793908798889898101100981149810697100110111123124105108108111144272730313132393736373640424258434450545552594963735854826660606069816467637073676872717386767677757884868385828586878687939197100959598941019910311010410110510910711211110911311011311811511311711512511711813812112212312512812712613013913413113613313613713713614614114214214414614615015814828345245474047404342436348515355545049635380726057606670747069133731057110774807685978673105781008186838090938694101117889213210210716112511411029354650453943485043524446474753515864596565575756576064606565677266706970757171817784778486768386848483849391948696961019897100100941019510311510211110510610811210910611430283235414240444240444144474648494854525258565459565760636361646465676969676970737974767979757777968388868484848587878988959410293969510199991021031031031061061051091081091101111161151161161181171201211191201241261241241261291281291301301351371351351391371371461391421441461441461511481531511501551531521571551551641591591601601631621621671711681671751711701751731731821771761781801791811841841911901891861941901901941921922011952032021992001992012012052082062062092082082172132112182152162212222192252242222222232252242262322292312312342332332322352372392412392402422422482432472492472482482502532532532532582572723134323941424050494357495848525762536570595763616866616166656563727274707977768210580838299858687859084879085899398919198114109105110110106107103107105106105108110109112115108113113118122125121124120128132133127130135134131323034405145465749555549565852815754628067596178677965847184787985707678818395797878808785919493102901018588969498971101031071031069810910599101106110104113118121114110120133131134128124126136125130132129131135333141434346454858457046595359505873606168586865738167747181657577857571827383819789838083951009590929595100948997949310493101103105114108110101111114107343234414643474760715349475249545753566361716567757164758575827073817075818284919286868983869395106899990939710897106961079710035333737444455544748685661596275726665618173686962716779708577818595923634425360544449485556546061606259625863736267696668767667726737484742656668574964595058726161647465877671737473747573777680788591819893118938590827889858685889310514511911015698118103104103114112100107111104106111108109119112118123121385254694850565758725757736675696659697264768279756871737470749781101827783948193848894111899310498899110095959710339605660505554556861698075766761575787585960736271736884808073828881808489978398108959610410910540384042434449515457545962576166585866646764667465657070777378787479807985828282918584888692931079193939710199101989999999911010210610410511211111311111711411911411511711812112412512512713112812741404142444949495450546052545558605659636365666764666769717177747375758279797982818282838487869189899295939795979810098102102102105104107106109111110110111113113115115117118118119121121122122124126128128128129129130134133134134136137141140142142141167144145149148147149149150152154160156157157157158160161162163164166167168167169170171172173174175176176178178180182182183185187186188190189191193193193194195194197199205200201201203205207205206207211210211213212214215215215220219219223221223424346515251565561545855585859636266636264668376947295817976757581778188827980848490869196918990949393969496999898991001071091101101071081141111091091161161181191151181281241201221231221231241251261301341301304346517559678177817271595661597372687068799181967674777774877377868081869088113888798107969410210211198110100105106113106110110105109108113111110113110118111123129123118144120132129131444248575766567464616564676762717170736575917569718484801079681857989104988610087911039197105969599106100102106102102101981071191091111101131211141101251191261371201191191171181201311261241311501281321271471381361424543475152636356586466687263788176726468738083737691787883869088778792878897911021079196101115104981161011011231051101131074644455556666071696767726793869176708270848588948879808683878287809083869589918796929993106114104110117106103115121110474547525456555858626466667661676672707478727687817578757881828410093829090879391949092949310110197104104100112106107104104103109115112111114112123116119119117120117118129122122123124125129128127134132133134138141142138139138484648555355575962586060626464656669717270707272747473757681818282848187859389918995949090939296999810010099102102104110108107106494753545870635667657467717473717486767972838092908689828785888899899396899050485464796961677979807674726910680918174939280828885104839193969296101981085156676889555764616473698174741068770808094807977788888818587898610091969496901155254655571727563616583968070769492928574868382839111310210390131536674696266738464886910093839082818577545463606364686863696569696773758075767876778479807986878687898688908991101100101101959899991031085554555657596061636463676769727176747275757678838185838388898987898989929495979698991021021031031051031031071091131161101101111131171161191185654565858596063646565666971727380747877799279838382858589898989929192959596999699981011041051041071091101065757606062616263646768696970707174757775767879101818197899793991001168990939693969897989910010110310310410510610710711410811011211411211711611611611858596363656468697072697075727475747878828079838088888588908788939391979695100979610110010310610310310610611110811011111111111311559575960616364666770687171727476757677777980818285848588879489909110593989598971029910210110410410410610610510810811011211211811412011611611812012012012212012412412612712812813013113213513413713613960606161646465666970686971727374757779807981808284878688878788899093929494959698991021011021041061071121061091111121131121141141161171171201231261241221251271241261281321321311341341341351371361371391401411421431431481471471491491521521541521521561566167706997707579808310480919791871018787961161031009593110971231071086277838288817911210487851009395918384909392868813163711027675779010385999298878496859286958889989410110064110757611678858289901269211193657372737690998480848387908311166758573769086788893879467817777898287908890948568827776828286898210085918786978796938769108978997841039787819211010270827998918895851208710310195717780888184808288948883888988969496931011021001011029999102107110109107727375767675768679818382848587908795889490919794989799981031031031051101091081061081101111191121171191221221181211201271271231311257371737677788191828485878788898790959397949494941011059910010110110110310810810810911011011111111311711711611811711912212012312312312574757677857879798282849084869088889190939495949899971001031031031101081071071091091111121161141171191201221237586807993838292838787869290889494939495951059610710310810710811476868384838789888894959295999692969998101100101106111107108105112113777779818383878687919090899195999598971011717878787980818383868788899089919395939596989799100104104102105106105107162108110111112112118117116117117120122122123124124126128127128135132131132141798081838585858585879089919494939796979899981001011021051051051061071091101101131121141161181181191228088888686898990919593959399969997999810410311010610510910610911111311411711781808182838486878889909192929695969798991021021021031041061051111081121131141131131141161171171201211201231221261251251281271311291318281838584868887889091929494979796100102101102103102104108106106110109111113112112113114119119125130126134838283848586888890909494969696981011011031021021021041041071091111121101121131141131151171191191191201221281241261261261291348483858788888991929193949596969798101102103103104106108108109110110110111112113115116119117118123121121124123126858586878889909192939495969799999910110210410710510610811011110911311411886868788899295939695959597991001001021041061108786919192909496959496981021031051041031071071061051061091091121121151131151201171201211201231211258888899092929996969710098981021031051031041051071081111101111111188989899092939598102104109110101102102103104106105109109110110908992919695969898981021001011021031041041079192929394959610397100100100103106105106107107110109929393939597100101999910110310310410410510611111011111211311311511611611893919394961001019910310310210410410710611511511111211211311611612111811911912012212112194959696991011001021021011021041061051101081101161111151139594969798991001011021041051051061111121099696979999101100101104103104109107109109111111111114117117115979598101102102103103104106107108989999100101103104104105999899101105104110106107100102102102103106106106108108109112111113115117115115116120101103104106110107102111106104113119120114127103104104106106108111112113104103104105107108110111112116114116105103105108110110111112113112115114106105107108110112110113115107105109115108109110111112113113115115116109113112112113113110109112113117111112113115113117116116112112113115113114115117118119119114116119120115117119118118121116117116119121117118119121122123118119118119122124123”

You can also access this big number from the following link:

https://github.com/quran2019/Quran19/blob/master/5.14Evidence.txt

4.1.2.8 Even and Odd chapters Evidence at the Verse level

As per the rule, for each key coding pattern based evidences, which is also based on Al-Fatiha that is also the main part of the Main 19 System presented in this book, we also have to test the follow up even and odd pairing coding pattern over the same numbers with the key coding pattern of the predecessor evidence. This chapter provides the even and odd coding evidence as a compulsory follow up coding to the predecessor evidence, Evidence 4.1.2.7. We test the follow up even and odd coding pattern over the same text type, all the 6348 verses, of Quran similar to the predecessor Evidence 4.1.2.7 that also exists in the text type of all the 6348 verses.

As per the rule, we separate all the verses into two categories as even and odd verses. If a verse has an odd chapter index then it is categorized as odd and otherwise as even. We then sum the chapter index, verse index and also the number of words of each verse, which is the key coding pattern of the predecessor evidence, Evidence 4.1.2.7, and get the representation numbers of each of the 6348 verses. Then, we pair them from even to odd and concatenate all the paired numbers and finally get the big representation coding number to be tested. Let me also formulate the even and odd pairing coding pattern used in this evidence as follows. As mentioned before, it closely resembles to the double helix of the DNA structure, where one strand is even and the other strand is the odd numbers in our case:

[ [Chapter 2 + Verses 1 of Chapter 2 + Total Words in Verse 1 of Chapter 2 ] [Chapter 1 + Verses 1 of Chapter 1 + Total Words in Verse 1 of Chapter 1] ] [ [Chapter 2 + Verses 2 of Chapter 2 + Total Words in Verse 2 of Chapter 2 ] [Chapter 1 + Verses 2 of Chapter 1 + Total Words in Verse 2 of Chapter 1] ] . . . . . .

I did not illustrate the tail of the coding as the even and odd verse numbers are not equal in length and thus not straight forward to formulate. The number of verses of even chapters is 3262 and the number of verses of odd chapters is 3086. Therefore, while pairing both vectors, naturally, the short one, which is the odd verses, starts over from the beginning part of itself and keeps pairing. As this is the most natural operation approach, it is also the default way of processing in the R programming language while pairing two unequal vectors to each other. Therefore, it does not require additional coding in R.

If we use the real numbers in the above coding pattern, it would be like this:

[ [2 + 0 + 4] [1 + 0 + 4] ] [ [2 + 1 + 1] [1 + 2 + 4] ] . . .

[ 6 6 ] [ 4 7 ] . . .

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

6647 . . . . . . 119174118192

As we will see in the result of the following R code, this big number is multiple of 19. Here is the reproducible proof of the evidence of this chapter:

x<- unQuran # all the 6348 verses are used
#Get even and odd chapter verses
ev <- x[(x$chapter %% 2 ==0),]
cat("The number of even verses is",nrow(ev))
## The number of even verses is 3262
od <- x[(x$chapter %% 2 !=0),]
cat("The number of odd verses is",nrow(od))
## The number of odd verses is 3086
x<- ev
ev <- x$chapter+ x$verse+x$vwords
cat("The head of even chapters to be paired as sum: ",head(ev))
## The head of even chapters to be paired as sum:  6 4 11 13 18 15
cat("The tail of even chapters to be paired as sum: ",tail(ev))
## The tail of even chapters to be paired as sum:  119 118 119 122 124 123
cat("The number of verse of even chapters: ",length(ev))
## The number of verse of even chapters:  3262
x<- od
od <- x$chapter+ x$verse+x$vwords
cat("The head of odd chapters to be paired as sum:",head(od))
## The head of odd chapters to be paired as sum: 6 7 6 8 10 10
cat("The tail of odd chapters to be paired as sum:",tail(od))
## The tail of odd chapters to be paired as sum: 117 118 119 121 122 123
cat("The number of verse of odd chapters:",length(od))
## The number of verse of odd chapters: 3086
tmp<-paste0(ev,od) #pairing of even and odd verses' sum
cat("The head of paired even and odd chapters",head(tmp))
## The head of paired even and odd chapters 66 47 116 138 1810 1510
cat("The tail of paired even and odd chapters",tail(tmp))
## The tail of paired even and odd chapters 119174 118192 119188 122178 124203 123187
# reverse of this numbers in tmpr
tmpr <- paste0(rev(tmp), collapse = '')
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = '')
#Testing the big coding number with mod 19
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19  
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
#Testing the reverse of the big number with mod 19*19 !
as.bigz(tmpr) %% (19*19)
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0

As a fact, not only the big number itself but also the reverse of it too (as shown with tmpr in the above code) are multiple of 19 of this big coding number. Even more interestingly this reverse coding number is not only multiple of 19 but it is multiple of 19x19 (361), which makes this more interesting than a simple coding as a fact only. Since this reverse coding is not within the rules, I do not classify that as evidence in the 19 system of this book and do not include in the probability calculations. However, it may be part of another rule based system that I might not have yet seen or purely random. Therefore, I present it here for other investigators in case they might observe a rule that covers this or other similar interesting codes, which I present only as a fact but not as an evidences and thus the reverse big coding number is not within the current presented 19 System of this book.

We witnessed that the verse level pairing of sums between even and odd chapters of Quran considering all the 6348 verses isalso under Al-Fatiha based 19 system of Quran too. As per the rule, we do not need to test the same coding with the text type of the 6236 numbered verses as well. Therefore, we have one trials and one success in this evidence and add them into our counters below.

evenodd_tested_nums <- evenodd_tested_nums + 1 
evenodd_success_nums <- evenodd_success_nums + 1

Also, as a strong fact, the reverse of the 15867 digits length big number is not only multiple of 19 but also multiple of 19x19 (361).

Also, below is the 15867 digits length big number. One can just copy this big number and paste it into a web based big number calculator and test it herself.

“6647116138181015101917217215211224172425211934223256242629253629262840244745354147424530392661396748494943425036604648424643585449515658575450595748514656476144525652635675555656626160696469586254656762696256837372566597777280627975906512363888980727971796877778970938989808972979984848689113849684101858882918510592105108968594114114881011071361101011101179610011711792119100123116105101122107113991061001231031171071121181111101121201251081781091171091191251321141271221261181281211441181291401311211311221461261461201291221321231301361441251311501531301381321361271431371451431491521581501431441471351471371501361421401511431621461511391521431691481581461501391551401721471581501651611901541801531791471621511561671691501681581831581701741601721661701691691691611681651681591841731811951731811762321731791741962091741981681801921921811871851821781941741911921891882001782052031881871921852301922181851901901981931961922001892002012181922311982052182542132072062181942052142181992002112102132182112112112712012292042262152132062262162172112122412302062232072212222202322202142269223302296023369234402645324673239312434027624236222474024862262502514424144240392416424153236532704827741262452784926746299432614528456263492744724844256622697724972251522735425565263543025629258280643111142677328063263903078127877307682821042838730365328793018528773288972767330572294863037529985283922878228780293813021163058229395322972891042989429494298952961112981034138731710531497314106337100894341042210135113221092510547104309825110281052713986111104116351103112241123341514112146129581124111536121431328111670129871334413044163401385713547129471796312956139781336114172137561666015158134591485713660119696222582488218024721967206424752767286734763670338026812687309239943780438252833391578842974377397553916581578652935396549965110691005212961118541018196851096099701175811064111861057910862114711216713069127711567711377138691329810893128701147811393135821288716876127791308012483117851258813387132851278212610313094150103144921391151401061321051309114410013191132101147100147991441021469714299171130161117155113145117167138146109149104152112177116169114161120148121157113177114181116165126163131166118160126168120162130166124167120176121163125173124194125177123181131166126195133170134177135178131179130192130192132182132184149183139182137184149184155198151229158194147203160190151194153230164101532115422173211692115623156431662917227191241662917227189431672817744174301963116940174311746217639203411934020741197401746321043188501865019744190551906418451193531896221669187521976220566195621866119559213591936319570216602017519567197691956320284214742038323174223872256720983205852067821296215882288421280214862178021398217812207821697233872191212281162248619103259444903597401013310239973311131109299933103391114298341003510249110441125011252141451204014839129521186611457119531174814965121671256212463118561255611972125631268113977136761296413992141651317414365132671406813470134731557313873147751527414483159741598514181143751707714383164871479114796157831478816090173871639117095167931661101781051641041721051909419012918096166941911011639818310819911419311717699177117169111176110198113201107184111182111183116177126177124199121192133121222711927122171232313524134251323812823128281293613041127431403414028145351344415746137321425114540142371424015342158531374618153148471534614956151541465615159157531516315356156522632262396323583582338549714171316634673272509242754171406843776779527941735576417540804875461014581488267915981631005110073955786548863103589264125599468100601057714631673387742744271388130773278247934793476398149804081347364854489418357824688461005395739759937787469552866491569549995691689653985396619174102631016911664103681026212266105631026412264111751087111969135651238111072121721197512474123851168111371118821187811989120891361131258213077120891268512610113392137103140881399313211513598141100139106133991539613698139104145951481001411081369915011517107291054110140113441274311039127351083611627127371265911534114451155412939124741247212558127471234014147124541325114144141611305516591852205031713295335843852661356735743869357232603866357044733271481948224824412565274327583055306032573149325334513260357538633862385637584075457543764761498444734672478049644968558053734975537256845992547656805780567557856476597961886882627967886592649372103711027010770110709776977588779677977992779879121801138110681104811298511183105941139010986109891118812090122921119212591112971159511794118971139812899118100119101125103159101134105128114121106126109128118125109133109137110150110141111146115181133111930119331193711940214639323135296034573954344347433638423436373647525443473839536947804754535348514953495948546547535654665371535657635962596561775770726668636363696967666284747368726872727266698270747582798320742675367226932878298629853787338635923993439743102429151944290361004091449741102461004410849104521034910056103631006410463106531056610962108601117110760112831128011267116721166611366124751206311774119721217713669126711268112479141731297913979131811378013577129841358013183132941428813310013195149961499423972199269827973710937106331093910941104421004211841121391123810939113431214512247104451064711450112551214611356117531295212263127571405912658129571266112757131611226212570125631346713168135701326713268146771367613573132761447814276152811388214378153801547813879149841548314783144791471061518915791163911549215791152101229630933596249528983997359936993210837102441193610839104421045110751104531086910758111751105111071110731154811159112511186711460117761227511760119771246412662131652565296634713964357640733567428038723871398642774076448241954494448249835281538646924992561055095678561915590549264101639169956595619165946597661007410466986610176108711027510776119781088311477108791088813577110781127810581129841187911983110831239011585113871248813288125901339012393131921289512398130971349612698133961371001331011351091321111451021521092411022113271142711130116291153811434121361133311348131361174112138130451234512146120421275112343127451384813053129471284913150132491355114150138541335213354140551435613956140591436227622764308131953163327039683772367537733688407842744279587643834492508354835582528559924987638673965887549682946697609860926094691058198641176711163107701077310567108681157210671104731158611876111761097711375114781338412286120831218512782120851208611787134861208713293145911309713210012895128951309812994136101132991291031331101411041411011401051401091431071471121511111461091451131501101451131451181541151561131481171611151561251531171541181591381651211581221701231691251641281661271731261661302613933134461313713637133971364113741137431364614641141581424814245144531465914647150611587714858294835474656506745553972436448635070435952764474466347664776537251855879647359716597658057735769567757816091648360816580658067817210166917097699370907587719871888198779884101771008498861147698831068697841008411083111841239312491105941088610896111961441012898349752100451004794401014795401034311542102431116310548106511085311255109541065011449316334533280397241604257406050664970437457704969581334873521055771621075374658070765985579763866173681056678611006181668665836580639072937286749470101791177788769282132105102801078316182125991148511086308728853290358441874290408544894293409844914191449847114461094810549110481105410652107521035810756105541065910556108571106010963112631156110864113641136511867122691256912167124691207012873132791337412776130791357913475131773377319641834388438646844584488458854587708746895988539559945010258937396609561101689958996810265103731038110367106741067110581109651087510977110851117511671115821167311683118811179712089121831198012083124951261001249512490126921299512895129100130941308913597137941359313510413993137101137103146105139114142108144110146101144111146114151107148351533315137150371554415344152551575415547155481646815956159611605916062163751627216266167651716116881167731756817169170621757117367173791827017785 89128891358913290131921329314195809888102881048610986110891018910290102911039510493106951059310999109961109911097919992989210493103941109510696105103109971061001091001111001131031141061171051171068210781107831108510984938691889387948896901009110192999410394103971029710496104100107102106101115102115103111102112104112108113106116106116110121109118111119113119112120112122113121114121119951199412596130971269813499841008310185102871048810588105891069111192112911099397949595989610196102971029810310110310210410310610310710410810699108981089910910111010511010411011011110611210711310111510311610411910611711011810712310312110412110412410612310612610886111861128711388105891039210595108931109611095111951129511397112991151001141001071021051041091061151101098811388112891129011392113921119911296113961159711310011798116981161021131031141051151031171041181051191071191081151111171101191111181111181181219011789118921199112196122951239669879869881021010010101171027103510412104171072592199322935693269525972910028101249945994110142103301032610439104481054910642111361104611142112431135411351115581165411659118489446954796449656996310175100561026210260101641025810454106671056911056108731105611697111721156211375966596639789997299711016810077101701048910380104721099910784109891098411184111851118211485117921171081158598114998899107100110101110103961041171049210510010011610210110210710299103100106103106107106118108110108120109108112109111109113125115114117122115118115121116118120140102121111122106126104120113122119123120136114125127150104130103132104127105137107143108152110150111144112135116137114136116140106143105146107139108143110148112146110139113140115147108150109161110154111153112147113151113167115150115158116158110174109172112170113169117161112165112159113173115195114181116232119179120196116174117168116192119181121185118178119174118192119188122178124203123187”

Also, as a strong fact, here is the reverse of the 15867 digits length big number, which is not only multiple of 19 but also multiple of 19x19 (361):

“123187124203122178119188118192119174118178121185119181116192117168116174120196119179116232114181115195113173112159112165117161113169112170109172110174116158115158115150113167113151112147111153110154109161108150115147113140110139112146110148108143107139105146106143116140114136116137112135111144110150108152107143105137104127103132104130127150114125120136119123113122104120106126111122102121120140116118115121115118117122115114113125111109112109109108108120108110106118106107106103103100102991021071021011001161051001049210411710396101110100110991079988981141158511710811792114851118211185111841098410989107841099910472103801048910170100771016899719972978996639665113751156211172116971105610873110561056910667104541025810164102601026210056101759963965696449547944611848116591165411558113511135411243111421104611136106421054910448104391032610330101429941994510124100289729952593269356932292191072510417104121035102710117100101021098898698796695123961229112192119891189011711812111111811111811011911111710811510711910511910411810311710511510311410211398116981161001179711396115961139911292111921139011389112881128811311010910611510410910210510010710011499115971129511395112951119611093110951089210589103881058711386112861111261081231061241061211041211041231031181071171101191061161041151031131011121071111061101101101041101051091011089910898106991041081031071031061021041011039810397102961029610195989495939791109921129111189106881058810587104851028310184100134991269813097125961199411995114121113121112122112120113119111119109118110121106116106116108113104112102112103111102115101115102106100107961049710497102941039410392999110190100889687948893869184938510983110811078210711710611710511410611310311110010910010610010997105103106961109510394104939892999297919911096110991099310995105931069510491103901028910289101861108610988104881028098141951329313192132901358912889127891281251261211241231241201231211221201221171201201171151171131161151171121181121121091121091111061101051081061621071071071051031061041051051021031041021049810096999497959896969495909392959193919186898790118891148811387109861118311083108811068010579107781047810278101113991129910599108971079611195106941019310092101919890998996889287968699859585921349512994126881268812689124871288312284120831198611976119123117122115120113119114117113114112116110112112111111109109109107107104107104108102110102103102103103103101100101979899969896949695949494939090909188888888869085868484839082848382131821297913179127781288512577125761267512274123125120131121123120127117127117120116121114118113122113122114119113117112112108119111111105110106108104106103108102109102110102105991039810397103969895999697929892949197909189908894878886958487839082878185808481821228311981118791188611676114751127611376110751107310972107951061011051031058710512010285101951008898919998987997829670978793939496948791978986908787918585851008582858985868382818280767977171821016897949887959399889578918689909076907391858775866687938311183928112679907789778211485108781071161087610375107110966410513195889586949293939490948488839091929586938710087858387921048211283799381798880828683757712562123156123156123152120152122154119152117152118149116149117147117147113148111143111143110142110141109140108139108137108136103137101135101134101134100134991311051321011329412894126941249412797125931229512490126871238912088117871178711685114841148211291113811127811177109761067311271107731061071041091021101011071021029999989996102951019410094102921019393909689948896878887898888868387888494828880828180798480817988778075777471731027211071926981688770976910366846597648964976110861696085609411590113881119011187111821108910877111771068110667103111103831069010387100831018496809784100999590967697739172937393658810087101909488988589888888958086839279858096828478877898749275997485721037590707769757276701026971686364108651076312363975911058931069511010010910310711610496105871048710110198879991969799919680951049583928091799275897089978969897085678561821398313683137791349213579132771317813074128801287312772126711246912466120651226512064120631206011859116581165812056114541185611210811210311099108991089810595106101106101104100104101104911018910290998810286978998879586988793861057991809079898494778776887885768475858082758173806779697769776576697563766874687264716371606863705467546613164906310361102601135991578359821188311686116741168511792112921149411276110701088011496107831076510661105631047510372103711015510065995498529710898989610193969692939690938991116831001049985938897828980979281938174101817991788076106756977727574747671807079707969676961686967796464635462486150621066010760108571105710411810211910211699117100113100111981109911096116921139310990107901039410395105891039110389102931028599879881968497829582948192818976897589738774897489728872837083708572817183697866766575647564726274607660715872626959675767556353645563486146604859110571215611555103541065511777110851048111482106909383999392100966987889164898495738666836290698074876682538711583908696809479968891941008886858984877085828170887688917886779379678072946780678069707187601066674567455814569447346641426113664138571475512789132681286715056131511249012689131961209311889117991198811988120851378712682119891258611090114921218011383110721117910976119861077498711017310274102711066710274100651066799569563967010558975491531034791498713810013986138981421041418913879134851338113296134107127801288412984125711246912375122911227512965118731177012071117711196211967116671236411265114611116411274115561096610357104571044810742106441121301001301041341041309712610112510112493123941229212390122941209112493128871189011590119821189311610011684109821098111178114751087810775110811108710976107721007899749870987299669667946196769366936694649062895891589655915686549052844784458047791078211388110811057712381101751017511676987910481115951017296949176107831026691649762886387669262876377598858905886558358785478619155765673518352805173466843644272127761288113178127631257212568124661216411858117561156311463119521145111747111431134511113111212910513210412010614410211811012399129991239911199118981101011139911010111197113931089310991105107110931109210686113881068410585100911108298821118210285102799480967910774987887788873113778870907086658165807486667764736787647466775877587466766196578162915979546857705468517249734459436142564059387140721038197779581956710059917589519846104439322389221111223942198821984220932158121594215832147721282213101211812109721174207702067420573207712056820375201792018220076205641997219769194591956619469193751936619373191571895719072188581865718756185501834818269182541805217838178671767217667175761747617368172661716917067169621677316863167581666216459163621626016161160601585415756157551574815649160441545415260150531494214934147361481001499714510714496167106141971421081429714093141901379913689134106134951339313486130831298912986128861289212891126841248212281122751217012181119731187011882117751158511575113641137111175110671106511171109611066310756104531055710254102491025298471004998539771956097479347954392468941893491328634871358413183129821328213081125821367912679124791288213475131751337312074110771147112171118691136710466110641066710166996510563109639859106561036010758103551105497529860945496508854854910149904910244934294419140854187105801097810478967995951088398818378977689708485807981788884827173848065807984676878736171596267738060625954585787815752575861566749765575558049695761466845555154405534503060325627260257392581212531232531182531122531192501092481082481112471062491042471112431072481002421122421142401032391042411032391182379823515623211023311923314523410523193231882298523286226852248922578223822229022285224932251182199322298221812169121585218782118021376217772087320875209742067320674208732057120176201871996520074199642026120361195722015819250192591946419049190571946818666189651904219147184481843718192179951808517881176771778518270173791736717571170621716917568167731688117161167651626616272163751606216059159611595616468155481554715754152551534415544150371513715333148351511071461141441111461011441101421081391141461051371031371011399313510413593137941359713089130941291001289512995126921249012495126100124951208311980121831208911797118811168311673115821167111175110851097710875109651058110671106741036710381103731026599689958101689561966093731025894509559885389598746877085458458844884458646884383439641773177337513179134791357613074127791337313270128691206712469121691256712265118641136411361108631156311260109571105610859105541065610558107521035210754106481104911048105461094711444984191449140984293448940854290418735843290288530871108611485125991618210783102801321059282887611777101799470867493729072806383658665816610061786110566736886619763855776598070746510753716210557735213348695870497457704366496050574060427241803953326334493150114541065510953112511084810663105431114210243115401034795401014794451005210034972898144101111961089610886105941249112393111841108310084978410686988311476988610084101779884987788819871877190759370976991701016681728067806581658360916481607757695673578057976571657359796485587251765366476347744676445952704363506448724355396745565047464835582977148611584715059146531464514448142581424114146146431364113741137971363713337136461313313426139166130173126166127164128169125170123158122165121159138154118153117156125161115148117156113154115145118145113150110145113146109151111147112143107140109140105141101141104133110129103132991361011299413098128951289513210013097145911329312087134861178712086120851278212185120831228613384114781137510977111761187611586104731067111572108681056710773107701116311767986410581946992609860976094669682875496588673876392498559825283558354925083447643795874427842884073367537723668377039633295318131643062276227591435614056139551435414052133541335013851141491355013249131471285312948130451384312751123421274612045121451233813041121361174813133113361133412138114291153011627111271142211324110152109145102132111135109133101137100133961269813496130971239812895131921239313390125901328812488113871158512390110831198311879129841058111278110781357710888108791147710883119781077610275108711017698661046610074976694659165956195659169101639264905491558561956710550925692498646815383528249944495448241764477408642713972388038674273357640643571396634652965256213164126771246011975117761226011767114511185911248111731157111051110751105811169107531085110451107421043910436108441193710232108369935993997289824953596309322961521011579115492163911579115189147106144791478315483149841387915478153801437813882152811427614478132761357313676146771326813267135701316813467125631257012262131611275712661129571265814059127571226312952117531135612146112551145010647104451224712145113431093911238121391184110042104421094110939106331093797379827992697219423961499514910013188133941428313280131841357712980135811377913179139731297914181124711266912677136721217411963117751206612466113721166711680112831126011271107601116210866109531056310664104631005610349100521034910444108461004110244974091361004290519442914310243973993359233863787298529862878269336722675207479837582707469827266727272687368847466626967636963636668707277576561625963595657715366535654475354655948534951495348545380476947395347385443475237363436384243364347543457396034352932314639402137119331193011931119181131461151411111501101371101331091251091281181261091211061281141341051591011251031191011181001289911398118971179411595112971259111192122921209011188109891098611390105941118312985104811068111381121809879927797799677887797759776110701077010270103719372926488657967826288687961765985647557805680577656925484597256755373498053685564498049724773468444614976477543754558405637623863387538603551325334493257316032553058304327652741254824482248193271447335703866326035723869357435672661438533583295317120501852165913055141611414413251124541414712340127471255812472124741293911554114451153412659127371162710836127351103912743113441014010541107291151799150108136100141951481041459813996136991531061331001399814111513593132881391031409213710113385126891267712082130113125891368912078119821187111881113851167412375124721197212181110651236913571119751086411164122631026610562122681026410369116631017410261915396539868965691499956956491528646957787599373975395461004688578241834489648534734081498039813476347924793278307738814271427438771673146310577100609468125599264103588863865495571007310051816391598267814810145754680487540764173557941795277676843714075419242725067326634713171418549823358356323623963226522561563153531515915756151541465615146149471535314846181531374215840153371424014251145321424613744157351342814534140431404112736130281292312838128251322413423135171232712227119121221921331991211771241771261831161821111841112011071981131761101691111771171769919311719911418310816398191101166941809619012919094172105164104178105166110167931709516391173871609014788157831479614791164871438317077143751418115985159741448315274147751387315573134731347014068132671436513174141651399212964136761397712681125631197212556118561246312562121671496511748119531145711866129521483912040141451125211250110441024910035983411142103399933109291113197331023910133974090359444103258619116224121228872199723378216812209821780213862178021484212882289621578212852068320567209872257422383231742038421463202691956719775195602017021663195591935921361195621866619562205521976918762216531895119364184551904419050197501864318863210401744119740207411933920362176311744017431169301964417428177431672718929172241662719129172431662315621156211692217321154101532301641941531901512031601941472291581981511841551841491821371831391841491821321921321921301791301781311771351701341951331661261811311771231941251731241631251761211671201661241621301681201601261661181631311651261811161771141571131481211611201691141771161521121491041461091671381451171551131611171711301429914697144102147991471001321011319114410013091132105140106139115144921501031309412610312782132851338712588117851248313080127791687612887135821139311478128701089313298138691137715677127711306912167114711086210579111861106411758997010960968510181118541296110052110699965965493538652815791657553773997438842915783338252804394379239873081268026703376366734672875276424672072198024882158246222969601157136591485813460151561667213761141781335613963129471794712957135401384416344130871337012981116431323612141115581124612941121341514112331122351101041168611127139281052511030984710425105221093511322101341048943371003141063149731710541387298103296111298952949429894289104322972939530582302116293812878028782283922998530375294863057227673288972877330185328793036528387282104307682787730781263902806326773311114280642925830256263542556527354251522497226977256622484427447263492845626145299432674627849262452774127048236532415324164240392414425144262502486224740236222762424340239312467326453234402336922960223302269220214220232221222223207230206212241217211226216213206226215229204271201211211218211210213200211218199205214218194207206254213205218231198218192200201200189196192198193190190218185230192192185188187205203200178189188191192194174182178187185192181180192198168209174174196173179176232173181181195184173168159168165169161169169166170160172170174183158168158169150156167162151179147180153190154165161158150172147155140150139158146169148152143151139162146151143142140150136147137147135143144158150149152145143143137136127138132153130131150144125130136132123129122146120146126131122131121129140144118128121126118127122132114119125117109178109125108112120111110112118117107123103106100113991221071051011231161191001179210011711796101110136110101107114889411496851051081059291858882101859684113848689848497998972898093898970777779687971807288891236390657975806277726597725683736256626965676254695869646160566255565675526352566144564751465748505957545658495158544643484260465036434249496748613939264530474235414745402426283629292524263256342221192425241721122152171917151018101381164766”

One can just copy this big number and paste it into a web based big number calculator and test it herself.

4.1.2.8.1 Verses and Words Sum: Fact

In the previous chapters, we presented all the evidences considering the chapters, verses and words. We also considered chapters, verses, words and letters but there was no key coding over the chapter Al-Fatiha with them. I considered those numbers necessary to test the content information of the full text of Quran. Because of the rules describe in the beginning of the main chapter, we do not look at other combinations as these are the most meaningful and necessary information to test the intactness of the full text of Quran and its structure along with its content together.

In this chapter I will present other similar interesting coding we observe both in Al-Fatiha and full text of Quran. But as just mentioned, since this is code based on only verse and words number, it is not within the boundary of the described rules and is not considered as an evidence but only as an interesting fact. When I first observed this coding I had considered it as an evidence but I decided to simplify the rules as much as possible and thus I now classify it as a fact currently. Researchers should feel free to investigate more on this and the following code if they like and might consider it as an evidence in the future if they deem so. The reason I later classified this code as a fact instead of evidence is to simplify the overall key coding pattern based Main 19 system of the full text of Quran and keep the strongest part as evidences. Because otherwise, those strong and clear evidences might be ignored and seemingly weaker evidences might be criticized and using them, the overall system might be unfairly attacked to falsify. In order to make sure the Main 19 System are evaluated over the main codes of the main 19 system, I thought it is better to keep only the strongest evidences within the system and therefore simplified the rules. After that, I classified the code of this chapter, Chapter 4.1.2.8.1, and the code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.2 as a fact rather than as an evidence as I had classified when I first discover and presented them in around 2020. Otherwise, these two codings are also observed both in the chapter Al-Fatiha and in the full text of Quran with the same key coding patterns and stand as quite strong codes. The only concern I had was using only verse and words information to represent the content of Quran might be open to critics and might also cause the system look more complex overall. Now, let me present the code and move on.

Just as before this coding fact gets its rule to obtain the number to be tested from chapter Al-Fatihah. In this code, we also test decimal sum operation and we again observe the 19 based coding in the full text of Quran. Basically, in this fact, we sum all the numbers. Let’s first see the fact in chapter Al-Fatihah and then apply it to the full text of Quran again.

x<- nQuran
x<- x[x$chapter==1,]
tmp <- x$verse+x$vwords
tmp <- sum(as.numeric(tmp))

cat("The sum of the verse indices and their number of words in Al-Fatiha is ", tmp, "  and it is also divisible by 19 and the result is ", tmp/19)
## The sum of the verse indices and their number of words in Al-Fatiha is  57   and it is also divisible by 19 and the result is  3

Now we observed the rule and will apply it to whole Quran. Let’s first see the illustration of the coding pattern.

[Verses 1 + Total Words in Verse 1]+[Verses 2 + Total Words in Verse 2]+ . . . . . . +[Verse 6 (last verse of Quran that is in Chapter 114) + Total Words in Verse 6]

If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 1 + 4] [ 2 + 4] . . . . . . [ 6 + 3]

And, the final number after all the concatenation before the digit sum operation would look like this:

411464

The sum of all these numbers are multiple of 19 as reproducibly proved below:

x<- nQuran
tmp <- x$verse+x$vwords
tmp <- sum(as.numeric(tmp))
cat("The sum of the verse indices and their number of words in all Quran is ",
    tmp, "  and it is also divisible by 19 and the result is ", tmp/19)
## The sum of the verse indices and their number of words in all Quran is  411464   and it is also divisible by 19 and the result is  21656
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0

This code, Fact 4.1.2.8.1, also considered as a fact as it does not fully align with the described rules of this chapter. Therefore, we do not add this into the counters of the overall 19 system of evidences.

Fact of even and odd pattern follow up:

Basically, just like before, since the even and odd coding pattern is not relevant for the Code 4.1.2.8.1 to follow up and thus the even and odd counters are not increased here. Because, even if we construct the even and odd based coding pattern, the sum of them would be the same as the one of Code 4.1.2.8.1 and just like before this test is irrelevant for this coding pattern.

4.1.2.8.2 Fact: Coding between Verses and Words

Just as before, this coding fact gets its rule to obtain the number to be tested from chapter Al-Fatihah. In the previous code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.1, we had observed 19 based coding between verse indices and number of its words using sum of all the numbers. However, it would still work in Al-Fatiha if we had used digit sum instead of the digit sum as the relevant numbers in the chapter Al-Fatihah are all single digit. Namely, both operations can be used in chapter Al-Fatihah and yield the same successful coding number. As per the rules of key coding pattern, sum operation has the priority and we if the key coding numbers are equal, we do not test for digit sum pattern as well. However, since this code is classified as a fact but not as an evidence of the system, I also tested with the digit sum operation as well over the full text of Quran and observed that it also exist in the full text of Quran too. We already observed success in the code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.1 with the decimal sum operation. In this code, we also test digit sum operation and we again observe the 19 based coding in the full text of Quran. Basically, in this fact, we compute digit sum of all the numbers.

In this chapter, I will present the coding based on the verse and word numbers. Similar to the rule, whatever the coding we observe in Al-Fatihah, we also test it on the full text of Quran too as we hypothesize that the coding in Al-Fatihah might be left as the clue for the full text. In this code, we observe the following 19 based coding in Al-Fatihah between verse indices and number of words.

Verse index of Al-Fatihah is 1 as it is the first chapter of Quran. The first verse of it has 4 words. We get the representation number of the first verse by concatenating verse 1 and number of words 4 as this: 14. We apply this to all the 7 verses of Al-Fatihah and concatenate them. We then obtain this big number: 14243243546379. The digit sum of this number is 57, which is 19x3.

Let’s first see the fact in chapter Al-Fatihah and then apply it to the full text of Quran again. Let’s run and test this coding of Al-Fatihah as follows:

x<- nQuran
x<- x[x$chapter==1,]
tmp2 <- paste0(x$verse, x$vwords)
tmp <- paste0(tmp2, collapse = "")
print(tmp)
## [1] "14243243546379"
#Test if the mod 19 is 0
digitsum(tmp) %% 19 
## [1] 0

As we observed, there is 19 based coding on the text of Al-Fatihah. Now the hypothesis is again, it might be available in the full text of Quran too. As I will show in the following, it exists in the full text of Quran too considering the text type of numbered 6236 verses.

Here is the head of the numbers table we will use. It contains the verse level natural numbers of the numbered verses of Quran.

x<- nQuran
x$text <- NULL
x$VerseI <- NULL
knitr::kable(head(x), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of the numbered verses of Quran.')
Table 4.4: Table head of the numbered verses of Quran.
chapter verse vwords vletters
1 1 4 19
1 2 4 18
1 3 2 12
1 4 3 12
1 5 4 19
1 6 3 19

We will concatenate all the verse indices of the 6236 numbered verses and number of words of each verse by following the rule we observed from Al-Fatihah. Here is the illustration of the coding pattern I just described:

DS[ [Verses 1 | Total Words in Verse 1] [Verses 2 | Total Words in Verse 2] . . . . . . [Verse 6 (last verse of Quran that is in Chapter 114) | Total Words in Verse 6] ]

Recall that DS stands for the digit sum operation. If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

DS[ [ 1 | 4] [ 2 | 4] . . . . . . [ 6 | 3] ]

And, the final number after all the concatenation before the digit sum operation would look like this:

DS[ 1424 . . . . . . 63 ]

Then, as we see below the digit sum of resulting big coding number is multiple of 19 and thus it is one of the interesting coding fact but still is not considered as an evidence of Al-Fatiha based 19 system of the text of Quran regarding the described rules of this particular system. Here is the reproducible proof as follows.

x<- nQuran
tmp2 <- paste0(x$verse, x$vwords)
cat("The head of each verse and words as concatenated: ",head(tmp2))
## The head of each verse and words as concatenated:  14 24 32 43 54 63
cat("The tail of each verse and words as concatenated:",tail(tmp2))
## The tail of each verse and words as concatenated: 14 22 32 44 55 63
tmp <- paste0( tmp2, collapse = "")

# Test if remaining is 0
digitsum(tmp) %% 19 
## [1] 0
cat("number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmp))
## number of digits on this big number is 22051
tmpd <- digitsum(tmp)
cat("the digit sum of the big number is ", tmpd, 
    " and it is also multipl of 19*19 ! as follows:")
## the digit sum of the big number is  81947  and it is also multipl of 19*19 ! as follows:
tmpd/(19*19) 
## [1] 227

As we observed the digit sum of all the verse indices and their corresponding number of words is not only multiple of 19 but also multiple of 19x19! We observed a double of test 19 in one coding number. This is interesting because although, the digit sum of the big number has 5 digits and not too long but observing that it has multiple of 19 twice makes it more interesting.

Also, below is the 22051 digits length big number. Recall that the digit sum of this number is multiple of 19 but not itself.

“14243243546379112738412586117128119101012111112713191416157161117171861919202521122223232024132534263927202813291930283115321233233413351936193711381739104014411842843744104584684712481949185010511252853754275515567571858205918602861606224631564136512669672068236918701771247210731174377519762377978117924802381138210832984158549861387288810892690279130921193279417959962597189812991010010101221027410312104131052510619107171081810933110171111811217113311143011512116141171111824119101203112115122121231812419125221263012714128171291613018131913217133271341513515136311371913810139141403014115142211434514434145321461414771481914917150311511715261531115413155121561015791582415920160111611316291639164431653116612167231681716911170221711817215173251742917511176141775117838179918016181131821618315184321854418617187651881718927190131912519261931519422195141967319730198261991220024201142028203252041720514206122071120816209122101721120212202134921430215222162521757218162192622026221392222722316224142251422613227722840229462303023145232332336423425235472362523735238823915240272416242724328244924516246542474324830249602501525127252925352254222555025624257242584325967260392612426224263112643926527266352673026813269162701527120272282733027417275452761127719278142791728014281152821292833228428285272864911273114185116137468159131016111412913291424152416111761818192620262118221123202415251526252721282729223026311432113311347351836243735381539204017412042134384420452146747234854945501951852205395465531561357115875915607612562156366432651666206714681369137097111721773327487536769772778297928801381338278314842985138618879889891190149124921593249411951196109725981399201001510117102131033410414105141061710710108111091111023111111123511314114151159116181172311831119281202112111122121231012413125151261712791281212916130131315132513311134131352313615137131386139914024141614213143121442714524146211471914810149131506151191524015325154751552115637157141587159301601816121162131638164251652016691673316816169131701917111172151731717415175111762217712178171793618030181221829183281841218523186241872118820189919011191211921119320194141954319671977198211993020011129216328414516637719813915101311711288131814131522161417201824193520172111221723542442255826142713288292430133112322733193440352236323715381839154015411242144349441445946384729482049145010512052115310541855115620572058255929603061156216631664236519662767668369187077111721773197421753176207748783679188012812482138330842285228615871788228928903691329260931694409533968972798129910100311012310262103201042210515106710714108211091911013111111121411333114261152011620117111188119211207121712221123201241612517126121274012829129221301113132132101331213414135381362913720138613914140331413614219143161441814511146181471114814149141502215181521715337154191552215661573415881591416014161141622616325164141651516613167111681216911170241715417218173261741217515176501242533614315436627198279101071124124513321425152416181742183019292023211522182321241725132614272428162913309312632403334341335143624371238133914401941684226431544414531462647164851493350105123522853155438551356115724581259216027611662136313644765126624672568316920701971197234732574875257616772478177910801981158226832184168514867871888128945901691209213932494249551962097279899911100161012610291032110424105201065210726108221091511064111131122211315114221151711645117291181111924120111142143124115126317168139910131110122513914241591691717187193720132114221223122410253226112717281629930193127321333143422352836103719382239174015411242114314442045946234714481549850285117522553155427556562157225814593160226117621263176410652766967568236912704571397287324741475976157718781879128025812282118314842185786887988168917901691449222934994299517961297169813994410015101181021610391041510581061310713108251092111013111221122311312114231151111618117111181011930120121212012224123151242912528126912710128361298130281311013291331813471351913631137201382613922140201413114216143231444014539146281471314837149815027151421523515317154171558156141573515837159191601616116162916381642916521112133144105126676899111011111612171313145154167171518121917202521522282312241225726202731282229163016311632263329341135193611373738403914402341104215433644284510461847134814491550205119521053385432558561557295817592160961116211631364146516661467116876927701771257213733574257523768771678679158013811182138378488538862487198822894290129169213931694139518961897998999101001910123102910316104910518106111076108610991107111711241131111451151111611117111186119412031214122312319124812551261612721128161292213010131221321213313134231351113611137291382413910140914118142231434114415145201463614713148221491815039151111521515314154151554115630157431583215981604316120162171632716419165181661116719168141694017010171191722617315174517513176301779178101793018014181718281835184111852218610187371882818929190121917192719312194141952619691971019812199720010201122027203232048205162061111821736411511611723879111018112212231313146151216201721186192420122182210231124212513261927122810291930163117321933123421351336213718381639164010413342354320441945134613471748364918501351952175318541755105612571058145986033611262126320649652766266720681069117025711372457313741875221921433242252661872381691310101113121813201411151116241718182319242016211022823202433252326182712282829293023312332153314342935193636373138293916404341154223431344144514461547174816491550165114522253125422551756105711581659196022612662126316641765136616671968166932702671247224731274467512769771578117920802581278288325841885168618871188148913901791269223931994309518961497169816992710025101221021710316104161051610612107241082310927110151113711216113201142211518116171172711831119912052121181222212317124181251212616127211281412915152263294285236147158691510141118122713171410153916181714182919172016212222412326244325112616272728182910301631273211331034173529361737223816391940124115421143114410452046154712487492250125111521353115421551656557155810592060196142621063464156510662567156825699701371347216731774227514761077117816796801081178278322841385108658716882989119027917921493249422951096897898219915100141011410215103101042710591061610724108231091111029325485196167318229111013111012271318141615141616173918231911202421922723142411259261127292820292330103131321433103418351236173711381939104026411142204323441945154624471948194919501851145218531654165575618572158145912601761286222632364186511661867868126915701871972137314741175576157713782779138011813082128388427851586118721883689239099119921693209418951096697109899991009101241021210316104510510106910715108181092011018111101121211317114141157116261178118101191512017121912231231615263164165166257781591410161112128131314915171641719181819172092132229232324192523261927102813291030183132321933173410351136273726382639104032412042184325448451146224714481549115022512952125315541455856175775895917601061662146317641765266624672868306916701571572127312746751176337724781679138037811882118318841385128613872188228910902391992119312941295696209799899914100471012110214103610410105111067107141081710929110191112311522632442752562071581595101411351291319142715111645174218271915207211322192315247252326162719281129830283151321333393414351936253719382139840134116421843151162143164195216267118139371033112912171316141015516717161822191420521342244231724152512261327182812294301231213225339341535133615372638183913409418421343944264514461247114810496506511052131627374857697889971071181251371491581671751871911208211122122362472572682772812299304317329331134535636637438439104044154211434448455463471048849650551452953754855756857558659660661562463764465146696746866947057167257337487557637757857958058158268338468514865877881589590491492393394695396897798699519218374858677148991010131116121513131421151116417718101962010217221123132492515262127212819298302031153212332234103532362837143818391140104118425431544124516467478481749145075112521153125410556561257758959196012612362176317641465166617671568136924702071227221731574107527762977197815791880258125826837841485118619871088138924901691209232931794199515961597189889910100910117102131031610412105111062410713108111097110181111511224113911413115221162211751181511919120111217122912312124171252212612127141288121212394135176117238119161091181223131314715211614171318181912201221112292325241225122610279281229133012311332833223417351136163713387391840114110421343644214512461947194894995055125529531654145515561357185818592160256113621563106419659661467186815692270177115721173137497512761377117814791280148198213831284118514861387988198914901091119212932694159514961197279814992310014101191021610391041410591069107181088109511022111211112153346516611711869101016117129131114191518161917341822193820132132223323724172582623271528302928301231283214331134133512361237163883919401541842204311449452346134711481649285026511352135310541455195618573058195986013611162126320649651266116766886910701271157287310741675976137724781279178010819823583984108528625871388138939015916923931394209512961997898159911100510111102141035104111051410691071010861091811024112535414513687138149141013111112813614615916101711188199201121152252314241025826182711281229103083111326339349351636837113811391240841842164314441045124613471048144914509511052753754115595685735829591160126111621163964186512668671068869107087197287316749752576137787877998058188268398478568658798848949099149269310944955969971098141125344654612778894101811512913514111510161017518131942052172211234245255263274282295302313323333342354366375386392240354124284354484510467472148104955095155211531954955856657858145986066115625631364106512661267568669167087126721973147413751076127718788795801581178298368498598627871588128912901791992893494209559616972898129913100810171028103610412105710631076108131091211010111911211113141141711511116911713118711961201412115122612318124121258126812712128171299130201311813212133131341913511172113154105146871489981081110127131014615816717111813191320521722132362422251526827628152913301831133283311341035103617378387391640104113421343144418451146124720488498507519521153554855756135775885986076186276396476596611679687698705718728731574167567612771278147914801081148212831084168578668723888891190199111928936941295796109720981199910071019102910311104161051210661075108111091311081118112101102223124115706137128139151091125121413101417152216917221837191720621422122322249252526162714282029830243121329331134203515362737203813391040354117429434441145144623471448114995085185227531654215516561257858185976016611562176315641265276610671768769970187118722973297497511761077127844132535445461077859510311612713614211551651710181319132092115224231724262510265273228152983073163214332534735936437103812395405418426437441945846747748449650115112528539545557567577585595601061762126314648657669674681069770107116729735748751176877127810797801081682883128488558688758814895905912492693694695796997798599810016101101026103101046105810681077108510914110811181127113811491158116111171811871922631841951161779811991091128121213141415151616141791871920209213522262313249251126162719282229173015317832173348341335483614371938143922403341214274338441045314611471548114975016511852105317542355385685711585059196023617662396327642219219322416596127168179910171181291391481513161017161821191520202119221023924725726927122872911301031113215338341135936937133883974016411142174394415451646547114813491050951752753155412551456557145813591760136111621363126456511664671168226987016719729731074137597657712112436411511687118895108114126138146157167175181019720621112282352492552652772892983053173263363473583673743853954074112426437449458463474483492150751115285355445535635745835946026186266313643655663678685694706716725734746755763776784794804814828836846855866874886896903913926937944953964976984994100410131027103810451054106710741083109111103111511261137114411551169117511891196120412181225123312471254126312711128512941304131313251333134213561369137513831391014051413142714
