34144314511146514731484149515031514152615351541115591567157315810159516041617162416331641116541661116791685169517031714172317361748175517641776178417931801118161823183918451855186918791885189101908191519241934194519531964197919851996200520172025203420422054206520762087209421042115212421392143215621672174218421932204221622252234224322572265227191623394105106771681497102011111219138141115151619179182019242012219221423112417251426827728112993083153213331234133583616371338113916403841124214431244284513461347134810491450751952115355485511561557758659126027612162166320641965146614679681269970971772973107487510761277478879780118114821683118413858861587188818891190139117921593111124394195126127228139181017111012161317141015381613179181619332019211022112327241525262611272928152927302031203225339341435153617371838293912401041942104316441345184620471848264913502351652853155412551556135725581759206015611762863186413656667671168146977015711972217313748751776297726782879218016811782268314841885198615871688191121031141051261071282197103111612181311141615616131727181319132019218221723132420252726122718281429233063115321633233412357361737738163913402841194212438441045214625471948134914501651155219531254655135695775817595601261136214632264156516666671568176991122384125861171082293210131181251391451591611176188191420112120221323142421251626827182827291630223193211331834635103615371538163922402241154214431644945114617471848284910501951952115314542455125620579581959860101124334958618716889810271114121813151417152916251718181619112030212122152315247251526102721281129253016311932223331342711283184245176671088914101411111216131614141515161117131881912202121922132314241025112618271728729113051142123642852862971788922101611612131326141415131615172418141935202321172218231824162516261627132816291430173114322033253414353036243748382239134017418423431344845846647848124923506251355225537054115530561457145812592260196166212631564765866126786886917709711472187315117218332410511616716816929101311121227131914271520161617818171919201021212226232224172592611271228122973010313232153334341435836133723389392040104113421843344411451446244717487498501651105295310541512421932241151561371382591710241134122813281418151116617518341942042142216234241225132672722281729163083116322133133411351436183725381039244033411942194326443045251122334353677881091210811121214138141115151661751812199201121722823152452542682772813298301231113263310341035836133793883974015418426439446451146114724487498507511052135310541155756757658559460146156286356456511669671068769127087112726736747757769771178117910801181148210838122232435766758994107111212313414415616717218419720621722723724325426427528629530103163243353443510366375384396404414423433443455463477484493505517524537544555565576583596605614626634646654666677685694704715724735744755765774784795804814823834845856865874884893903916924934943954964977985996100510131022810341044105710651073108410931103111411251131011451155116411731183119412041214122412341245125512651273128412941304131413241334134413541363137413831394140514141424143514461454146514761484149515061515152415341544155215641575158101594160416131624163516461653166316731686169417041715172317341744175317621776178417931806181318241426310410586127108159710101161281371471510168171118719520621722232315243225926312716281329930731632113363493515368374384397406411142643104414458465475488496505517524535547555564574584591060116111621063664665116676746836997087197297347467515761077578679680481482483484485786108758841621033341652363673183492410221191251391461519161717121813191020202131222023342413251026122711287291930431732153383483512361537123836391040841184226431444114518461747254811492250115115521553215413551656155795812591060146111629631164765146666717682269157097134729732074167517112631441352161072781691210151113121513141481516161517131815196201521302213236247251926182713283929273011311432733163430352336103723389391240234110421543224412451046134719481249135016511152105385445512562357125813591160136120621263764216514662067306812691070971672673774177511768771478327998012816822583158412851711243747517616788991410151116121913914231525161917141851982012211822202392411252526112710281429163019311632433133417351136113719381239224026419421343174430451846114728481249115032511352175319541211213104105196127228199161015111912131338143015341618171118221992022212222242329242225122612271728132916301031143263315347359361737103811396401441942154384420452746164721482749155011512252275315112236475866788791010111112121113201441591671712189191220152182211232124142572692752872993093110322533173453512361137738123994011416427438446451346124774813491250751185211531154755656457958145910608611062763176496511661067768969570571157277367467567667797877958011818828838841185138613878888896112238455667788109510611512613714615616617818919920621522623524625526327428429830731732633734335836537123873984054110428433442454462475487495506515523535544555561057758559311263649520612748149111019111112141316141415111613172418131915207211722132324242125162618271028142911301331123222331134143516368378112631542951869714825924102411191216131314915451618172818171992027212522122313241825142632271028172918302031153218332234183527182183184385364710869810161111122213141413154416241761815191420272112221023724725162615277281029113012318322133113415351236133763830152153441951962178859810251137122013914141531162817271819197201821142212231224192540262827282814295411622331749512618728879301010114012321321142715181616171918101321137495961271185910105118127134149151016141781881992062162212236246254261027102882983093153263373453563615371338133912405417427436449451312223242536373849410211512413514715516917618319520421422523924625926627528929930831532633534435636737738839640741742943844845746847548449750851115213536545555566579587599607112233425262748494103113125136146156161217518819620721192252382472552672762892983073163283363463583673773893954074154274394494574694710481049513253445536373839510511512413414315316517518619320321422423252442532618279281629113016311632313333433553673733853964044144244344444554644744844945045135295325435545655725865946036126231427364755687888991051151291351461561641771861992062142272332410259265277288294304318327334349357365379385393407415427439445454466475489495506516525534545556112232425363748496103115124134145156164174184193204214224234246254264276284291030431432433173443583643763843984044164244364454544654744824945035145255345495545695745835946056146236346416546636746846947037147247347467547667747861323324453637385951021121231331431531631741851952032142222332442562642752832923023123223343423533623723823934034154234334444554654794824945055155255335445535645745835956076196266336456566626736846977067147267357447547657737837948048148248348438578658748858949069159269339429559641921139436586127158159171037111212221327142015151628171318121920203921252221231524122528261427392822292211822332142651861574783892010171131122313241419151016101715181719152082192251111241314412513625737818931102311281216131214231511161717101818191020102118221323192417149213313452513619715821921105611211239132011129394115246327168119141012111512171391436112221384105236187981892210151121117212311422514618720817918102111111172113941451361671881092710111116121113914191581616171218514223032142851463272581497101711341225115211329421517623712846912102711241217192113184105126778813918101111512913914715141611171218819152015211222122312248257269271328152913301014253544526271183941051131241341451571631710182197202212227233246254265273287296305316321033834635336437538539124044184294311441045546747548114910505511252511223444546671585961061171261361461531651791861992052142232322482511264274284293302313327336345355365374384393404417426434445453464476483495504513524142434411536372849310411912213314615316217418219420421422223524525226427628529430103173253343453543653753883954074184284394491142735418576571484971061141291361431581671751851952042113223231324825122610271028151132939475106117988913101311912111314141015516817101881910208218221223162411251126727132813132435465568768699107116124135148151116617818619920781322324252637284941041141241321431541651721831932042122232332462552622742842923033157322333343353362377385393403412424435444454464473484495503513529535543553561114243546556473829310511312413614515316617418419420421222323324325526427328329330431432333534335436537638539540711121037465867778791010711812513101461581651761841992072113228236249255267278289299301131101222324252637383931031131231321451531631731831932052142232332432542622772832963063163243333433543643733853954034154234364444534654734864935041223344253647282931031131241331451541621751861942042142222332462532622752832943053133223323423563653710381439940161222324252637283921051141251341431541661751861942032122232322442552662762832943043143223333443553643733833944094144254344434554691223344453637484921031131231331421521621741841942032132242352442542642732822923023123233333453523623763833924044124241323334353637383931031131231331441531621731831942062132232342452552622752852981323334355677486941031121231341441531641751861991226354552657684921031141271371481561641771861942022122242332452542662732842983043163263343463533661323334453697584941061131221351451561631731831942042162242342432591322324353647689910101411141241341431531631741821952042142231224324654647584931061131231331431531621741423334353637982941031121241361441541641731851931423324354667683921031141231331421521621761841942042142232342442532641122324356667386951031141231351431511161017518519420421622523924525526427428529330214243345566475849210211312413214615316417918319620312233343536373839410411312313714715313233443546272849210211612313414315416317218419620521211233545546473839410411414233343546473831222334654697484152433435564738493103115123134145156163172182195152536495511226334115166167982114233443546676861222324353647484971041151122344554647484921041121223334455627485112439142434445463748393172534445312243447142435425563721323341424354555641527371526344355142234451424354555142232445563”

Here is the link to access the 22051 digits length big number: https://github.com/quran2019/Quran19/blob/master/5.16_Evidence_bignumber.txt

Fact with the Even and Odd chapters at the Verse level as digit sum:

As per the rule of Al-Fatiha based 19 system, we should test the same coding pattern of the code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.2 with the even and odd pairing coding as well as the previous one successful. However, the even and odd pairing coding is not applicable in this particular case. Since the code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.2 is based on the digit sum of all the numbers of the big number, even if we construct the even and odd based coding, the digit sum of this big coding number of the the even and odd based coding would be the exact same as we saw in Chapter 4.1.2.8.2. It means, we would again observe a successful coding but this would be the result of the mathematical property. Therefore, there is no point to calculate it again as the even and odd coding pattern does not bring any unique and independent information.

Basically, the even and odd pairing coding pattern is not relevant for the code of Chapter 4.1.2.8.2 to follow up and thus we do not need to test it for this code.

4.1.2.9 Overall probability of Al-Fatiha based 19 system in detail

Below I will calculate the probability of all the evidences so far of the main chapter based on Al-Fatiha and without letters information. They are bound by the rules described in Chapter 4.1.2. Recall, all of the evidences of this chapter suggest the 19 based coding design within the full text of Quran with respect to chapters, verses and words information. If we conclude that there is a design then it suggests that the design has not been changed since year 632 and thus our witness to this design supports the current knowledge among Muslims that the text of Quran is intact and unchanged. Now, we will measure how likely to observe such a design by chance below. The overall probability of Al-Fatiha based 19 system presented in this main chapter, Chapter 4.1.2, is calculated in the following.

So far, out of total 6 trials, we have observed 3 validated evidences of Al-Fatiha based 19 system of the full text of Quran, regarding only Al-Fatiha based key coding patterns and without the letters information. As per the rules, we also have witnessed the compulsory follow up even and odd coding patterns as successor evidences after each of those predecessor evidence codes. Out of the total 3 trials of even and coding pairing successor trials, we have observed 3 validated evidences. So overall, we witnessed 9 trials and 6 validated evidences. These are all the possible key coding patterns we observed from Al-Fatiha with respect to the rules described in the beginning of the main chapter, Chapter 4.1.2, of Al-Fatiha based 19 system.

Let’s now calculate the probability of all the key coding pattern based evidences from Al-Fatiha along with all the successor even and coding pairing based evidences that exist over the full text of Quran, without letters information, as below:

tmp <-binom.test( (alFatihah_success_nums+evenodd_success_nums), 
                 (alFatihah_tested_nums+evenodd_tested_nums), p = 1/19,
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp1 <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", (alFatihah_success_nums+evenodd_success_nums),
            "successes out of", (alFatihah_tested_nums+evenodd_tested_nums) ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp1))
## [1] "The probability of 6 successes out of 9 (with p=1/19) is: 1.55e-06"

So, the probability of key coding pattern based system from Al-Fatiha is calculated as 1.55e-06. For some extremely skeptical people, I will double the number of trials and re-calculate the probability for them so that they can also be assured about the strength of the presented 19 System:

tmp <-binom.test( (alFatihah_success_nums+evenodd_success_nums), 
                 2*(alFatihah_tested_nums+evenodd_tested_nums), p = 1/19,
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", (alFatihah_success_nums+evenodd_success_nums),
            "successes out of", 2*(alFatihah_tested_nums+evenodd_tested_nums) ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 6 successes out of 18 (with p=1/19) is: 2.27e-04"

One thing to note that, inferring the rules from the observed codings is not that simple. The rules are based on my best educated judgement. I aimed to simplify the system so that rules are general an used in over all of the book when suitable. Therefore for examples I kept the universal rule of this book, all coding are always tested in both 6348 and 6236 verses text types, in the Al-Fatiha base 19 System. However, in the presented Al-Fatiha based 19 system, for each Al-Fatiha based key coding pattern, which is the predecessor coding, we observed the successor even and odd pairing coding pattern in the same text type. Namely, if the predecessor coding was observed in all the 6348 verses, then we also observed the successor follow up coding in the same 6348 verses based text type. It as true for the other text type too. If the predecessor coding was observed in the 6236 numbered verses, then we also observed the successor follow up coding in the same 6236 verses based text type. So, the rule could also be inferred that way and their probability could be calculated together. I will discuss below that scenario, which present the system from a different angle and demonstrates how strong it actually is.

In that case, since the coding pairs are dependent and we have to test them both, the probability of observing a single evidence pair based on an Al-Fatihah based coding pattern is p=(1/19)x(1/19)= 1/361. Here, p stands for the probability of each event to be successful by chance, namely probability of observing two dependent codings together being multiple of 19 by chance. It is because the probability of the first Al-Fatihah based coding over the full text of Quran being successful in the full text of Quran is 1/19 and then, as per the suggestion of the alternative case, we have to test the follow up even and odd pairing coding in the same text type and it has also probability of being successful as 1/19. Since they are tested together one after another in the same text type, the joint probability of observing these two coding events together, is p=(1/19)x(1/19)= 1/361. So, we consider a single statistical event with probability p=1/361 as testing the two dependent codings together in the same text type of the full text of Quran. In total we observed three double validated such evidences. Lets recall each of them and how many trials we had.

For the first double validated evidence we have the dependent evidences pair Evidence 4.1.2.3 and Evidence 4.1.2.4, which was successful in the text type of all the 6348 verses but not in the text type of numbered 6236 verses. So, we have two trials and one success with p=1/361 in this double validated evidence event. The second double validated evidence is the dependent evidences Evidence 4.1.2.5 and Evidence 4.1.2.6, which was successful in the text type of the numbered 6236 verses but not in the text type of all the 6348 verses. So, we have two trials and one success with p=1/361 in this second double validated evidence event. The third double validated evidence is the dependent evidences, Evidence 4.1.2.7 and Evidence 4.1.2.8, which was successful in the text type of all the 6348 verses but not in the text type of numbered 6236 verses. So, we have two trials and one success with p=1/361 in this double validated evidence event.

So, in total we observed 3 successes and 6 trials with p=1/361. We can approximately calculate the probability of our observations so far in Al-Fatiha based 19 system with respect to the same text type condition considered as follows:

tmp <-binom.test(3, 
                 6, p = 1/(19*19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", 3,
            "successes out of", 6 ,
            "(with p=1/361) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 3 successes out of 6 (with p=1/361) is: 4.22e-07"

As we see that, if we were to include the same text type rule in the follow up of key coding patterns in codings Al-Fatiha based 19 system, it means we would witnessed an event with the probability of occurring by chance alone as 4.22e-07.

Since we observe an intact and unchanged design over the full text of Quran, this system along with its miraculous evidences, supports the current accepted narrative of Muslims that the full text of Quran with its word content and current text structure is intact and unchanged since its completion by the year 632.

Now, for the very skeptical people, let’s double the number of all trials but keep the total successes the same and see what would then be the overall probability. This should further calm down those skeptical people.

tmp <-binom.test(3, 
                 6*2, p = 1/(19*19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", 3,
            "successes out of", 6*2 ,
            "(with p=1/(19*19)) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 3 successes out of 12 (with p=1/(19*19)) is: 4.59e-06"

As we observe that even if we had the double of the trials we currently have, what we observed so far still stands as statistically very significant, which still suggest the design of the codes we observed.

I think both ways make sense, but I decided to make rules as universal as possible an therefore kept the universal rule of applying all coding patterns always in both text types. An in that case we had calculated the probability of key coding pattern based system from Al-Fatiha is calculated as 1.55e-06. It is statistically extremely significant, which suggest that what we just witnessed should be the result of a miraculous design. Of course, God know best and this is my conclusion based on the factual observation and the result of the statistical calculation.

Recall that all of the evidences of this chapter suggest that there is 19 based design within the full text of Quran. Since we witness a miraculous unchanged design, this suggest that the book, which itself claims to be of divine origin and will be protected, is intact and unchanged. Even, if you do not read the rest of the book, these evidence should be sufficient to witness the 19 based coding system of the full text of Quran. I have PhD in Error Control Coding in telecommunications and considering the rules and the entailing evidence codes of the Al-Fatiha based 19 System and the statistical calculations, my scientific conclusion is what we observe might best be explained by a super natural design considering the technology and history in the date of 632. Surely, only God knows the absolute truth and we can just conclude on what we observe. In order to find out more about this supernatural power, I suggest the readers to read the content of the book, Quran, for the answer, in which we will read that God has sent down Quran to all humankind and it is the final and ultimate message and the Author of the book promises that this message will always be protected. The 19 based evidences we observed so far, suggest that the full text of the book was indeed protected.

In order to observe the probabilities of different chapters separately, I will not add the Al-Fatihah and even-odd counters into the global counters for now. However, I will incorporate their probability into the calculation of the over alls probability of the book in the end or at to any point in the book.

So far, I presented the overall probability of all the evidences together of Al-Fatiha based 19 system of the full text of Quran, without letters information, which I presented in this main chapter, Chapter 4.1.2. In the sub-chapters of this chapter, I will also separately present the probabilities of Al-Fatiha based coding alone and also the even and odd pairing codings alone to make sure we measure them separately as well out of curiosity. Since we have two main dependent coding patterns within the Al-Fatiha based 19 system, I want to present the probability of them separately too. It was not really needed but I wanted to see their individual group probabilities as well out of my curiosity.

Finally, I will add these special counters to the counters of all the key coding pattern based codes as below so that we can approximately calculate their overall probability too in the end of the main chapter.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- alFatihah_tested_nums +  evenodd_tested_nums
key_codings_success_nums <- alFatihah_success_nums + evenodd_success_nums
4.1.2.9.1 Probability of the evidences based on the Al-Fatiha codings only

Before calculating the probability of observing Al-Fatihah based evidences, without letters information and ignoring the even and odd codings, we need to make sure we counted all the possible codings we observed in Al-Fatihah regarding the rules described in the beginning of the main chapter. Based on the defined rules, we performed 6 trials and observed 3 different Al-Fatihah based evidences over chapters, verses and words.

Now, we can safely calculate the probability of observing the Al-Fatiha coding pattern evidences. So far I have presented many different evidences based on the coding patterns of the chapter Al-Fatihah. I have been counting the number of tests and number of successes out of these events to be able to calculate the overall probability of what we have been observing in this particular chapter. It is a good time to have a look at them by calculating the overall probability of only the Al-Fatihah based evidences so far as they are in a similar category regarding their structures. This means, we exclude the even and odd coding evidences. Here is the overall probability of the Al-Fatihah based evidences so far.

We have 6 trials and 3 successes with Al-Fatihah based coding patterns. Probability of all the Al-Fatihah based coding evidences so far in this book is as follows:

tmp <-binom.test(alFatihah_success_nums, 
                 alFatihah_tested_nums, p = (1/19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", alFatihah_success_nums,
            "successes out of", alFatihah_tested_nums ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 3 successes out of 6 (with p=1/19) is: 2.58e-03"
4.1.2.9.2 Probability of the evidences based on the Even and Odd codings only

We have 3 trials and 3 successes with the even and odd coding pattern observed in Al-Fatiha based 19 system presented so far. Probability of all the even and odd pairing coding evidences so far in this book is as follows:

tmp <-binom.test(3, 
                 3, p = (1/19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", evenodd_success_nums,
            "successes out of", evenodd_tested_nums ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 3 successes out of 3 (with p=1/19) is: 1.46e-04"

4.1.3 The Main 19 System evidence utilizing total number of chapters of the Full Text of Quran

In this chapter, I will present another type of the key coding pattern based coding evidence utilizing the total numbers of the text of Quran.

In the main chapter of all key coding pattern based system, Chapter 4, I had discussed the three different key places or sources to look for key coding patterns. One of them was the first chapter of Quran, Al-Fatiha and I already presented the system based on it without letters information. The second one was the first and the special verse Basmala. However it only has one key coding pattern without letters information and that coding pattern is the concatenation of chapter, verse and words information (chapter 1, verse 1, words 4 = 114) and I already tested this key coding pattern and showed successful evidence over the full text of Quran in Chapter 4.1.2.3 at the chapter level data. Because of Basmala, we could also test it over the verse level data too. Therefore, I add two more trials to count for those testings in the counter.

key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums + 2

The third place to look for key coding patterns was the total numbers of each natural numbers of the text. Namely total number of chapter, verse, words and letters respectively. Since, we are still considering only the key coding patterns without letters information, the only key coding pattern from those total natural numbers of the text if the total numbers of chapters, 114. As per the define rules of the key codings in the beginning of this chapter, we accept it as the key coding pattern and have to test it over the full text of Quran in both text types, namely in all 6348 verses and in 6236 numbered verses. We also have to test it in chapter level and verse level data. However, the chapter indexes are from 1 to 114 and by the general mathematical property, the sum of those indexes must be multiple of 19. Therefore, we do not text on chapter level data as is is obvious that they must be multiple of 19 already. So, the only mathematically independent test we can do is over the verse level data by summing the chapter indexes. As I will prove below, this key coding pattern, sum of chapters, also exist over the full text of Quran considering verse level data too in all the 6348 verses.

Therefore the evidence code of this chapter is based on the key coding pattern of the total number of chapters. Namely, when we add all the chapter indexes in the verse level data of the full text of Quran considering all the 6348 verses, we obtain the coding number 215574, which is multiple of 19. Below is the proof for this evidence:

tmp <- sum(unQuran$chapter)

# Test if mod 19 is 0.
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
print(paste("The sum of chapter indexes is ",tmp))
## [1] "The sum of chapter indexes is  215574"

As per the rule we also have to test the same key coding pattern in the numbers 6236 verses and therefore we have two trials and one success with this key coding pattern. Let’s add them in the counter for key coding patterns

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  2
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

Also hold the key coding counters without letters separately in these counters:

# Counters for all the key coding patterns without letters information
key_codings_tested_nums_NoLetter <- key_codings_tested_nums
key_codings_success_nums_NoLetter <- key_codings_success_nums

4.1.4 Overall probability of all the key coding based evidences without letters information

Considering all the presented and considered key coding based evidences, we have 13 trials and 7 successes so far. Probability of observing them by chance alone can be approximated as follows:

tmp <-binom.test(key_codings_success_nums, 
                 key_codings_tested_nums, p = (1/19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", key_codings_success_nums,
            "successes out of", key_codings_tested_nums ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 7 successes out of 13 (with p=1/19) is: 1.45e-06"

To see a more conservative probability, I will again double the total number of trials and keep the successes the same and see the overall probability in such a case:

tmp <-binom.test(key_codings_success_nums, 
                 2*key_codings_tested_nums, p = (1/19),
                 alternative = c("greater"))
tmp <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)
print(paste("The probability of", key_codings_success_nums,
            "successes out of", 2*key_codings_tested_nums ,
            "(with p=1/19) is:", tmp))
## [1] "The probability of 7 successes out of 26 (with p=1/19) is: 3.02e-04"

4.2 Key coding pattern based 19 System with Letters information

In Chapter 4.1, the first sub-chapter of the main chapter, Chapter 4, I presented all the codes of the key coding pattern based 19 System without letters information. In that chapter, I did not include any coding with letters information. I made this separation to make sure the system presented in Chapter 4.1 is universal and applicable to the writing of the text of Quran with respect to the most of the Hafs manuscripts. As I mentioned before, writing the same words might be slightly different in some rare cases, similar to color and colour in English. Therefore, the codes with letters information in it should have been separated to make sure any textual criticism or doubt do not cause an unfair judgement on the presented key coding pattern based 19 System. As a result, I will present all the key coding pattern based 19 System with letters information in it under this main sub-chapter, Chapter 4.2. All the rules are the same as described in Chapter 4. However, I will present here the codes with the remaining possible combinations of the natural numbers of the text, which are as follows:

  • chapters, verses, words, letters
  • letters

4.2.1 Letters pairing of Al-Fatiha based key coding evidence

The only key coding pattern observed in Al-Fatiha with letters information is by pairing the letters information of two text types of Quran. Since Al-Fatiha is identical in both text types, which are all the 6348 verses and all the numbered 6236 verses, as per the rule we will have to test in both directions while pairing the two text types with letters in the full text of Quran.

Let’s first see the number of letters per verse in the first chapter Al-Fatiha as follows:

x<- nQuran$vletters[nQuran$chapter==1]
print('The number of letters per verse in the first chapter Al-Fatiha:')
## [1] "The number of letters per verse in the first chapter Al-Fatiha:"
print(x)
## [1] 19 18 12 12 19 19 44

Now, when we apply the pairing coding pattern, we observe the key coding pattern of Al-Fatiha, which is multiple of 19 as shown below.

tmp <- paste0(x,x, collapse = "")
print(paste("The code from pairing letters is ",tmp))
## [1] "The code from pairing letters is  1919181812121212191919194444"
# Test if mod 19 is 0.
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0

Now, as per the rule we have to test this key coding pattern in the full text of Quran too by pairing the number of letters per verse of the two text types to each other. As proved below, we also witness this key coding pattern in the full text of Quran too. Before that, let me also illustrate this pairing coding pattern used in this evidence as follows. As mentioned before, it closely resembles to the double helix of the DNA structure, where one strand is the number of letters of each of the 6348 verses and the corresponding strand is the number of letters of each of the 6236 numbered verses as illustrated in the following:

[ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 2 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 2 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ] . . . . . . [ Number of Letters of Verse 6236 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 6236 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 6237 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ] . . . . . . [ Number of Letters of Verse 6348 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 112 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ]

The number of all verses is 6348 and it is 112 more than the numbered verses text type. Therefore, while pairing both vectors one-to-one, naturally, the shorter one starts over from the beginning part of itself and keeps pairing. As this is the most natural operation approach, it is also the default way of processing in the R programming language while pairing two unequal vectors to each other. Therefore, it does not require additional coding in R.

If we use the real numbers in the above coding pattern, it would be like this:

[ [19] [19] ] [ [18] [18] ] . . . . . . [ [20] [13] ] [ [18] [19] ] . . . . . . [ [13] [98] ]

[1919] [1818] . . . [2013] [1819] . . . [1398]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

19191818 . . . 20131819 . . . 1398

Below is the code to verify the coding pattern.

tmp <- paste0(unQuran$vletters, nQuran$vletters)

print("The paired numbers from 6235 to 6238:")
## [1] "The paired numbers from 6235 to 6238:"
tmp[6235:6238]
## [1] "1920" "2013" "1819" "1618"
print("The paired numbers from 6347 to 6348:")
## [1] "The paired numbers from 6347 to 6348:"
tmp[6347:6348]
## [1] "2065" "1398"
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = "")

print("Test if mod 19 is 0.")
## [1] "Test if mod 19 is 0."
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
print(paste("The number of digits in this code is ",nchar(tmp)) )
## [1] "The number of digits in this code is  26634"

As we witnessed the pairing key coding pattern also exist in the full text of quran when paired from 6348 verses to 6236 verses in the order of pairing. Since the predecessor key coding pattern is also suitable to consider pairing from 6236 towards 6348, we have two trials and one success in this evidence based on the key coding pattern with letters information. Let’s add this into the counters of the key coding pattern based evidences so that we can approximately calculate the overall probability of the presented system.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  2
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

As per the rule, we cannot test even and odd coding follow up coding with any pairing type coding pattern. As a side not, the code I will presented has the similar approach of Evidence 4.2.9.2, but with only letters information at the verse level numbers.

Also, below is the 26634 digits length big number of the presented evidence code.

“191918181212121219191919444419332727474752523333474753534747494951514343292977777373343457577272191986861021025353999978786666145145155155828260607070111111707048481011016363808086864343686851516969797942424141555547473838585869698484505053533030373712112160603030909095957777118118257257108108707054545454454583838080717162629797454557571411417777101101363645451021029191545452521501507171231231636313813846461081081071071191195151131131676744441021027272555544444444898930830849496565989861615959737312312376767272585814114111311352525656474710310346461121127070585867678383115115122122656576768181747433337070114114545463631351357979373763631271275454898919619614614613013073732727757566661381388787323253535050666645454242898991915757646437373535187187123123575796966868505089896666626293931221226161585826626616316339397777545455556161123123185185777728628687871201205959130130242465651071076666290290121121110110494997975757353510310365655959525249496767494972727474939321421412712710410493932472477272123123118118182182122122818166666565545429291771771931931141142032031471472882881221222002001111111401404444656511611634343131106106383869692172171651651141142402407777122122414120820887871891891021021181181691692492491481489797929244441741741231231481481251256868656557578989112112134134797918618645458787545472725252545455155113813810310311811819619631924353247453377450371975054197475466476866436811643125116107125501075450725410772122107881225088815065815365925386921138679113967962964762484727486627109661381095213892526392806360803760813791813391793335791873580187348086344686304613230601325960325947322547114255411428541292870129757061756661546639545239795211579341151443436144116361201161201206712014667291466229126625212683524783374743376243916256919956449947444247994250997750697774695474157547015765708165438149434449113444811315248591528459408477409877125981271258812749885749475760476960686943684543614562612762292755297155104717010454702954412910541331056033516010751991078899878850876450266484261668410616629110689291157895315728531212875121687553683253107327310747731514774151547478544778694777696477546487545387745314674122146951223795120375512099551089999108869938865738100574510095455895188582918830298530121855712112557821911512558827911518658917970186719163702717129963792715529910779705590107106701579083106491576383265491856326426561185602643461996053345699108538856192108928815819278928515868785585436861552054364614420517764121446917754121406994544340379480433837958010038102951321001251026513273125656510573776510710527772110792272821499263287549936313975989320413914398732044914310173564913510187567713557876177885712861168881621282351687016217023517270371701281726437401281226496402811221069694281671063094546782307954508246795450135469754811356797438136671094335363210995357232669573724566178731264510217843126129102404349129624016349130627816328130717813728161719113758161859145589285484553924948100534349781001624390781031623190128103323157128603273571366013173581366613161584366506144439950216448799129216508773129191509773242191278191379720124228127886137117201472814086107117207471414011910792207801411571191349210780921577013475107100926970527562100996964525662389910664162561403852106681628814049526468498871492816411349687119528114011311768661952281401361174566104228116136804515810468116488010915854687748110109685463776711021868626310467942181296292104899478129139929689407898139589690407198425878907071128428978637067128408969635267205408269925272205116821049219672861161191043719645867311910037344585731001008634213851281009986592132801286199865966280976170861536610897477010215342108694749102524242195369138496652534244535613841661005337449256294136100563732921372968365456573243137416813354475768436041391337647111686060663990761141115060676682907111462504667578263717962424690575663647943421039065561056471431081033565741057771591081133595747177485973113369510571324821731033647105175321602138103106475817550160543869106655853509254936952655853100923493445256585910081346644171561025920181128666917162102692015912818769686265695359431875968446544535343103599044604410053951036290105604810063953962401051164859639639100406911611859110964110041691511183811013441384137151713827134753812837967111727957583128145967011710695167831281451227051106142167361281181221805114914275367511844180611491447513875774464616614439138327710464866643950325710443864619364275045575643484673365727504521561648367366575450702110516263613066545448703410583261381309454694878346483111138110944769747858641571111611106247104744258701571501611106248104874262707215068110874895874562146721456835876595123457214676145323539654412359727176573258393944305911371715710758663913230113113967137107666633132631135396463754663633406315653107468354933615940531563310759836493591598253853340593864445979821028541407138344465793610224412671323430653436162446262232403055344116254625221740205512417725412522176620100127677884147229466471008076908843476094139479980369040438560109139165996536894015385631098916574651728946153696359896374170172129462226914159326320017093129732221181418132792004193807377118172815279794110480647727172645213279471044264122276964311324047184240122886940311534010418125405588284033153561046412599553928473352563264449950393147895241326944485089318289344147694748511910189338252346747994710351581013033545281678699261039758543036543981498695265897955461364839824974956958729552619348588298748169597266524693150581499888818859616667467615014014974886788376174676876821403874446743375574356813482503853447643375511535107134785039534676943754115209107577885399546419464541352099857133857495105417764561353998681337974931055977455610239836899791109380594445311029783170999611083804044113311239710717010296648360401391138412316010713410212264706017613971841131605213477122707071176867164113635265775670937147869564816345654456629382471189511481554564447362648267118105114795516864125731326410767621051907952168371256713247107936210319011852433711267714774938210346118764356112807110374908286461327688565980691037190113861281329988745965696771851135412811799867410165616717485109548411788866110161611091741271094184199887761102617810982127544156199797760102547822829954113561267910160625471193022749966113861261041018762427113830657454661238671104688784421661381136519854451237271118688984461666311311419848453972631189789604683636611481484539606347974560428387666381494530608147534539425287436384495830228163534439735276431418436582122656342449073617696141353659211366560428790936169963835485977136266039876493336985385248487726268339131645133118852852614810926858344131305133118942860615310960856444453010033389455608553876045643645351009838285585856487127459319473656354898952875856464621276593146471005650481009541752764676261653514640100113508110092413827123675961383566405211358815592733842123945948387366865284585655767363427294754863735286828461566576286365728175616350526882111618365852870654781736141504468631116883488548706047487322415444486310968434830481186057483122110547448421098243137307811837577931651108274864237823113744784637427936659482448657372031364437465742753677947244435746206636683729571107535774272614369464166186873292211031356442636163691064130185773591968224331346454633863761062030805773597768424313834435491387676892068803673437742427313813143849168764189386811536112431044246731271318684706810541413850115961125710453463912792861107047105544161503396725735533939729235110294774547161663311472883511139110726235652927744471486625114458812311184110636250651392772445348702551454912347848163101503913984723953467056514749274772813910135395584169391054657562647362749723039593567551231697910594576026115361014911130112599067561235879309454191216042115861011071115511218890182561185858303454541211014272863010794557418867182521183858106341935455101139725330899410174746782523238581066819371556413972535489761017574868211732485850681577114364112197872785443762375258662117904856501815713814318711283785978554349238425506221905356861810713843187618355595855114496184545039213953608645107109436461515542585011432613154363960392560304539109316427513742345039322931283633602319262539303639373121272937523434394229632829334223252633392836453736212229275231343942206324292442172518334628204519364122202730312039172040243024261722181846372028193541322029302320261724402930202616222918233762284035223223291823232625242429192041162129152319622440282225233018302319252424691919413621631521192124202819251430273019193424286924192236426368213621302040193114592748194434472871247122491910042496822362730394025314159324855444947407169718649981008249442290276739642591414332118551224946407369538637987882254461906367676428913143671185812232465173485343373878342557613463376765285831966771587232635161486943653854349357743492379865625842961037110972716375616869119651105429933974519245989162434259103103109817189751316868119831105729643976514045419141436759561036981488952131946862835657276465765140107414441576784569469204866527194436235564227496575519110753445157328495945720316660717643573511042494971754291435311651593231198295685753317160527645575011036491087151425343451164859503155824868595334719052714556505736481082451675359454448485030558748585982347690427145561957100484424716755596844524884307487925811382587664424145961935100544473715755876881527084397463923711348586064424160964635565436735757538740815470503930637637534837604542536092465856603647571145371409254635078306776405361374645455370923558306090477211442716992136327785867464044612746424561703035393048907872751980421276910913173275658142461514425275842376181305439129481297848751238070127501095017341565014257151282563586237308179543912937129102486712352706350122501114159506557512854638362923011879753943374910249674952856334122511113759216524513654438365922711838756443294946491034948857634515140371482138243436943916546275038106453292346101035148787649517740351484938483427947916546255049106653422348102551687892495771935174952485227304745655225434945664642344825252668349242195153019321738525752243057453852354376454146403438253426493429423651343053323538475748244657343835355076504140404638543435495529603637344153363529474848414633341635129505250514046464654333561555660313738414336362929483441363374163512998526251394628463133226133563331413825432736242937342036147444351698246238391728233143224533463324123251527312419374420301429441516682419383717232344433945374618194821423201532314019194418301529101516681019183782310441239123711181448201419202032934013019131831151910301635102718878351017122912211135147420391941202893341306013333123195930303567274287393549171929212159353774115397641612842344660493369233759193075676542353920493319362110559753748115447668613742284618497169173762191047539654435312030333636271054775324815442068563744283818357142176262651043639424449312230213652276547233270154720285638445038673535428562756559365342794950223121425272654423587035475928423845503767443529854875245937533579425053195731264227725244225882355359384229455937514480295748392447374035494272533757302661274552562250825553823846294759835143803757333937474540254931723137553035613745345632503555328239463747368342433437353333372945422539318331755529355137613461327235453265395137413669423434313583334029434292395783337530294951326137617572424535652651384138695734663152832340254342925057323329304349403286374475444226235462643384538615735661015248234125724285503832102291444369192340158652449844382621084676435145946146351001018148364143728985763812810289144446945231481585523698183851108617697516094454631100418141361064374898976641285989414477453514856856036601855514561101974360674529314141604163106136741228931644559414163771993514562160216020552145421013043286725291541296028632213610412218312245414156635619940196614212163211042030211942138306228372525152429552811122321044218192242414156195622404866252127638510439303719381382462303748255224335539111193228422719254223412119452233484925472736852839413721384224273042487552373324393819452844274425482330214745223340494747293622283341212148422227264280753237202426382745364426441748303065474322304047472829342237333121224861224326368024323420342640274236632629175130122657343943043478128373450373731382210261594365366324703456343840314285633829150191215168122477349949943858187377050663735038831022175961652036355708756583899311088583383515014012144681064747497099488528876770836645350768310221717361482035355219878758103993151081808312035861404444731069247667047485128706765834245627639102371734248385350219408768103873156518096120858651193844347339924466494728514870416549426962373948374242493869503740336869874465689637855551573822344939554446494328264833416449476955372448444252497269613748335069614427684737205547578522364969553546424345266433446426474555324194427524572436138483950296121273247162020473585233633693235204238453264254446263245211940320192327304539433738193923292421263226163520343516232433223232205138253226254846313217212040122096232730433935372519192315241526202614352334141638242022573216512325152629482131191723202812209617272843223519252319171519151620181431232614233822202457171619232015182918212219282321281620191721281922191914231117261929162118183124261423172240241717261924202518191816223628162140162819182129192119151424111426172940212118232420141717244016171026232436251819131644362116164025281418172940212115112418142617174020212723222038173124311620104123213618182413144417214016232541143517214020211811181814263117292021272222203814311731402029412121421829242214351737401923414129352121202016182218131417313529232125222420291422171840172919212042232927221635183722191941342919212820261620221513161717352523172523242129222221189217241916204723452743162818652256192834741935287226362058156916771743258517106234421452247214292771962242716284747453343342823655056532861743935697260364758556913677474359854310611044584561475142427768623127432844472833393447235850395331614939104698960704782557813657474459444347110405832613051324238683131374347442128343928474558563970314249571043389647066827178405752446344614751403321930383285385931553792476321673467283745645665704942148574633366472661197176404252446310861505110619483110195938109858259735510092336357677567733769641086552495114844464836757252119817677428644106108495092106294834110555965109748250739710073338257667575734069841086452335135444248587528525881787787866210640497092109291053410255786570746550113976773758266665975604063843644033563543424558422870589078438712062374086706110969105401025678118705265471137267327559666059766011763441987357401035627437045674290705090304374120393777866961124698840435642118455289471127289325259596062766411791446587385756103402728708667259053506430507484396577646936124738865434742345989311124689335242594462986415291606532382656434026284386582528533964605040848365676464368573656531477919113360992314846453371423444439862152576072328726854367265743565839285139836087401158337677164418546655531817955113866042927648324539713341943166247573372728767853967355710556543970515483768711211582376971544145461115587816655648630426576403278394119973581968169247122331007236731396635921056354327036542576601125582426975546645641116687566646643130596595404978514159975258456869927512230100441926361314366269212763126321433680254260985576423675586610564606655565746803168591559510249655185597552724574697775613079446426691964618143122265612722312692143196807542619866763536165865105356038552957338058681031552671021376585852947539721267463776361677999648769346443816212229563322355924619637757161406659359216936567356838123295033465866103612676613710585532945139107126876310963746775993587823487434562702993338555624635374671484054593092419314319696716068541233950494610066456173665110558537751130107478759109897452752635298257873545367038935785100626835854643486354583062419114376691081601155412739115498110047452373185113858217718130164762591289485267262729945778357636373865579919571004568558572431086344581006213291767683108111115120127971152811347142313181713830213018451651623612544858673827579455782876233755653899465729453155587217108194430100271324776308347111451202397501944237135614371339173730583035452351333622544558423892573055352833233955533839464229283132582317161925305027234736302147244557234650494430374356333750393337295831353023363342224145374244926330343535331139135313391242352831321823371617252850462313361721192421573546154916302843243327503833292917311430173624422841213736442563203425352019381133132213221223351931161814371217142819461613241720191321243523151916342815242127193826291317281419172124232822212336212532202325202020381833222220222423191926162514201219142019191619241520181316242523221918341615112115192626131320281619182119233222292323211632162310020192019183122202015241919142616251920271948202119291924152318231621251722191821161911181528262413182019161918141919321929182319161816141002219171918312020191519192114221621192227264820212929292421231923202114171019142124194718172819241418171916192014151916191518221920181814292216171918142017191719302114221521232216261920152922293721441932205114381050143124484724173419361422173516322044153616201533223020931860291371633191221470176617503033142915422330163919491933152022213728442232465126384650543148482624283438362322223535322244213621201933213020931560381374533401223870306621504033372911421330333927493233362022212828542234462026234624541748182623282038172331223635182217212921451912621632010515138381264512240105389530312123402937211185136133602767323836802212028775413234612040235924441728188123162030175831343633185817571941291484540126326377105107138541264812276105769597314323832943216885596185605267643851803212042774513265615040285957443428628124168630775874343233151584557944173148774023229775610752549848427612876769753436783654362685359378563525964475167322842624511965635031283457873469624824146861017741745532271515245105949373407794193724829885641526198864250128427661538267456553627353533746634159204753679328536269119436362318234418733699848531467610111841445539274452321052393234060944637424858881234143615986285010442676151827045253197333533346754174203653409362536769674389624082944110233899874532776341185644783984444632482399235260554661427958931237043145951287110442675051887055199121011939334633537512974723646401076240674367130895640519473102398927432743343856907853849046714860995952895556611527911493149707114525196713842755084881075511891911015139644668535212963724146481072940554326130365674515073643929195723536643283872901235356906871115606259478977561091525611421491371305227963538237532843210752118459150514964846819523763314146483429665553263336467483506064362940572235326639283672421231115677683011553623847387749109405640192623413363026275335552331325532475230456750344946843619363724313346483442663653453329467983366047364040342234322939293669423511127772630225329383738344922404840312636344236442663535255373127552647230136734341746233626363724393314482842203626452829257929362947354031343534242921292369243527271826142220292237373433222848293129361442324424635052373736272326341929212131034181710232426253720391914192811202726192822254829252929351731235292431213423892453271418571445207222423763336028612944297414102325524645032378536562394347829681270105218541047246225592078194319611176273719422224829257229106176419452592999317434958976537514525743451937281421136366604361129449574541025555756460321388547567394807878686070655285547947107623559817881431676117762037464230193527529447210810654644845172591049932746595737611775485245433719333816311365664143481294095665450558675556055138584765733580129781960616519859479931071161940352781498110516715117852043466130141351247511044861083754894852172521044132776517973130117120486045249376433986377654141484879401276628501448653551595512958936511635911296519761945611419449427933611632405327514920105451512285374330611914136124361105786373726893452235223414577211792113017120416037249341931643398257722412948247925127542841144545349159251292993321162791366553761345131913141344152713361532155312511120184518221937323020193736253619572637202619342323372328453821232122173841393732342331263320251922262928243625345425413454304932252729373232273136295325192913291339134613211519132515271530122711431831186191032920133713251319142610201719152317371828213825232222533820393832292333268420281933263228243627342825313431302832272731372332293127293125282940292039274621213319332539273230332742434131251912616101491413131311131514101018171815161717181521142514221853162021381829183318841428993315321724652747285131413154287327129311423152919272031152818402120132719211633153315392632133319421541142518191212321613141114171320111015201019181518111617172215311431142818201628214018351843182114269938152217246523471651294123543673271291614291514194120321523183521321322191616411529151626381324192915431422181512293219133611351720202110292020193515181126172619182217311931212862092810401035174318212326173834221724252320161929242320361927211619291714184119322323193531321922121627411929351619381824192978431922341519293119193627351920402119292620213519181926192610181917161919211919196419191037101917201819232317193414171925820191917241920191919211319191718181919222319192631191927121427151910351419131814191678271927341719133112191227141912401919202623212119161916197101919181625191719251910419198379191120171910231619141410191281219131725191119101913132119251847191522191924262519172717191914151516102114141325143216352732271517251329121012121422123319282021233021281617161972019121811251717172522102291981692811201720101916181422102012261210131025161117103913432140251344737155219742469256917153174319109151321699216414118255532573510532180151082569295810561213822743319128942185307328103179019115208112641116317167171052282221391992161152873204020431964187322722037263410221104316185176019513960439040166134983713452106741296973694515394434710968132509972645111848558457511058718078108220696858625622113856747319163949185101192587394103173908011543813464321634616710110512982681395492601154773724075434164164735272923737343922110519714345185796088517260889082166519844134104106661297073904590947547856844505972475149486284535182876978511912222059685862592213756877339637991501012925817394132173738011819544314634903264463210172129153689654576049471147292758241107164511919452629212137973979105337153456579428868723488321953826351394431104386638702790599040754885304462195459424747495562315330823469525158122495940581659193718871539137913503929141917173161321373171181354151463390156450321072271531396131927571949261141792238212107285126194246223121399739792619233314531865174247681634383238535263443918312738213842274059254062481930662854164220472355273168301634345228583049294023193016171925184315261342132039141410171116401344171413181514331315950121031272313201320271719182616171123151226282426172423231639173921261723211420181317174716161738153847521444141810271921174216404025126216192219106108151692017231527176810162234222814302129242318302117422530432826234224201714241021112840224435143118421440134495112223125236520262021177918161628112715212644242017142331163117232125172121202049131517531935165417371541477114491435103319281737164640331241165122441037103915529491727153917391031224122261424214024641845213642273044285223122415171824242121283022213526313642324035441919225140225125316535262621317932916122872782110441120131410311631162318251621172010491315125321351154103710411171519949133519331628937134612331041125125044937123913521449102724391739143114411026122418401664184517361427224421521519101231151918112410214430172120262436233223351819122294015512431835182626312132914192012177208141017111213141012161516171817169171210171317121221121117101110131121518917132619271640949133212351035123325035937124013291436102324441734143714231030121918471629185917301427223321211529104031471931114110424413191317132013241323102315181412149141513241089181826162114141520171716201814171711121814161217151217381716924122117201718121212161714111813162126181817162620271519294019491632263516352433163518371040132916361023124417341337142316301619174720291659253016271133192126292240214716311141164224191413913211318131813231014151214121410142413181047958183216691413151317131613181317141113181416121727121638191616241421142025181812161617141618816102691817162620191525291419201617262016132417162018201917109131616171032121617251314141316191636178201216162518161111101914261422721111612111016102411149982117181118152312141312131215102124161815471458103212691019101317131413171391312142413141412121927101619191216161414141425141814161417161610813101491417142614191325111413201317152019131017152019201817189101618171832321615251714141315191836281918817121716151811111410161416141571611181219103410111130924822178112315221214139131615202122163315301426101712251024101517914131716916122224161432121319191036191919311227162014301416142414141414161210161314143714211419141913231113131013181513191810131512191318151814102618181817321519411516171314111515181428131827174017401565116514131614161515131611181619103419191711123010241422168112319221814129221615201422173315301426101711251424915239151311161216152213161332311312191636111914311927192012301416202415191914151417121416101413371321191918191423111310101518121313181213121212132515171417261618151714151341221913161513611815121412131627184012402365266515131714171518131411491640101919231720121710201919144316211120191518201221221315101415171515111420102011171415914231219141514111612615191312131531451217163211131412191419151215141520141512192015131913171514131030133913131913181414181111101515111213131612111213122125121719171616171512141413172221132115919661281512201218161618131215231726171516171317131812141249144013191323122014179201519264318214220171521201821151314101319181517151111142013201017181512141512171426141516106121920122115194520173732181356192312111445157815661542148312202018131613161513133230223921131319131313141118111118151511171325161411191372191217192616241717121414161792113218913191461212141520201118181621136151517521714161619151317131612141218141413101325121919201418915151026231818422617192117192018111520141313141816171211151416131410191817121915141719263115301015121920151917211519112093712181519145692315112045157814668428831719202013181916181612131232192219214419313271347135211331147185315471749255114431929197777393417572672241917861410216539991378866191451315514821260147020111117018482110119636801586524319681451166915791742164114551847143810581969258419502053183015371912110602330189026951977191181725720108117020541354144519831680127115621997164514571914117771910114361945191023191305419521515019711523117631513819461110891071211915511913114679441510220721555194414448898308174920651398”

4.2.1.1 Letters paired with digit sum at verse level

Key coding pattern: The two codings we will observe in this sub-section shares the same coding pattern of this simple coding that is considered as a Key coding pattern: If we take the digit sum the number of all the letters (which is 332837) of 6348 verses we get 26. Similarly, if we take the digit sum the number of all the letters (which is 330709) of the 6236 numbered verses we get 22. Then if we pair them we get 2622, which is multiple of 19. Basically what we observed is that the pairing coding pattern with digit sum at the top data level has that 19 based coding. Considering this as key coding pattern, and testing over the full text of Quran, the same coding pattern exist at the verse level data too as I present in the below codes. As an additional fact, the resulting big coding number is multiple of 19 itself but the reverse of it also multiple of 19 as will be presented below.

The evidence code I will present has the same pairing approach as we observed in Code 4.2.1. But now, we will see that if we pair digit sum of the number of letters for each verse instead of pairing them directly, we have another big representation number and it is also multiple of 19. Even more interestingly, this big number is multiple of 19 considering both sides. Namely, if we concatenate the paired numbers in natural order just as we did in Code 4.2.1 or if we concatenate the paired numbers in the reverse order from right to left, then in both cases the resulting big numbers are multiple of 19 as shown below. However, the second code that is the reverse version in pairing codes is against the rules of this book and I just present as an interesting fact but nor as an evidence.

Let me also illustrate this pairing coding pattern used in this evidence as follows. As mentioned before, it closely resembles to the double helix of the DNA structure, where one strand is the digit sum of the number of letters of each of the 6236 numbered verses and the corresponding strand is the digit sum of the number of letters of each of all the 6348 verses as illustrated in the following:

DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of 6236 verses) ] DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of the 6348 numbered verses) ] DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 2 (of 6236 verses) ] DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 2 (of the 6348 numbered verses) ] . . . . . . DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 6236 (of the 6236 numbered verses)] DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 6236 (of 6348 verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of the 6236 numbered verses) ] [ Number of Letters of Verse 1 (of the 6348 verses) ] . . . . . . DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 112 (of 6236 numbered verses) ] DS[ Number of Letters of Verse 6348 (of the 6348 verses) ]

DS stands for digit sum operation. All the rectangular bracket are concatenated. The number of all verses is 6348 and it is 112 more than the 6236 numbered verses text type. Therefore, while pairing both vectors one-to-one, naturally, the shorter one starts over from the beginning part of itself and keeps pairing. As this is the most natural operation approach, it is also the default way of processing in the R programming language while pairing two unequal vectors to each other. Therefore, it does not require additional coding in R.

If we use the real numbers in the above coding pattern, it would be like this:

DS[ [19] [19] ] DS[ [18] [18] ] . . . . . . DS[ [13] [20] ] DS[ [19] [18] ] . . . . . . DS[[98] [13] ]

[ [10] [10] ] [ [9] [9] ] . . . . . . [ [4] [2] ][ [10] [9] ] . . . . . . [[17] [4]]

[1010] [99] . . . [42] [109] . . . [174]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

101099 . . .42109 . . . 174

Below is the code to verify the coding pattern.

tmp1 <- unQuran$vletters
tmp2 <- nQuran$vletters
tmp <- paste0( sapply(tmp2, digitsum),  sapply(tmp1, digitsum))
head(tmp)
## [1] "1010" "99"   "33"   "33"   "1010" "1010"
tail(tmp)
## [1] "85"  "178" "118" "138" "112" "174"
tmp[6235:6238]
## [1] "210" "42"  "109" "97"
tmpr <- rev(tmp)
head(tmpr)
## [1] "174" "112" "138" "118" "178" "85"
tail(tmpr)
## [1] "1010" "1010" "33"   "33"   "99"   "1010"
tmpr <- paste0(tmpr, collapse = '')
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = '')

#code test for mod 19
as.bigz(tmp) %% 19  #0
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
#reverse code test for mod 19
as.bigz(tmpr) %% 19  #0
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
cat("number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmp))
## number of digits on this big number is 17580

We could have tested 2 in verse level but this 2 in chapter level data, thus we have 1 success and 4 trials to add to the global counters, which I add below:

global_tested_nums <- global_tested_nums + 4
global_success_nums <- global_success_nums + 1

Here is the 17580 digits length big number of the evidence code:

“10109933331010101088310931197116711681111813116137611714111014710127912109141031483188151812151012111010116107637731272129289148714147614156161561656105111011111311151312155128538103410643693149141410141410914799799991198118888168916129612146214929939103910796786689612910129108911861156135813389310981088178111713111113171171714710146101369131396135675117111141110441074137131311137115711513119131196117667969999169101691010991017916171116411104910129121212121512515855812591269176101712101012101081016861612615121415514175121781212851275137141310141210141291410971067146141416141516315143414641168111281112411241321613121681248114141171413713131313913119121171210751012513129136910611105119512911129111191511131561356125181251825325385118811784774117151110151210612661465145510515101815318103161015161315161311168111286121368131481114121117124178416815169151599159979971191211412104161031661083116108511171095111712914117128148788589895895916855916115891111148511161415581611151289111212109121271011129781169108961010691610861616887161481073146106314656111475611971061297101212771212971212791612777169797893938133113111381191178119117101171181010711818108111118681811561418155111491513117911139771113987513128851412128414141217481410171681310121611136121511146715914778997118109811510789511759611656666861861681518516101585121013871212131771312817101348121014481251488105118710111197151111915151411101591415108911151185111411105314101018391018181491118121411191214113917141113317131143121384101271013816101571013716815910107208169101082071691078137119137913131114131297136147121878611791816812111191416151213111414101571371471010787157410158915441315791048131171410183116148111310611861114108119631411810913391112101213139171261281310171362811109131521411129715161411121579161011715891010107118101041051115101147513151311379131013163591010916951610991397169910138759141098125101499161291039716129431378121044131581010841115810108131113891011131213891311112781513919741549119541246111051012561310121075713512871879515812185910151112165810171111103161181417911113411814996111141188913681181111871312818151177812181101511711871891051171114716913510713148161113510141315851195121412151059951281281014914512810891414142121410991314112814591313121111817515131312151141717151313915846171513791181769151374111517797131041115978751016111491181059161014111710139110141671113181141410671114181214161077914912111637691591311736681012151213878611851211210811811119511151011111411991211755117141191412671251373116141269126135313610128986105121391016868910111210971646119611810978411111461485914881112141014956145831241011913675113741311513971511117813115129715131118711812117141391127983113141191512891531431611141511881571414168148118847914681814884691269112144886141215911215410821451551715111082115105879111281111151098149111210117157914141111510677791410119514612712981079914121214121081271295125141410412512125751014910949511121271010129593971191212109127563874991212977116128134159151210731121211131115131513108382511611713613281281558697146152141291511810981411156149913115101288111468912131351212385148881212136125315510812861296851015910912461298811101291598461214810111412101513846111481016143105138471111891663855837711791064845103577771084243101455747128121331614115134111281913716611131318119849137106121311181799491317101112101110171591499178111210610615514291281012106961655281214101010791616551089141010671116655101594104691146165415945489104101664119105188121011107651181051841217115715512817510471711511156122106177101371811411136329697141381816491393129139141413814167912910121113151491371412713121710911141512910761214131617169714131213105611141316101611714131013115811713101081181451081113810771088158125108131391011712813151412510101399171171211136141451110129141716712111469143111112181421681281449163811151811248586481638101561113412576885371014681351277148758714141089511711141271181414910998118111012101161410910910810813106101661510810610810813106716101513811612848101077410813111110121041310117844891114106101613141115884591114186111611141315138959111418211711121310131291697147210710125101912141637157101091011516196149341518105991121686893101141218145591526812811391161281414512151365121811999610817141012913651218129991610617111012996912612119916661511912139399681112976715129131343998810121376791231311469987101513861491036111561291571115128141481012610156121315711121281411851261010610137710121388113566131061087610101398131161013136158969108917110111310101310151291110119128141712101013810111011121115111125149121310788114115195111115691413117128741351091011611136121410111412127111313109109612139127101014712111110131199971259147310117131171011111095785914143121112136712114109512810971431210121264122411961210101171531010161211410214111064108111015610916131181012142109410812101261499137810121221491110212812614791575109121014411421089697715351291410141074749101191392783101214146141277710913111713142987106141065121271410513111771449571061010145712614555111571248512101110214117967565915812128912811112111189127661693821289118911811128712966161239258131199887126713911691229125121312910811711691391112982101216126121210811911139391412138610161613661278293134391411131363169134106614782103174119101113137399249631413811101317711111071313710913289173213111110135713111478131010913981317122141191012551313148841015101597951371281499111295121316811414151015137125573889141189712716101113146107139121251236891410810767610513564799612712361294109101067612511510469568101279310123411971077612911111066756810129991043911471272669611869710621010959243924812423686489910101028105511253826811423781145981041048559115578661011523761110568104743539105671561010959336310261010579310371010661541069149933342410145129810117810861341101364149912374545141012138411158148171310181394139101210775105510101310481510141517710789913131010410137131055610121078111071512777109111313101548139139576151211791112711121171710811613415108891291471115211119121261191110177814644910178512141411111221011131246595101371114154129717135814111191211106138485125121313112151212877138861113912111068868512141212134261213812728136813612710881464510101414812847691351292913688697128514104121014147898871191251296913614889121235151013121014137699810111128128610131414781212113111551313101013561598109110812815109147712129111011125613610651015118991210812415995731213981010129686116131061111961288114991551334137810109978811313969116615841199131510138497610793712812315912981010610151141197137107813910697931212121212156127851051051151112710797813310169129101231213127697553514511561291011911810312167121310133131313779651033146119679111191111101012117101341312131313674613101137699107101159111810511110641512131314684131312119711911107101351216812571146111551310148871371239911711779131012767128771461161035510118127671231198713759410117771381179676838511111212106712811585134510491187101361110957981181211512610771287565104101069781110461110759911117129511687171287126101041046676115471197691011275981178617118812510749410626556749106810321156814710610115885127109910121052255644101098631117611491081015383122105921210522125444104910631879115988811133382115122510102712646454141033138691215138108311143108711131275610107136156105101412311138621261391063121412108714131071069108138158105101212811483296991165126122811148101110896888118956121384433791195117511610211115813118813612814118916651344639781113587141161091110581311812136121014886168512108496794810138811141161496108812111212116410138961083127899117541010108101111111114761086121012911744134910108310779511855101210101091161177810661110691271141241110687107795981156125101597647118467111161212611312131156107127698981111611512151277451174675115121167341314581081210610878911711812212127559713611535911157510647141781189101310671391071892912751791313111117389915135136979176117916136691341051597911717171013141151714889111361369109962771613611954659510751141791051495191458311362631069321077136111151064951095445911511941912103593533210312683101077661011310546510964551011411124712931391251031110612381210776612101031059671056359106413121179910135123106119663121210766111291081089127351134946111311114961035123468986512210869119988883121137113411410117111044643712749868757248699911868531011137739111010571010114341471179976117117441361196114101461151310181313715971012581011111037145111091571311181194111381156847141111713121810131315117912138311111012785121015154139189931114885108117121111761271011136118912131036111112584121415154119159133614111078121081113121011126571311156108121261013615111056415148151411101510131264111371012108713810612105111310156108127691371512105671598111421011101312941513810610971088681091131010698977911712121153759711228115136951528116597101085839410235103912910710115126118385877278654655627118512741085233415295738127101010656628585857117261247556671183121045810223815109471085781010676924585554116281210725969114310103571010238101010451025881110379964588544868861072109799471043107910113310610655288411335926856874185896974108739777451089411332696858824934511248462751359969548843575785382493925948118324924511844411235631194685108104551153823724949858451173641124598841011235691174984101010751011103822764748878855736411341196871011295791071191141010117810910981321561477813778859311463141181096107111169775105118117101211158691191013101511141477132713879611661414487981010111261171351254813751217157610111510121081181411742513375611641410411738710101291111137126412136510171278104157129878611341051131351411104111091113313710101091111137136101296910111213864879957761210231410101110131014110611129121310131510910711613813121012979911141314678139115117712102111411105101610101106121212124101215109678668131210121371591514814477131011611371510711111155131612101210141261294312410116789661371091371531510814477151046113101577111195513141261213149689151012344911771399657391171231410151477161574611910177411179751414861013109118111511124410914771389105531211111210149151071116117369941710461767814178810610511811711847101314107128610451112131110101391110411161151063119124910867678817128961551381371281171213610111215674101181351010131011941016145661311512129381077711861299131512138136129117129613114151071510989531015101291010314116413155512161013314101175111639413121211896599779613104610121512910912311151012410143141113461514571691315141211358181073748121011998589671761310961312612610101212118101441114314111313612149711914157121631081581010975711871011916812876121781379111386116111061213841415111131311151312129991191413718161510715710891156111071011101681247141211812713111486115111061213741215611813615812159109119121381810151579778121113681081010101289431451181215107139141261351109121076121361484611814151710711812118121081599117121211314813871091213983105138915771097129131115991012631391474811314121713798131115121381091111181212109110149139789113681310111339371610274951145893123399679893131211131291013101551310101111101811124913108910938911163131111935351681010211410512410813383596649996131111312810610125810121161010115451378710535991133611129105135387106115106121110413389566541098691173882641248312864109510587107105458910336812610713103679611511681154836910635910782977281110624444531087459310581010710642841063581067761036109811411108105385641053395752272291146246410581077251032510101076692747645910772663810482471091010355114557375151021024924621065107810792121032111061056593787104391079210668941021075910101059111059757418109102410210631045374108921211311113610525531851063111089101056897102106571061049210991157410859828103105364537410862411101183510621155145126611789104588578296276634122691111675107512858631156635127131061026341010481058610119512481210611759448845383910236236121169114611537312451062114663912513964210391074210586108991258210811459498841139391093621269115964141143531143101327466139115893414106977421458610899753213874691391285101311495914986912129135136161474115711143141313776101361158639141165710412147881069147143111357769131312105141324115111478179612111313138161371111
