“1146313114552011444171143281142281141414114419113551511345201133515113249113141411341911245151123412112229112141111241911155151114317111341511126191111515111419110373011027311101519110419109641410955191094517109351910924141091416109419108341510823121081316108419107721410763131075520107421110735201072417107141910741910647261063418106242310612101064191055315105441810534201052519105172510541910493101048314104741810463141045416104441710434151042416104141410441910339521032415103116103419102852110274181026211102552010244141023312102231410212131024191011128101104131019291018416101741410164171015424101452610134171012291011171014191001151910010414100972510084171007415100641810053111004311100321310022131001213100419998621997622996632995413994316993416992318991420994199882183987942986166698516789841145983311982623981125698419975518974937973620972519971521974199619520961821296172109616315961562696145179613415961231296115189610310969313968414967311966417965518964313963314962415961518964199584219574179569429554189546269533159522995121495419948312947313946413945414944312943312942313941413944199311416931041793941793831593731393641693541893452093351593231293116934199221299220521921962192184179217214921631292154179214316921341992123129211621921021392921192841692721392621192541592431192341892231492131392419911531391147399113730911231391113159110413919413918320917312916314915315914315913315912314911212914199020313901963290183179017945901641590153129014619901326901241690113149010214909212908414907515906417905620904520903311902415901415904198930210892931389285218927420892641589255208924521892394389225198921620892041789194208918523891751989161040891511498914314891351889123178911417891031589952689862389731289661889561689431289321289228891168941988264158825313882442288234138822314882141588204168819417881841788176258816212881521288142128813313881231288114158810310889211888314887618886619885413884313883210882314881417884198719315871851987173158716420871541487144128713619871241987112148710311879416878212877931876313875313874315873312872311871415874198617423861629861531486143118613310861231486113158610617869314868415867522866412865418864619863211862416861214864198522310852141285204178519519851821085174168516311851531385143158513414851241385111465851014658591040858940857627856413855314854315853211852213851316854198425941842431584234178422418842162684204148419415841831384173128416313841561884145138413518841221084113138410623849419848419847521846937845314844416843312842314841314844198336624833531683346308333420833262783316318330419832983683284198327313832663283254168324522832331683224168321213832029831941583186248317725831641783156268314830831373383127228311420831031683929838414837622836523835288345228335248326308312118341982199348218619821751882164168215315821441682134168212314821121182103158294178286178274188267288255188243158233148223178213158241981298328128518812751881262108125518812451881234198122315812131081206198119415811831381173138116211811531381144148113314811231481113148110313819310818316817314816314815314814314813314812316811312814198042419804121080404198039212803831480376248036212803529803451780333148032317803121080302108029212802821080273148026415802541680244218023515802241380213138020312801941580184118017417801628801529801421180133108012310801131280103118092780841480741480631080531180441880341680231280128804197946936794551979443137943414794252579414167940932793941779383167937397936417793552079344207933317793221379314207930417792942079283147927625792661979255267924417792329792231079212879203167919417791861679175187916625791541479143147913416791251979114167910527799212798314797213796314795213794213793213792213791213794197840166978399327838145878371047783651878356247834210783321278322127831314783052378294187828318782752178262978253147824624782331678222117821416782042178194227818626781751978162117815416781452578133167812420781131778103167893167882147872137864177853127842107834167823137812107841977504187749316774862477473167746526774531677444197743629774231577415207740316773951877385267737316773641877354147734316773331277324187731620773062177296247728316772773877262127725417772431677233187722311772141777205187719316771831777173157716314771531677145187713297712310771131377103147793147783147773157763107752137742137732137722137712137741976311042763011417629931762894776278407626729762552176249337623627762283076211359762072976199477618419761763076165237615837761463476131044761252376118367610729769104076873776773576673376583576463576373276210497611140764197540727753952675385177537618753652175354137534311753351775323127531412753041775293177528312752739752641775255177524315752331275223147521212752041775194147518420751741775166207515314751452175136267512418751138751052475931575829757312756418755523754623753524752420751417754197456114474553107454311745351974529317451310745031574495217448422744731474464177445418744441674435187442412744121074403147439314743851774377247436210743531474343137433312743229743157250743031274292107428412742741374262974255167424619742331374223974212574204117419310741831074172117416521741541274143137413210741241774114167410418749416748416747210746313745211744210743287422774131274419732078329731993173186267317835731663173151151731484073135227312419731163573107327399367386267376217368307355217346247335187324157313127341972281352722713447226727722511367224114572231664722212407221824722082672191041721883172171039721683972155277214104972131452721211397211937721013447291351728841727933726114672510377247287239337229357211349724197128157171271041712610377125125471248357123135371223157121134971204207119521711852571175237116731711583171143147113620711294471114217110627719728718416717147971652171572671418657135257127227111451714197044944704394070428427041831704073570395227038828703752170365247035417703452470334237032528703173070301042702942170285187027624702642170252147024522702352270222107021417702041570194177018297017415701621070153107014622701331670122127011940701041670931770841970721070631470531470411477034157024177014167041969524176951313695042069495216948317694762169464176945316694452369434176942624694172669404156939311693841669374186936517693552069345206933623693273169313126930296929313692841469274186926414692511446924840692321169223106921414692052069199426918626691794369165256915317691463069136236912629691173069106286996346985166971568696627695423694420693416692286911669419685251968511262685052568491040684811426847521684672768455186844104468431152684293868418386840416683912476838517683751868364146835323683462668338396832103968316236830524682962668287286827312682652368254176824626682331968227276821213682021368197276818210681710506816315681573368145156813413681241768113136810516689417688314687113968621368521368441568351868251968141668419673010406729134967281558672713526726934672573067248316723125567221247672112426720155467191562671883067171248671611406715145967147276713938671293867115316710113967918636781353677832676734675126867410426731865672115367193367419661217796611249766102712166912626684619466712516662310766517826642192663291146621149661155766419651225966511341536510177265973265814646572590656321466551454654281186532173652301326514217365419641852964171250641616796415839641419876413937641211596411165864101159649271226481051647186964616826451353644146264394964211476411759644196311114463102185639187563817906372090636187063514666342210463311446321251631178263419621121886210157262922886281879627945626187162523105624103962383762221926211252624196114361646113941611217756111157261101247619146061811546171668616321296152410161411466139326129346111143614196013208060123917360112194601056258609211016082191607156360619736051356604522216031362602136860149220604195924177859231987592213515921188459201048591910515918187259171050591617685915114759142394591312455912167359112812959102310659931134598189859737166596259059513605941251593146059241185591114359419582251221582193458208375819157258181773581715645816104358151040581419735813241155812239258113113958101782589201055883816758747163586156458518815842611558321905822310358118735841957292285572822945727391915726147457252813857241256572315585722216957212510857203918057192010557181257571713555716281185715156457142099571327132571222109571112435710371535791769578156957715745761252575837574361345739405721143571939574195696417569551656942105693310569262656915205690622568941856885195687420568652056857285684316568341956824225681422568041756794175678311567731256765205675419567441756735285672630567142156706285669733566842256673125666210566562956645255663315566263256619355660732565952556583145657421565641656553155654419565331756525175651525565052456494195648215564794756465255645521564441356433105642311564152556403135639312563821256372105636214563531656342105633417563221156312956302856292956283105627525562641756256255624418562331956222756214165620316561952156185235617420561631956153125614314561331256123125611213561021756952756852756731656631456531356441456321056231556131456419557862755774195576626557541955746225573419557241855714195570313556941955684195567419556631755654195564185563419556231455614195560523555941955583205557419555693755554195554941555341955525195551419555031655494195548210554741955465195545419554452155436265542419554164055404195539827553841955376315536419553583455344195533177855324195531418553041955291035552841955276275526412552541955246315523419552242355214195520418551931755184195517421551641955156205514524551341955124205511525551031755963455841755742355631855531755421055321055229551165541954556215454519545341754525185451626545062654495185448935544752054466295445421544452054439355442736544151954407295439315543852254379435436529543572454349385433416543272954318415430416542942254288325427735542652354259325424104154233145422729542141654206275419936541862354177295416416541562354146245413522541293854115265410521549943548835547840546828545520544728543631542731541422544195362317536121153603155359419535862053572105356520535541753543115353213535293253513125350418534941453484155347419534641353455265344415534341553424165341419534041353396215338518533731553367205335519533431553333145332311295331167353301654532911415328165153279475326186553253175324415532325995322414532141853203185319318531862153175165316518531531453143145313415531241753115165310518539518538310537315536311535313534514533414532516531312534195249525524810415247104252469335245732524493952439335242733524152152407275239520523894052377285236731523582752346295233623523283152316275230728522983152289315227628522672752255245224732522383352225285221198452207335219629521883852175205216125352156225214625521362152125185211317521031552941752841052741452621352521352421352339522210521165241951607315159943515872751579305156627515552551545195153621515213465151113951508295149729514842551475295146831514573251448375143827514293251417305140734513962551388345137736513672851356265134419513352051326265131523513083251299395128938512752251266235125938512462851239375122523512141951204205119526511831951176255116937511552051147325113519511241851115185110211519412518415517315516313515315514213513213512213511213514195045135350449365043627504273250417295040525503912495038135450371341503615545035625503452450337295032622503152550309335029831502883450271037502610415025417502462150236215022124550216235020623501993450188265017837501614575015103650149365013419501273050118375010522509104550852050711515061253505932504936503727502114450131450419491810454917197649161665491518914914271164913219349123212949114015949101053499301444987284972812749618794951248494941493177749223984911664494194829542494828146048272812048262813048254017948241977482312414822125248211452482018894819737481819864817271104816281244815311414814146148139434812208548113715148102510548984948852748784048621116485199348419944834194821561481519484194738301294737635473613654735125847341555473311554732218647318504730126647291140472810484727741472615654725166347247334723737472210454721124847202711747191473471815654717632471624104471544172471413484713145447122210847111144471016754798354786304771046476420475317474381674731881472188147183547419463527107463418794633228546321865463115604630207846291880462817734627104746263213846251460462418754623135546221254462125954620271294619943461817664617281134616188146154519346149434613135246121675461119764610249546924744682599467145946694546518644642910646315724626294611246419453784245368374535167645341461453311434532227845311259453013624529114745281454452710524526187045251668452421784523249445221356452117854520732451915644518135545172410245161374451511444514146145131660451214634511114245101972459114545814574574144561253455208945493445363145262945112454194459317445852944577254456104844555224454419445352744523114451519445061944495204448725444752444462104445418444421044433124442829444110344440523443983644387374437125044365244435832443431444337294432629443172844307334429837442842244274204426314442551844246274423524442262344215214420624441993544189314417835441662944156294414625441372844126264411520441062844951444810394478374467264456234445174438344422134411244419438962643888274387837438613524385136343841144438384243828364381831438011484379522437873443779374376629437562243746264373627437273543711569437052943695294368934436773443661040436511474364936436317794362729436110454360836435910424358144843579334356424435563643547364353114643521134435118674350730434912474348135543477314346125543451353434462643438364342734434162643401140433994043381249433773843361138433512534334530433317774332251114331104243309364329939432873243275224326940432573643241460432321834322114643218334320155343191266431893443171246431673143159374314419431320844312114943111250431011454391052438732437832436623435835434727433630432213431124341942531556425227109425122774250114742491562424827115424721684246165642452712342442072424382842421566424193542401457423962942381164423710504236177442359364234726423315554232629423114484230104142291663422813524227176842261264422512514224229142232911842222410742212284422022754219938421822964217115242161871421534149421430114421338152421213564211198942101559429166042819714272290426125342519904241038423104342213421124241941541239415319734152175141511356415032130414911434148124041472810741461146414518724144301294143175341421346414193941402610141392291413812554137198841361150413511424134177141331351413241441311670413019934129167941281461412710554126115241252599412411484123946412220844121187841201256411983441185274117147441161989411525102411423944113940411219894111166741101567419146241894041783641616744151775414733413733412419411124141940851770408412514083156740822510440816284080125940799434078321234077145840768424075114640741760407372340726234071632407094440691039406812444067301184066207640651453406421984063733406212414061208240601362405911434058136940571253405623934055125340544204053841405210464051115340501673404913534048124540471982404613614045104240441250404322864042156140411041404023884039124840389374037239440361040403523934034301054033165240327274031145540301141402927101402839146402713484026186940251987402473440236314022136340213011940201562401962840181567401713474016155940151663401483740131453401215624011136540101567409125340816764072712840610424052198404135240314564026294011240419397517773974167339732094397294539713415139709323969157439682277396717863966624396514623964734396311573962928396111503960146539591045395812423957932395615513955166439541352395321853952155939511568395011433949228339481143394725973946177639451876394411483943145439422610739411877394083239391040393836148393712413936155739351258393483339338343932155839317303930416392919813928728392711443926125939251040392413613923341323922207739213112039202080391910383918136739171260391617613915198539146213913929391252339119313910229539924105398341223973112639636138395231053941663393331263921045391629394193888417388751838861036388573138844173883420388242338814183880417387962438786233877520387610343875155438746283873422387293638719323870827386993338683133867411386673738651140386462138636303862103838611140386011453859103838584153857420385642138555193854721385352138524223851735385052238496233848838384752838465263845848384414543843104638426263841114638406223839728383842138374203836833383515493834939383363038321142383162938307333829950382813663827167038263112238259333824321373823156038222393382173038206333819520381873638171144381683238151035381472238137363812834381162438101048389731388155038710383861251385832384104438310373826223814153841937182419371813163718062337179315371784143717763037176217371753173717441437173419371723163717152937170418371694203716862237167315371663163716531537164620371635163716241737161314371604193715941737158104737157524371564143715521037154414371534203715241937151521371506293714952937148420371476263714652237145421371446223714352137142419371414193714052037139418371383173713742237136314371354183713441937133418371324193713141937130414371294193712841937127318371265243712552837124518371234193712242137121419371204173711942137118323371173233711642437115529371145213711310483711252737111419371103163710931437108419371073153710652037105731371044193710341937102281003710131637100516379962337985293797732379641937954183794316379342037924133791626379031537893113788416378741837865223785625378451637834183782315378141937804193779520377841937774203776525377552637744193773524377242037715223770418376942037685203767723376663237654213764623376342237626233761421376051937596283758313375762637565193755521375441537537343752419375172337505243749313374842037477243746316374551937443143743312374231437414163740419373962337384223737522373663337351038373442037335253732420373162537301036372952137286283727524372641737254143724317372372937227383721727372062437197283718416371721537167353715621371441937134173712313371112463710728379417378937377518376631375735374312373213372213371211374193683835368210343681146336801144367910373678114136771142367693636757303674731367362936726333671125036708333669124336687303667104936669463665115736645243663521366283636615233660145036594253658516365762336567323655728365411423653103936521353365110393650733364983536487303647249236461142364511453644622364393336426233641835364015583639737363883936379373636135636358373634104436331050363262336311145363012473629830362813473627727362683036254193624517362315583622831362172936201146361993836181255361752336166283615155536141157361383836121458361112543610836369125136810453678303667303653173643133633143622133611236419354525973544301203543261113542198335411976354033132353924100353810443537251083536187235351455353411453533135735322199353116653530837352916763528177835272294352672735251367352412483523412352216623521416352041835194213518341383517518351662335151147351418813513281153512281273511341153510241083591776358259135713623561358355156335411433532285352196835124100354193454155734531038345293634511035345016573449829344872634471752344624893445145934441147344334130344218773441135834401051343920733438945343723100343613493435839343414543433341603432156934313214334301041342973034281254342712483426114634259353424176234232285342226933421217034201045341919873418178234178353416167534152074341427109341319873412271073411125134101353349291053481666347166134616663451146344105034332123342186834117673441933731593337218923371145933709403369177133688373367846336612553365833336472933631562336212433361634336019873359229933581267335714633356146333553012633541139335370294335225853351351373350622673349231033348125833478333346629334583833448353343136533423163341835334017663339136133382275333748196333624923335302233334145633332512233322081333114643330176933291464332816793327136133261677332516743324167233231875332218853321176533202310233193515533181468331724803316155733151355331414603313261053312135833116363310167633922983388423371780336291433352812633428127333626332124333114613341932305263229114432287303227177532261869322511453224105232231459322213513221949322021953219125932188313217134632161156321515663214146432131666321216753211114232101455329146032882532710363266323251763324249232318663228313211332419313427100313331122313222923131196831301658312925973128114131272178312610403125156531247303123156431221566312121873120301113119114531181654311718693116258231152911231141776311315543112187031111454311027105319835318839317166731618723158333149473133163124193111331419306010393059832305819763057942305620863055125530542481305314553052114630519413050197130491037304828115304718873046178330451151304493930431656304214573041156730402285303922873038167230371557303615623035104330346343033187130321145303194830302292302916603028271133027187930268313025166530242185302314643022136730212083302011403019146030188393017628301611583015943301452630139433012526301183230101360309321523082298307104430611423058333041246303831302293011330419296994729681765296715732966636296516642964156529632284296214502961136429601253295952529581786295772829569402955135629546382953126529521991295115642950166229491459294813522947198929462511229452189294410452943842294212432941198829402812429391369293816772937739293617742935730293412502933239029321667293115702930627292923103292814572927188729261244292527117292420762923136029221759292183229201972291913472918135229172711829161356291564029141669291311612912188629116372910311202997432982190297127029610422951245294104329311562921040291132941928881963288716602886155928851966288418752883146728822611328811765288016702879217828782810228772610528762910928751770287484028731362287221872871197828701558286972828681458286711422866735286563328641364286318842862840286117752860156628592082285817732857259728561350285515742854126528531555285283428516292850239228491349284826106284718862846207728451881284413522843167528421048284194428401051283912522838291082837186928361773283515752834145728339332832251002831207328302082282927109282815592827291102826114828252610628241550282327108282211442821104228201976281933119281816722817936281613462815381482814104928131765281216642811103728101767289186728813632872292286125528512592841985283938282419281132841927931151279215612791176327901352278911402788187127871866278615642785833278413572783114227821670278114562780114527797282778834277742127761247277510372774831277310382772932277173027709322769940276812472767944276614442765145727641978276320822762167027612189276027104275912492758631275773927561558275511472754839275352827521144275194327507312749146827481042274713512746136127451358274428110274312432742145927411247274038136273916552738114727371360273616692735839273413612733125327321350273152327308342729933272811472727728272682727251462272417772723114227221447272194527201244271924106271820852717943271619772715156927141158271383627121972271111352710207427972827814562771665276728275104327410452739472723162716242741926227199226226521262257222622432126223423262225172622162526220417262193162621841526217420262167262621562826214319262139342621241926211522262104182620941626208727262076232620652026205419262042172620341826202522262017292620052426199625261985232619793526196417261953132619452226193416261924202619152126190829261891041261885192618793726186935261855222618452926183942261823212618162926180114026179317261784142617762026176422261755212617482926173631261723142617141826170318261695202616852126167935261661141261654232616411402616331726162414261617242616041826159521261581041261573202615673126155931261541138261535222615262726151420261503172614952626148418261473112614652126145114026144317261434142614272526141316261405212613910442613831326137518261369362613562326134210261333162613252426131317261304202612942326128521261271140261263172612541426124724261233152612252126121829261204182611962826118940261175162611693626115516261144192611372526112624261115262611031726109114026108317261074142610672426105418261045212610382926102726261013112610041426994192698419269762126964192695316269442126937282692622269131826903182689620268861926874172686624268552226846232683626268283126814182680416267941926784172677623267631926755222674628267341726725202671628267062326694192668521266782926663152665523266431626631357266262026618382660214265942326583142657420265631526553152654419265352526528352651114326507272649219626483122647420264631726458312644948264372626426252641125126407322639522263852426374162636734263583526347262633626263262426317232630519262983726289392627730262652326255202624940262352126228322621114626206252619732261810382617520261673226157332614623261383526126202611416261083226952126882926711392668382651143264114526362726241926113264192577124525765262575944257413642573104525729422571935257016692569836256822852567114725664202565114725645272563126125621350256111482560136125591772255813522557144425565242555145525541247255315642552733255172625509432549104625481355254711492546522254516572544155525439372542176825411144254016692539733253883725371369253694925359422534114825338372532156925311149253010412529114825287282527124925269442525739252473425239382522105125211985252020962519156525182187251716682516104025151350251483825139422512937251183925101762259942258176525716702561251255947254166625322922521973251944254192464228624632712024623918024617631524602310324591987245850219245711532456848245538173245423102245317762452104524511883245016672449728244811482447157024461147244531106244410442443381402442735244121832440331082439229924381458243719872436145524354820324341361243348217243217832431783502430156624291770242822872427198524261699242511492424947242313682422261212421351502420938241920852418731241793824161456241516702414156324131465241212592411281022410938249937248115024793724617812451143244199424318732422612224195124419231187292311718632311611422311584023114934231138342311272423111836231108432310914612310852223107731231068372310583423104628231031047231026302310110432310016652399830239851723977262396936239572723946262393620239263223912480239052623895222388144823875212386833238552223848292383124723828402381622238010472379730237810482377124423768442375114523748382373524237293723711675237010422369727236810422367421236694123657282364836236314472362124923617332360104523595212358523235772523567272355728235451923539392352833235112522350114823496302348424234773823467372345839234419852343727234262523418482340522233951923381241233710422336419233594223347322333251112332145523316242330725232983723281562232732138232651923251030232426104232317632322421232115662320940231913562318135623171041231652223155182314211042313622231272823116292310315239525238528237730236104223542123442023352123252123131423419227844199227712632276104122751145227493122732912222722913622711863227018602269941226872922671767226610432265271012264124522631555226217602261156022601656225973522581877225784122561259225516642254218922531674225227106225184122508412249931224811452247146022462397224514612244115122434182242936224117852240351482239104522381344223720892236271282235157622342089223311432232936223121812230241002229846222820942227145122261676222525108222493822232298222212522221415222062322191769221837144221722102221693822152285221417722213104122121448221125101221093522915612281345227124322613462257026222411442231244222228622110402241921112104321111829211108322110913502110811422110752521106623211051252211041666211031157211029382110193821100726219993521981142219720752196103721957322194124921936302192833219111572190199221891143218884021872383218663121857342184166921831041218212512181146521801045217914722178146121771261217612512175629217416752173158321728392171842217052921698332168735216793421661142216593621647372163939216273221618352160732215983421588372157735215613552155731215483121535252152114521519372150733214983721488432147208321461247214511462144188221431455214213502141135621401045213916612138730213783721361772213510492134104021331147213283921311357213018802129135121281559212762921268382125155321242282212362221221352212172721205262119135721181353211711422116735211583721146242113104821127292111104421108372198452189422171459216835215145821410442131572212114221173121419201351150201341979201331353201321259201311875201302085201299352012817672012712502012683820125828201241247201231870201226232012115652012014522011962120118722201171349201169422011511362011417652011314622011211422011193520110103820109124420108135620107620201063152010573220104124720103627201028362010173020100831209913442098123920972810420961662209551720942071209341820928282091937209017682089124420881248208715752086271052085936208493320836202082935208117652080157520795192078837207718692076124920751046207413422073146120721976207126115207083720691659206862120675192066124920651239206410422063136720625302061155920606232059833205814602057834205662820558412054939205319742052113520515212050929204951720481035204721872046727204510352044830204351920428312041213204035130203922932038620203751920366202035414203421120333122032312203131020302820295182028210202741620263102025515202451820234192022114020217322020520201941420181348201751820161037201510392014114420135232012937201151920101868209415208829207730206124420541920463120341520252320112204191998144619971045199694319955231994417199310381992624199141619909441989414198842019879371986524198562719847251983941198263319818331980522197993119787281977839197613621975259819749351973167419728361971934197082919691036196884319671038196683119651256196418611963933196211461961114619601251195911521958291291957316195683319559411954114819537291952736195110411950937194914601948145519471035194613541945124619441040194314501942165019418351940834193912461938114819371147193683519351653193493419339361932629193111491930834192910381928124019271141192618761925835192410381923145719225241921155719201138191993219188301917115119161042191593419146261913625191283419111146191013451991443198145219713451968301951352194145219351719251919115194191811024921810918681810862518107104818106942181051466181041149181035251810214651810111471810052718991148189815491897835189619771895124918942078189313511892310189162318901553188931018881350188713461886259118852918841034188393818823514818819401880105118791776187812481877241031876134618759291874166418731038187282718711565187012431869103618688241867621186611371865125118649341863208518621249186111491860134918598431858197518573011818561892185519831854145418531051185213651851135918502611118492812218481663184711521846136718452310218449371843113918422079184183018401562183919631838828183716571836125018351241183413501833115018321470183128123183012481829281291828301291827155418262381182583718241758182372518223315118213214218201356181938173181822109181734127181619801815187518141978181311481812939181173018101661189104218862718711441861146185165818462718331318215691811142184191711121721711022901710953017108835171071870171069451710594617104146117103940171021667171011978171001463179923921798147117972711417961147179514601794155817932692179212531791114517901037178914531788197617879301786135017851454178411401783125317821357178193617801456177912461778146017771142177613601775124817749371773136317721139177115701770178117692287176815571767187317661454176593517641996176310411762156417611358176025113175921921758187417571884175613521755156817541455175316711752944175125100175051917499451748942174719761746198217451258174421871743630174213481741104417401159173918671738724173713481736165717351156173417711733229017328341731135917301248172913551728125017279481726104517251253172412511723251081722936172111501720124517191252171818711717135317161468171521821714731171313591712231161711843171094217916711781149177231101761157175177617413601739311721257171219517419161288321612714511612612531612522911612417751612312491612294216121735161201143161191971161181566161175201611622941611522841611413571611394416112241071611115511611018651610972716108115616107136216106249416105115216104124816103166916102135616101176716100941169910411698840169718761696156416951557169419831693176816923213116912089169016811689241031688135916871043168619911685114516841451168373916826291681251101680251191679186816781575167719711676291091675271031674104216731562167221981671229216702074166924931668135416671565166617691665166116641463166317721662177116612396166012581659196516589371657734165612571655634165410381653124316521148165112511650732164914581648176716478311646728164516671644126316431561164252516411878164010371639115316381873163714461636281221635321181634104316332291163212641631156716302090162984416281982162721981626218616251569162494016231349162211551621732162010411619625161810391617727161642216151149161421100161313491612157116111671161013471691044168948167145916673116584016483016373616218681619421641915995221598624159772815968341595319159462715933141592319159142015904211589521158815631587736158651915851469158462415833191582630158153015805251579528157852415775191576315157552115748411573319157252415716251570523156941815686231567422156694015651462156442315637291562416156152015606291559624155862615575231556829155573215548351553728155293715514181550522154962615488301547104015463171545520154483015434201542114115415191540420153910461538418153741715366241535624153452015331139153293115317271530422152993615281245152772815268331525725152474215236291522126315211142152083415191152151872915175211516737151583615149391513726151252315118331510728159729158939157834156937155727154831153739152730151625154191452136014511036145063114496321448105014471142144612511445146414442610914439451442136014418391440939143913541438186114372611414361558143513551434156114339431432251071431218614301253142942114281250142718841426134914251255142415591423178314224418714213413814205181419145614182290141716621416725141552314141043141316781412177814112911214103314314937157148135014711481462611714521861441975143167614214541411672144191343156413421871134116681340135813398321338218213371974133625101133519891334145313333913913321355133151193133028106132983813281152132719671326167413252394132473013231572132219101132113541320734131915581318271181317421821316451881315115513142710713131986131294213113512113101454139530138155813715561362090135251121342711113324101132261151311560134191211123941211019791210929123121081767121071459121067301210511491210410361210362612102145712101211051210047169129914551298935129793912962072129562712941247129312561292114612919391290238412891039128822101128721811286134712851249128413511283187012821153128118721280371391279135012781663127724841276331231275114512746251273124812721244127152712701565126916621268301101267281111266248812652611412641766126317711262147412616291260103512591772125893912577351256177212558331254146112531554125212471251291101250229212491139124815531247145712462296124511501244841124325105124218701241208612403212712391046123826104123726112123627115123511381234104112331768123219841231321311230187312291042122813431227103612261968122523891224197612232391122294312213213812209421219177712181873121719801216420121517761214938121313541212834121112431210166812914591281557127730126251061251663124166312316641226311215221241911123167311122318111219411112017691111915611111810421111783511116261101111572911114146811113176611112124611111104311110187211109207711108187511107155711106937111051036111045201110316571110212441110124941110093611999421198946119710441196631119510371194188611932082119216651191197911909371189237811883613711872182118611421185157411842711011838311182125711813011811801130117913431178271091177134811761554117552211741148117314601172134811719481170186811691563116812441167841116618731165114711641870116323851162228311612811111601768115912501158146111572181115618651155728115416651153166111521882115114521150186311491975114819721147196311462476114515561144198411432386114220731141114811402694113910421138197311371155113617581135125211341866113310381132145911313112311301038112923921128208111272911311261140112593511241161112314671122727112194111202410011191150111823100111739146111616651115146211141664111318751112279511111048111013561191147118229311731127116166411519851148281132598112935111103611419101091145101082387101072485101061655101059381010427100101031045101021564101011460101001453109915601098219410978331096830109510441094228510932410910921461109172810902711810891151108829131108716831086526108510481084135210832285108273310811764108010391079626107816771077114810761038107514691074229310731787107216601071341361070135910699351068259610671561106625901065104210641565106342110621036106142141106019761059207310581044105715631056522105516581054218410531143105213521051113910501253104922811048730104712491046156310452087104410421043114510421147104115601040124510391981103816661037228310361760103529971034176310331039103211481031271141030166310291046102818891027271181026167210251145102443198102326113102241166102122841020166810191771101829123101714541016186510153913810141042101317871012271041011188610101466109157410863010715711061462105231011042812610329113102269910152210419912915549128146091272179912616569125125491241882912317789122221029121187791205219991199419118311279117271099116176191151861911422889113208491121610991113717491101561910927101910823869107241179106125491051685910416679103166591021774910122999100251289992711399816719971669996145999518889943013299319869922390991261039901780989135698814769871146986188298516749841871983251129828439812711898025103979209397811479771567976937975125297446190973126297224107971241329702612596932168968167996719105966166796513649641773963166496212559612611496022118959198295816629571144956104595517819542295953124795222939511456950166594915639481664947178694615719451470944147794313529422311394115719404317693916709382912293731134936361609351984934291399331460932156493123102930231079292912392828113927124092618839252396924331709232097922831921104492016809192411091823999171883916241029151145914115991320939121879911136891010399913569816779723105961874952613394229893321359214649194187522958741885873135787245209871135487025948691146868103986720788662610786527115864937863207686212538611250860331348598358581455857104385612448551038854178285318688521774851937850136784918748483614084717768461367845136184419888432088842351498413315084010468391666838165983718818362198835135883421938331252832197283117698301674829198282810488271261826199582513588242195823114982210398218368201254819249781862681721868162081815125481463081313588122310381122998101867891152887338723101861151851147841147836348217828118898419720611487205166972048417203238972027317201125072001044719973271981252719710477196939719526997194146471931256719273371917287190125571892912571882810471873715371861040718522887184114071835187182840718173171801469717930122717810427177947717630132717513647174527717315647172261047171197971701052716940172716814777167198071661141716518797164198171632711871621773716120937160432007159832715832141715743222715630129715541170715415637153145971521569715111467150391727149187471482289714713637146361537145208971441565714341165714223109714118857140940713910367138249971372913971361160713511437134239071331380713212477131229471301047712922887128167671272110071261666712552271248417123197771223127121420712031771194257118625711711417116115571151140711452271131146711241671117347110730710993271086267107624710611367105186571049347103167171029417101231027100197979910447989387979407961885795188279413597931664792135979163379012537894215978822937871983786241077853815678484078373678213547811146780135377915637786337771666776837775239677425113773351327721366771251077701771769271137687307671139766145876516577641471763135976211447611139760932759217675817727572912375615657558357543214575338146752104575119957502087749156874814727471362746188774510487442811074336150742157074110427402310473914627384016173737157736115873519747341147733291107322611173116647301678729166972822947273113872620837257347241248723125472228130721526720251057191770718125471715667167367154167145217131350712175771116737101148791156789457762776636751246741043731457721350711474196165218661642910461638326162939616116666160166461591977615837138615735144615614616155844615417756153177561523514961514218061502711861498366148371426147135161462812261453912861444016761432310661421670614131145614020836139229561382611761372096613631128613519756134727613318716132937613110386130281346129838612836151612710416126941612528110612429118612315696122241006121209661201259611930116611810406117113961161863611511486114231056113126261122395611122100611013606109219061082510361071353610613446105844610415596103943610216536101186561001568699441876981359697166969612626951769694291286934920169222102691441716901666689178168816596879566868446857346842110068314586821152681229368025926791253678186567718696761554675950674145867324106672838671391606704517566912476682310366752166693266527105664103666317736621248661177166022956593111365814596572277656217465563565427108653157165225105651176565028103649843648156464714566462390645942644207964314636421157641124664015626391771638228263719676361050635281146342290633146663213606312711163019766299396281660627176862611476253213362410416231243622125762114546201368619371376187326171756616936615929614249261393761225100611104161013566994468135367166666311386512536411426312526214496114696419512011425119241025118114751172910851164515351151770511422975113156651122286511113615110642805109155951082299510726128510652213510520865104241005103218551029345101261005100167359911455989375972711959620865955119659424104593241165921372591209259016825894520558812525871869586740585146758416635832189582261285811570580197857910425781771577249057616585752598574840573259657234139571197857019895692092568311295672594566241045651262564472185631367562136356116685602711055921775581254557241095561148555136855438158553158055228116551231045501045549331365485122854716665462611754531140544411955431568542261135416828154019715391449538136453712495362488535146853413525333414053240162531261065309385291356528166452724995261462525135252417695232110052218755211570520239251929107518301345174215751618805152492514251195133214151245207511241075107405910475827117571986566228155432015431137536127852532425124975419417650191417515734174125041732612941721887417154216417024994169114441681250416711434166136141651566416414584163251314162261364161147341601460415914574158832415734128415663141552210341541990415337162415217784151843415022100414914494148145341471148414618924145114541441885414316584142199141413616141403313741391471413862841372078413629130413538163413414624133124941321040413132129413011434129221024128291264127401784126124541251773412416664123207241222195412173241207354119211094118836411711434116206741152081411426974113331354112145441111146411013504109197941082182410714544106730410515674104229441032010641026228141012396410031122499104049812644972712849683749533172494401704931670492602354913216249036168489281284882288487176148615574852277484228748330135482135648124101480124947918734783614347748204476209847531139474219347319754721763471114947072846918924683214676274662710746519774642310546316654621673461156546030125459291324582510245720100456209545511384541880453103745211434512094450104044914544482069447291214463817744594444414644434920544214614411243440155543915684381885437157843632158435229243440192433198843227108431125643013534292499428834427136042614614255826442442185423542654221763421114942017834193515741824106417209041614704152210741413554131879412882994117127141013634915714813704719914637186451679441458432811542168241291254419320011573199301213198218531977303196729319543188319414583193209531921145319121100319011573189938318820863187219931862410831852399318412553183281203182937318122953180301223179361463178177431771253317622873175115431741564317317773172156931711147317019783169135431681674316733151316694731652073316425107316383231621353316121683160187531593012131587283157145331563715731552189315475291315325106315240166315119843150626314913643148105031471987314621883145249931442710731431251314213603141633314024105313994131386293137135431361570313523104313413713133115531325293131527313013623129166131281245312794331261768312515693124136031231047312212573121114931202188311928127311831125311723983116187731159403114158431131459311235152311111483110231133109114431081149310710433106178131051465310414703103341573102135431011774310015693992077398135039725993961042395114739411443932499392155639124913901462389114338893738794738618833851352384291263831462382729381331463801367379281203782912037727116376936375361443748343733211537217793711152370939369135436813663671461366207536516703643212936362836215543612511436072535915473587323571159356136035531132354630353946352208635183435019803494518734853534723793467333452191344208134383734213603412080340176333920923381552337351383362410933518663347273331148332114733114623302696329227932827113327218632625923251553324156532320813221150321188832026122319261073181872317654316115031524107314241253132911631294331114683101666391347381554374619736135035113734187433115332724311334192286491962285271182284281032283321382282129551228115542280145222791772227814542277198722761145227545186227417792273301342272281122271208922701557226916652268136822673012522663514822652712322643917422631144226224922261249722603914822596724922584316922572411822562410222555018922542287225352208225294122512712222501577224960240224830114224743165224654217224516692244938224328106224273122416342240271162239156522388442237351402236251112235472002234251222233642882232331472231452032230301142229461932228401772227729222613542225146522241466222316812222271222221391822220261182219261232218167222175724722162593221522104221430127221349214221220932211207422101772220912492208166722071149220612522205145922041765220325103220283522011457220024972199124921982611021973012121967329021951466219422107219315652192624219125130219013592189271202188178721876528621861777218544185218432123218315612182165521811354218016772179939217838163217751266217614582175116121742912221732593217215622171186621702289216911502168176821672396216612572165311232164431872163935216293721611364216011572159209121582489215794221561045215512662154135021531153215263221511787215031138214917662148197521477272146147321453213021443414621434519621422189214115542140301272139146321381037213719792136311352135156321341554213327114213217702131933213018742129168121281776212714652126301222125221152124198321231867212212582121157021203111221191046211824103211711472116145621151252211430113211331141211217582111187221101776210933123210818732107175921061961210525982104136521031249210274308210122892100104429910442981255297187229625102295944294176729327131292115129130119290271072892610828810462872813828613632854923128415712832915028210522811354280239127924102278114527793627623101275197727437141273115727210452712497270176226918712682380267208326694526512542641354263157026224108261602572602811825918772582095257189025673025515602542712125373725283025112532501050249188424819692471258246838245847244105524374124284224118792401469239105123817682371143236198623519802341363233231012321248231157023028111229197022813602272082226391552253414522413662232078222239922112532202510221919862186192171772216115721573421416732131977212729211114321012512910492811472712532611472583324125223847227272113241917944163191541914312132121241811419”

4.2.2.3 Rewriting with chapter level data with Basmala based key coding pattern

In the previous subchapter, Evidence 4.2.2.1, we witnessed the Basmala verse key coding pattern based rewriting of the full text of Quran at the verse level data in the text type of 6348 verses. As per the rule, we also test all the key coding patterns of Basmala verse also in the chapter level data. In this chapter, I will present the evidence code that shows the same key coding pattern also exist in the chapter level data of the full text of Quran too and this time it is in the 6236 numbered verses.

To remember the natural numbers to be used at the chapter level data, I first provide the head and tail of the table I will use.

knitr::kable(head(dfVCwl), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of numbered verses of Quran.')
Table 4.6: Table head of numbered verses of Quran.
Chapter_index Verse_sum cwords cletters
1 7 29 143
2 286 6140 26249
3 200 3501 14985
4 176 3763 16332
5 120 2837 12206
6 165 3056 12726

I will concatenate the numbers per chapter in the exact same order of the text of Quran, namely from right to left, as I did in Evidence 4.2.2.1. We observe this coding in the numbered 6236 verses text type of Quran as below. Before that, considering all the 6236 numbered verse of Quran, here is the illustration of the coding pattern of the big coding representation number as shown below:

[Chapter 114 | Total Verses of Chapter 114 | Total Words of Chapter 114 | Total Letters. of Chapter 114] [Chapter 113 | Total Verses of Chapter 113 | Total Words of Chapter 113 | Total Letters of Chapter 113] . . . . . . . [Chapter 2 | Total Verses of Chapter 2 | Total Words of Chapter 2 | Total Letters of Chapter 2] [Chapter 1 | Total Verses of Chapter 1 | Total Words of Chapter 1 | Total Letters of Chapter 1]

Here the “|” symbol stands for the concatenation operation of the numbers of its both sides. The neighboring brackets also concatenated.

If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 114 | 6 | 20 | 80] [ 113 | 5 | 23 | 73] . . . . . . [2 | 286 | 6140 | 26249] [1 | 7 | 29 | 143]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

11462080 11352373 . . . . . . 2286614026249 1729143

1146208011352373 . . . . . . 22866140262491729143

Here is the proof with a reproducible R code that rewrites, namely decodes, the full text of Quran by the 4 different descriptor numbers first and then test this big number at the chapter level data.

# Proof on per chapter level rewriting
tmp <- paste0(dfVCwl$Chapter_index,dfVCwl$Verse_sum,
              dfVCwl$cwords, dfVCwl$cletters)
tmpr<-rev(tmp)
cat("Heand and tail of the chapter level represenation numbers: ")
## Heand and tail of the chapter level represenation numbers:
head(tmpr)
## [1] "11462080" "11352373" "11241547" "11152381" "11031980" "10962799"
tail(tmpr) 
## [1] "6165305612726" "5120283712206" "4176376316332" "3200350114985"
## [5] "2286614026249" "1729143"
tmpr <- paste0(tmpr, collapse = '')

cat("The test of divisibility by 19:")
## The test of divisibility by 19:
cat(as.numeric(as.bigz(tmpr) %% 19))
## 0
cat("number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmpr))
## number of digits on this big number is 1205

This code has a similar approach to Evidence 4.2.2.1 but at the chapter level numbers resolution of it. We could perform two tests and observed one success considering the text type of all the 6348 verses.

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, like all the other, Evidence 4.2.2.3 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself. In case if I find out Evidence 4.2.2.3 had been available in another article, then, in such a case, I surely add a citation and update the online version of this book.

Since the key coding pattern is suitable to consider the text type of all the 6348 verses too, we have two trials and one success in this evidence based on the key coding pattern with letters information. Let’s add them into the counters for probability calculations.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  2
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

Here is the “1205” digits length number of this evidence:

“11462080113523731124154711152381110319801096279910831043107725114106417771055239710493313410331473102828123101113616010011401699983615898894404975301159619722889583416294827102931140165922171314911554253902082342893013958488269238287197229686176125485221094698425108445833616975082198133381291044358042133552794617978578401747967750181841763124310877540164676745625610357320200854722828611097128227965704421797169522601133685230112896730333134766122541105651228912036418242109163111818016211177768611422696660133521560592444719705822475204657295752545569637917565578352164754553421469536236014335249312132451603601546504537315074918353153348295602510473854224234635645266745374882085445934614744389836360942538603522415479433654085122651083975117748693888735306537182865389936837303068354577832383454884359433731303578832303721563313455021713060817347229699784317288814385930279311594790262271320563025778963878246413195754231181052448322781279531421112117450942013513535399199897139351811015836552171111558664316128184478321599657288214528303539134385335451211117957307111231946781710109183975899129250511115875124253877206334114435616530561272651202837122064176376316332320035011498522866140262491729143”

4.2.2.4 Even Odd coding of rewriting with chapter level data

In the previous evidence in Chapter 4.2.2.3, I presented a key coding pattern based evidence that showed we can rewrite the full text of Quran by its chapter level natural text numbers, which are chapter, verses, words and letters. The evidence was observed in chapter level data considering all the 6348 verses. As per the general rules of any suitable key coding pattern evidence of the Main 19 System, we also need to test the even and odd coding pattern as the obligatory follow up coding tests for each successful key coding patterns. For the details about why we always test with the even and odd coding patterns as follow up test, one can read the Chapter 4.1.1. When I tested, I observed that there is also the even odd successful coding of Evidence 4.2.2.3. Therefore, I present that code as an evidence here.

When we test the even and odd coding pattern of the previous evidence of Chapter 4.2.2.3, we observe that it also exist over the full text of Quran considering 6236 numbered verses as presented below.

Considering all the 6236 numbered verses of Quran, here is the illustration of the coding pattern of the big coding representation number as shown below:

[Chapter 113 | Total Verses of Chapter 113 | Total Words of Chapter 113 | Total Letters of Chapter 113] [Chapter 114 | Total Verses of Chapter 114 | Total Words of Chapter 114 | Total Letters. of Chapter 114] . . . . . . . [Chapter 1 | Total Verses of Chapter 1 | Total Words of Chapter 1 | Total Letters of Chapter 1] [Chapter 2 | Total Verses of Chapter 2 | Total Words of Chapter 2 | Total Letters of Chapter 2]

Here the “|” symbol stands for the concatenation operation of the numbers of its both sides. The neighboring brackets also concatenated.

If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 113 | 5 | 23 | 73] [ 114 | 6 | 20 | 80] . . . . . . [1 | 7 | 29 | 143] [2 | 286 | 6140 | 26249]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

11352373 11462080 . . . . . . 1729143 2286614026249

1135237311462080 . . . . . . 17291432286614026249

Here is the proof with a reproducible R code that rewrites, namely decodes, the full text of Quran by the 4 different descriptor numbers first and then test this big number at the chapter level data.

x<- dfVCwl
tmp <- paste0(x$Chapter_index , x$Verse_sum , x$cwords , x$cletters)
ev<- which((x$Chapter_index %% 2) ==0)
od<- which((x$Chapter_index %% 2) !=0)
#tmp<-paste0(tmp1,tmp2)

ev<- tmp[ev]
od<- tmp[od]

tmp <- paste0(ev,od)
tmpr<- rev(tmp)

 cat("Head of the per verse representation numbers : ", head(tmpr))
## Head of the per verse representation numbers :  1146208011352373 1124154711152381 1103198010962799 10831043107725114 1064177710552397 10493313410331473
 cat("Tail of the per verse representation numbers : ", tail(tmpr))
## Tail of the per verse representation numbers :  12111179573071112319467817 10109183975899129250511115 875124253877206334114435 61653056127265120283712206 41763763163323200350114985 22866140262491729143
 tmpr <- paste0(tmpr, collapse = "")  
 cat("The test of divisibility by 19:")
## The test of divisibility by 19:
 cat(as.numeric(as.bigz(tmpr) %% 19)) #mod 19 test if "0"
## 0
 cat("Number of digits on this big number
     is ", nchar(tmpr))
## Number of digits on this big number
##      is  1205

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, Evidence 4.2.2.4 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself. In case if I find out Evidence 4.2.2.4 had been available in another article, which is very unlikely, then in such a case, I surely add a citation and update the online version of this book.

Let’s add it to the counters for probability calculation. We also tried it on 6348 verses, so 2 trials, 1 success.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  2
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

Also, here is the “1205” digits length big number of Evidence 4.2.2.4:

“11462080113523731124154711152381110319801096279910831043107725114106417771055239710493313410331473102828123101113616010011401699983615898894404975301159619722889583416294827102931140165922171314911554253902082342893013958488269238287197229686176125485221094698425108445833616975082198133381291044358042133552794617978578401747967750181841763124310877540164676745625610357320200854722828611097128227965704421797169522601133685230112896730333134766122541105651228912036418242109163111818016211177768611422696660133521560592444719705822475204657295752545569637917565578352164754553421469536236014335249312132451603601546504537315074918353153348295602510473854224234635645266745374882085445934614744389836360942538603522415479433654085122651083975117748693888735306537182865389936837303068354577832383454884359433731303578832303721563313455021713060817347229699784317288814385930279311594790262271320563025778963878246413195754231181052448322781279531421112117450942013513535399199897139351811015836552171111558664316128184478321599657288214528303539134385335451211117957307111231946781710109183975899129250511115875124253877206334114435616530561272651202837122064176376316332320035011498522866140262491729143”

4.2.3 Total natural numbers based key coding evidences

The key coding pattern for this code is the verse 83:20.

83:20 A numbered book it is. (Quran, Y.N Öztürk, kuranmeali.com)

We naturally ask the question as how it is numbered. This verse should show it. It turned out it shows it. This verse has 2 words and 9 letters.

83:20 كِتَـٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ

83:20 Kitabun marqoom

83+20+2+9 = 19x6 = 114 (number of chapters of Quran)

If we sum all of its natural numbers we witness that the resulting number is multiple of 19, which stands as key coding pattern. As per the rule, we will consider this as key coding pattern and apply it to full text of Quran. When I tested this key coding pattern, I witnessed that it also exist over the full text of Quran. Moreover, it also has its compulsory even and odd coding too. In this main chapter and in its chapters, I will present these codes.

This key coding pattern also exist when we look at the total numbers of Quran. However, that coding should be considered as supporting evidence to this key coding pattern described above regarding verse 83:20. As already described in the introduction of Chapter 4, the third key place to look for key coding patterns is the total natural numbers of the full text of Quran. It was like to look at the overall picture of the structure and see if there is an obvious key coding patterns exist in regard the over all numbers of the text. Similar to the Basmala based key coding patterns, the key coding patterns from the total numbers will be tested both in chapter and verse level data of the full text of Quran as there is no chance to make clear distinction to test in both chapter and verse level data.

Let me remind the total numbers of the full text of Quran in all the 6348 verses and in the numbered 6236 verses in the following:

Total numbers per text category in 6348 verses. : 114, 6348, 78245, 332837.

Total numbers per text category in 6236 numbered verses: 114, 6236, 77797, 330709.

4.2.3.1 Rewriting with the total numbers based key coding pattern at verse level

The key coding pattern we observed considering the totals of the natural number of the text is that the total number of chapters, verse, words and letters information is multiple of 19 considering the text type of all the 6348 verses as follows:

114 + 6348 + 78245 + 332837 = 417544.

417544 / 19 = 21976.

As a supportive evidence, we will also consider this as key coding pattern and apply it chapter and also verse level data too considering both text types. In this chapter, I will present the evidence code at the verse level data considering all the numbered 6236 verses. Basically, we first sum the chapter index, verse index, the number of words and the number of letters in that verse. This gives us the representation number of that verse. We then place those representation numbers where we see in the text as this is a rewriting test just as in the case of the Ultimate Evidence, Evidence 4.2.2.1. Namely, as per the rules we write from right to left whenever there is letters information in a single text type as we consider it rewriting of the full text. Then, we concatenate all the 6236 representation numbers and obtain the single representation number of the text of Quran considering only the numbered verses.

A numbered book it is. (Quran, 83:20, Y.N Öztürk, kuranmeali.com)

The same key coding pattern was also observed in verse and explained in detail in the second key code of Chapter 4.4.1, where it is shown that the sum of chapter verse, words and letters is exactly 114 and also multiple of 19 (83+20+2+9). We see this key coding pattern if strongly represented in the text of Quran.

Let me first remind the numbers by presenting the head and tail of the table of the numbered verses.

knitr::kable(head(nQuran), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.')
Table 4.7: Table head of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.
VerseI chapter verse vwords vletters text
1 1 1 4 19 بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم
2 1 2 4 18 الحمد لله رب العالمين
3 1 3 2 12 الرحمن الرحيم
4 1 4 3 12 مالك يوم الدين
5 1 5 4 19 إياك نعبد وإياك نستعين
6 1 6 3 19 اهدنا الصراط المستقيم 
knitr::kable(tail(nQuran), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table tail of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.')
Table 4.7: Table tail of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.
VerseI chapter verse vwords vletters text
6231 114 1 4 14 قل أعوذ برب الناس
6232 114 2 2 8 ملك الناس
6233 114 3 2 8 إله الناس
6234 114 4 4 17 من شر الوسواس الخناس
6235 114 5 5 20 الذي يوسوس في صدور الناس
6236 114 6 3 13 من الجنة والناس

Considering all the 6236 numbered verses of Quran, here is the illustration of the coding pattern of the big coding representation number as shown below:

[Chapter 114 + Last Verse of Chapter 114 + Total Words in Last Verse of Chapter 114 + Total Letters in Last Verse of Chapter 114] [Chapter 114 + Verse 5 of Chapter 114 + Total Words in Verse 5 of Chapter 114 + Total Letters in Verse 5 of Chapter 114] . . . . . . . [Chapter 1 + Verse 2 in Chapter 1 + Total Words in Verse 2 of Chapter 1 + Total Letters in Verse 2 of Chapter 1] [Chapter 1 + Verse 1 in Chapter 1 + Total Words in Verse 1 of Chapter 1 + Total Letters in Verse 1 of Chapter 1]

Here the “+” symbol stands for the sum operation of the numbers of its both sides. The neighboring brackets also concatenated.

If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 114 + 6 + 3 + 13] [ 114 + 5 + 5 + 20] . . . . . . [1 + 2 + 4 + 18] [1 + 1 + 4 + 19]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

136 144 . . . . . . 25 25

136144 . . . . . . 2525

Here is the proof with a reproducible R code that rewrites, namely decodes, the full text of Quran by the sum of the 4 different descriptor numbers first and then test this big number.

x<- nQuran
tmp <- x$chapter + x$verse + x$vwords + x$vletters

tmpr <- rev(tmp)
cat("Head and tail of the representation numbers of verses after ordering as rewriting:")
## Head and tail of the representation numbers of verses after ordering as rewriting:
head(tmpr)
## [1] 136 144 139 127 126 133
tail(tmpr)
## [1] 29 29 20 18 25 25
tmpr <- paste0( tmpr, collapse = "")
print("Test if mod 19 is 0:")
## [1] "Test if mod 19 is 0:"
as.bigz(tmpr) %% 19 
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
cat("The number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmpr))
## The number of digits on this big number is 17790

As we see the remainder is 0 and thus is multiple of 19. It has a similar approach to Evidence 4.2.2.1 but using the second type of the text of the numbered verses and also sum operation to get the representation number of each verse.

In Evidence 4.2.2.1, we had witnessed that we could rewrite Quran by concatenating the 6348 representation numbers of each verse at the verse level. In this key coding pattern based evidence, Evidence 4.2.3.1, we also witnessed a similar rewriting coding, also in the second type of the text with 6236 verses.

At the verse level, we could also use the text type of 6348 verses and also with the chapter level data. Therefore, we have 4 trials and one success for this key coding pattern based evidence to add to the counters.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  4
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, Evidence 4.2.3.1 is also first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself.

You can access this “17790” digits length big number from the following link:

https://github.com/quran2019/Quran19/blob/master/6.1.6_Evidence.txt

One can just copy the big number and paste it into a web based big number calculator and test it herself.

Also, here is the “17790” digits length big number:

“1361441391271261331381421361281321361311251281361351331381321501501351331381351361291301301251281301291371241351301311431311351191281311321311381261291331271291291261261231671241111361311211321241201211181221281211291261281341361251141101351281411291261281191181181171161341341431211221221221242101561861971581151291671251471261231241401281251301431321281231301191211221171231241161161171201281231521221311161081121171171171171131121121121241241231191161191201221161101011241381381311251231281251281191301171141201141111161101171111091221511411191201181171221131141141131121101061261471281611251201291111221181161131161171171211191071111101311341431401341391391641351361301321351301551641201251211211171291261111191161081061019713312913812812712812812812713611811711611711511811111011311911911010810310711012412912212712011712512211411111610913410910810910510310713011311811411211511511911211312010811311510210810312012212612811512211511611711611417517414414212510810710710110210515912612812813712212211811611612311612010811112311611511713610610810210310214913715314014815113615613412614712813412512511911412113113212013013513612411811210310911811798114115121971441251221181151161151111061101121131111231101041021041011501321311191291281271211151261191151141101121131111101091071031081051041031021011029714513314313313514713012613613013212312212312012412512512912311911711511811311810610610710610510610498106105999910610397911701481391401511401601391361281361391371321261341301321241371301351241131141101181191191191261121101121151101211021041011029998979695203158188172137143124125124126136129127131115120132120113119123123128119107113122110114109107106102100105989410196911491451551431541411441551371431361391461331351301301251311341341361241491171231201211131191201151151121101111141011021041041031021029697969594931591581451601511381271421321361691321511171291201361301431161311221351281251221241211181371281491451351361371271231301221221261241181141221221171131141101161121171131171071151201099711410294971031081081071019718514214215116613814214914813814114113814013212713113013414212212612412211741211911511811811112012311310810210910610510411610510499107105106103102939692908785905001321231331261501351131081251221271131071171041079994891651561321441521751461251261421291381351191451511341291391451291211351241111171181351851491441621381601111541151161191161251251021101361071141159917110310915810410213716716216215015213614413313512613313013513815212412112712111112112010411210911099106989811210296130100991018993921329293911421361431441371431361331411331411431281221271281271291281311391151101141151181131491411051041081141391191381151041191111161171131189815910810197928177144193148167169141148136166174157155128166128128122129134148149128127129131110122114124113124104103121981451021231029810195999893125898891949489147158168159136129130157148142156163123144134155115127126114127157141114114152123153133110174198224149314136202170183212128139198263164113151187249138215162229281116143175126184123146149144222133158168135144125124141129179165178180157148193121128163182159181167123157195115110177127275124165159130144134152228191122105106116173284186384191180145158134337138143330178188145182137139167136160132190129160227198233183269180137126136287114352122123164166154127123164210185239167192271275143162203172186150193201314171248149153169211296201144142219151190229200123257152149153127107231109113106173172162162180172174167168167167176159162164163157156148148157154151162164152160165150138134156150137156161155145131138132129133129130137135128121159132127117112112127112110108105108110102110101989696971131031121021018797951011029794868784838285979682797778717674166155163153157151149149141147146145141143128141134139143137136135157133159131131129124127115125125123125130120142118129116129114132112183110108108129106115971031161011049997949697949698919196851048489828071706863136132128129137136126146126135124123141139119130111119143124120135107122134104109122123108120129941129510711810110790989894113969011510510996849394948113512713113513712213412912112114611912512012012311612911611511511711011911410811611210510324517315313414813616298962009396949398919285848586858685747873747674766913115115114013614413713411912611613912412612212111412311611712012011311210611511610717611210611694133959792878380827477737271676660149162143147140136129131162152138136128132136135140129134129132121131131122118108109115110121128126105106123109120101959510191991139110488858574767876737470696867161139126131127120150155141155116113119110111122118120124127961011001291009911210211213711110986991068711483119121969987107681221611461732061762222591222329221115211410314617213038015022323229216812413413517511117120221623513711316524718811488103191165165741267324412516115215114618613615512713312215315111111412412821115314510219127812212818911314899911107772256149148912151771861611521741731641302421451631371341872221171472041612991121241491521751531781261061331851368350132126172154132177147150132141134159154168186136168104143131188148115134134134109146110124701161599285824912313613315812612112911011911911812412010211110010212312911212712614310911995113111110114118989587921019695919410710210495948992888088721019683787089614816416617519420418217616916318214916216615414614914915719814714615415115916615220214115914715416314212714014015314017913015115912815615411913012611613413114212512814311217021112611812011097118111141170122105131140104118971048016011511610911490907891818260471662301921501682321781602371781211651271531161551391691221091451091351231501351541441301792121951691591081781221472402002451231611261271401611131569498484614618616116125314414122314417624415414213020819314618513812916313891158183165144133130190124119167158129102911461651831721031611351331269892137138858466452121872052511551911712731891661721911431411491631581642552021722231431552031751531801622121601181421481551791551451881601371461911581321911391241941261912091411061401221972531281531711051001382101379314011713013499120129129132114140202981641091137744208202226165295150197206209135180144170138161178153151137161174158198165173143193141208178178142150214175119128261129147144114114144107891681021211361141372281582111591061371281331588090799016617720320321917212220196751471481701611431451471411391471451401581821461371551501431491221201481541291371481501541451151191191171201171161311151161321181151391501371121361061121019911513712010712310410812614515121710523113617696978299110949881949279106851119310783968868582422372462342332502322322292332282422292302332222222202272212202152202172522232112042092142122142222202092162102072092062022012021981952001901941941921921911851891881851921951841831841811781811811801811861772081811711661631681621681801641632671571581651691731561541501541461601451401451461501531421421371411401411381381431431341391331351291301301341411271301261281231211301111261171181101311121181161021091151021069895969810010510110111212095100939911392999384808196104928791757195797471651068267916780845655545116216219417116216616615714814814414716914716014116215716912912514212516012411512213112614313815413612612812119913513710812110712014911912111914111612412997123125103124971008482132979311310212181861211189512011390108998179615656534020222921517917124019812720516113912513818714711015615817895140119741357677792257580108148191202195177137159117112118931451241601601351311301571201151501931521362411711461351661261941321161362611502401151001281211171031371641751461091591519414114318415318010811017712411812296981921221192142151771521901461541661391331731501341992131701671662441374501952564122081511211141241201549411715614616831418532113721316614214914015613415214814514915813617824213315412111612117711686135162911372111921926890109931169715114511311812811811116812289108115128124127135961111157385761171521197337192217177149135182111157107136921331341601921061191351541871381131311101738386121127779153563613912918313819215218915213913117012622118217613712214514315317717815613914311810415211811817413519815495136160131132154101123958111597759573811132231589189769272433515417918413717417319815516715411819012113415312715919115915715114218421218412812212617722115016011215610112517514414592184128161111198149125127901401081121911149012811414583190881481188791869981341981911881982051922491911942062362362421901501762081961711321681481361321691931381811691891762071471721591511221141931392081791711721371621281221291312031521541531331031851521601931301941131851171861051011431991349010322910112312086122122112149101104136785333182195198182167204198192153181163195178163141147129162149140148140135138145154147151163188192175198218147122130156140128113134130115158127138147143209125142127241137123137148109135125122869998113898812814510311010210317615096139126110841308413171105115688586864858364278280274276270278267264263267275275262282261264258255268262257254249251255263255256252267243237247239242243253266238259256238244260232242257225222229228227237236215219217220220237244218241209206218208211235206220221229206211201196206196187198222190187200186192219180186207190172178187177180182180204172169181167174184168179193164187162163171168168156186154151163153156166161141144148147150145140145154146138137141139134142138139141147129126128125132124128134120123131125118120130110119109159114133102112101107100991031091211311101928997921101271029913010592938310310493918887801001029080769975881047784926881816982645776617183788586625131159132153176153148140180138200150115148121161150145159173148140110149138157117109127130141132981431391141521211501041081441191111181031411161061138811310496909510815016112415112691103858983831148511511894861111421197919623430547621018935114513629020317013117615710813115612820612224510816920518413416712931013232215648313514016115516510910412819323091148808811012511611610716581799377128831411181748517722119218618017816617818420715816817417016118316117720416014315316415214914215321814413917313615013514416515313216013915915615115414312514118514512614311513912313114714612413810810911211311310112411613813210899115113115171100961209086114112821099619212484859712822073881771267012592111110916661162647069516264678153515251413431741491531362462591741701411261731412151431551611581541231751281491571861652071221211111261431881421288710916524511611716821314816510999155176105164114140180931651086271127221163851441258696159761078884873598181132731861691711931821581561902071921701691541641722131641551761501541802221641572141441471901551661811561861741711601311861921401421251311311311401311291321221251201221241201451141141041291181111151201711261231651331261311161379610314611510511210012214911412383931141497210876721101059179816592698676838010170987911176602162522192232442551932322091921812032311712212061661671991871822162091851751781851971531441641831561661581591761692491941372051351481571951651681972381501461291461831901231431841571511491681872321351641151111471361361631171551091201521191101241221661189710891113175100110102871017622517484818273676867646072606759656766938065579960838489617855116486564824861425024177171167142134160141130162126131152134137135152140141126138132143170217137182135133126134138134124152162124138137142141235951161241321081141211151421361111321221131261271031011161161149812396978611091969998139879111370112887975988777656373878785938463898944452624421315718317520318215119917715017618015821017421017512313817612016916422011414614828314815919015622215313117213912516914313311811213214612518614113914012817022318417514013214814120521714512814418810811115997135139921281161061151121342001082042051141488811773224213107248167196133126129907866105795980819755371047222123916116821217717719616920221519423120025517118618422817416415417320014316617015216516914316715416914716615213716613917318519515717515112619613115814921518916717613815514015712219391120116159164132169961201121271418611512611913916291120107114107101981071041738499941001241001151356910216879781138515791115946088134184208207254232200189179190225215158248237200182259193209159191198240184180204187201166166162207191183212194271216203232176156212157165145133232240181184183230221142166207201180202151163168158157168166196146159120114141111118124127130105137148102971441351358815310311914511320220110316212412915697145162149125891011047687668367589115191114114867981966069586210468141143147153132142125129130130130181145125183129120133131125127122116109116138110116117113106112108130156106114971011101041051001081091121031138892961011128185978210980791107573818074988780718910077827288731128977976958757477615567606071646754586454471391111011011221141231371931111291021021201311911231171249917815210968104143102106112137267207571031441096257811211211662002178580163126112109841031351441381249215414317515611422411328817788104126129155741231551017410517625426294161131761809157949112915515514115689240220273204192155177162147185239328180154157200140165173161151209150223201158158160183158183268154169197244143117145140115162159220218190217159163162108117160118111157108141134123202176111128130176118105185142159211107180187190969713014720613393968512514913114986203831251211285212073926678106949256149969595514022315418221720618117126316220720718117521121721219016316214018716923015616116416214415320920618420014720127220115018523213316224013214622514915611314415814413916715813512716813416318217821115613214417015010114614116312814215415014015712715816314611117110214111412211012992116196891551401808880107115678215591152213108102105117145809078134176971205113757581752282261871622411681911851771842231481441592112361771362451612581961271531592001321721391211811461341681991871582511521231991531911271549811825416516212214593139169117127111125162951181341621061091101261071491301521231711249210118211995145182124912751722391371141171809510920276127153125100108541039213916815513738207211236207200233227255225380178285262203203233226246331195246226257181215196193202231262248194191178210265207214229196167187153195184182229142235217201145168131148
