2424152932415115514150166441491352414821854147155941461568414511434144228341431143414225974141177641401876413911484138145441372610741361877413583241341040413336148413212414131155741301258412983341288344127155841267304125416412419814123728412211444121125941201040411913614118341324117207741163112041152080411410384113136741121260411117614110198541096214108929410752341069314105229541042410541033412241023112641013613841002310540991663409833126409710454096629409541940944174093518409210364091731409041740894204088423408741840864174085624408462340835204082103440811554408062840794224078936407793240768274075933407431340734114072737407111404070621406963040681038406711404066114540651038406441540634204062421406151940607214059521405842240577354056522405562340548384053528405252640518484050145440491046404862640471146404662240457284044421404342040428334041154940409394039630403811424037629403673340359504034136640331670403231122403193340303213740291560402823934027730402663340255204024736402311444022832402110354020722401973640188344017624401610484015731401415504013103840121251401183240101044400910374008622400741540064194005419400431640036234002315400141440006303999217399831739974143996419399531639945293993418399242039916223990315398931639883153987620398651639854173984314398341939824173981104739805243979414397821039774143976420397541939745213973629397252939714203970626396952239684213967622396652139654193964419396352039624183961317396042239593143958418395741939564183955419395441939534143952419395141939503183949524394852839475183946419394542139444193943417394242139413233940323393942439385293937521393610483935527393441939333163932314393141939303153929520392873139274193926419392528100392431639235163922623392152939207323919419391841839173163916420391541339146263913315391231139114163910418390952239086253907516390641839053153904419390341939025203901419390042038995253898526389741938965243895420389452238934183892420389152038907233889632388842138876233886422388562338844213883519388262838813133880626387951938785213877415387673438754193874723387352438723133871420387072438693163868519386731438663123865314386441638634193862623386142238605223859633385810383857420385652538554203854625385310363852521385162838505243849417384841438473173846729384573838447273843624384272838414163840215383973538386213837419383641738353133834124638337283832417383193738305183829631382873538273123826213382521338242113823419382283538211034382014633819114438181037381711413816114238159363814730381373138126293811633381012503809833380812433807730380610493805946380411573803524380252138018363800523379914503798425379751637966233795732379472837931142379210393791135337901039378973337888353787730378624923785114237841145378362237829333781623378083537791558377873737778393776937377513563774837377310443772105037716233770114537691247376883037671347376672737658303764419376351737621558376183137607293759114637589383757125537565233755628375415553753115737528383751145837501254374983637481251374710453746830374573037443173743313374231437412133740123739419373825973737301203736261113735198337341976373333132373224100373110443730251083729187237281455372711453726135737252199372416653723837372216763721177837202294371972737181367371712483716412371516623714416371341837124213711341383710518370962337081147370718813706281153705281273704341153703241083702177637012591370013623699135836981563369711433696228536951968369424100369341936921557369110383690936368910353688165736878293686726368517523684248936831459368211473681341303680187736791358367810513677207336769453675231003674134936738393672145436713416036701569366932143366810413667730366612543665124836641146366393536621762366122853660269336592170365810453657198736561782365583536541675365320743652271093651198736502710736491251364813533647291053646166636451661364416663643114636421050364132123364018683639176736384193637159336361892363514593634940363317713632837363184636301255362983336287293627156236261243362563436241987362322993622126736211463362014633619301263618113936177029436162585361535137361462267361323103361212583611833361062936098383608835360713653606316360583536041766360313613602227536014819636002492359930223359814563597251223596208135951464359417693593146435921679359113613590167735891674358816723587187535861885358517653584231023583351553582146835812480358015573579135535781460357726105357613583575636357416763573229835728423571178035702914335692812635682812735676263566124335651461356441935635263562114435617303560177535591869355811453557105235561459355513513554949355321953552125935518313550134635491156354815663547146435461666354516753544114235431455354214603541825354010363539632353817633537249235361866353583135341335334193532271003531311223530229235291968352816583527259735261141352521783524104035231565352273035211564352015663519218735183011135171145351616543515186935142582351329112351217763511155435101870350914543508271053507835350683935051667350418723503833350294735013163500419349913349841934971039349683234951976349494234932086349212553491248134901455348911463488941348719713486103734852811534841887348317833482115134819393480165634791457347815673477228534762287347516723474155734731562347210433471634347018713469114534689483467229234661660346527113346418793463831346216653461218534601464345913673458208334571140345614603455839345462834531158345294334515263450943344952634488323447136034463215234452298344410443443114234428333441124634408313439293438133437419343694734351765343415733433636343216643431156534302284342914503428136434271253342652534251786342472834239403422135634216383420126534191991341815643417166234161459341513523414198934132511234122189341110453410842340912433408198834072812434061369340516773404739340317743402730340112503400239033991667339815703397627339623103339514573394188733931244339227117339120763390136033891759338883233871972338613473385135233842711833831356338264033811669338011613379188633786373377311203376743337521903374127033731042337212453371104333701156336910403368133367419336619633365166033641559336319663362187533611467336026113335917653358167033572178335628102335526105335429109335317703352840335113623350218733491978334815583347728334614583345114233447353343633334213643341188433408403339177533381566333720823336177333352597333413503333157433321265333115553330834332962933282392332713493326261063325188633242077332318813322135233211675332010483319944331810513317125233162910833151869331417733313157533121457331193333102510033092073330820823307271093306155933052911033041148330326106330215503301271083300114432991042329819763297331193296167232959363294134632933814832921049329117653290166432891037328817673287186732861363328522923284125532831259328219853281938328041932791332784193277115132761561327517633274135232731140327218713271186632701564326983332681357326711423266167032651456326411453263728326283432614213260124732591037325883132571038325693232557303254932325394032521247325194432501444324914573248197832472082324616703245218932442710432431249324263132417393240155832391147323883932375283236114432359433234731323314683232104232311351323013613229135832282811032271243322614593225124732243813632231655322211473221136032201669321983932181361321712533216135032155233214834321393332121147321172832108273209146232081777320711423206144732059453204124432032410632022085320194332001977319915693198115831978363196197231951135319420743193728319214563191166531907283189104331881045318794731863163185624318441931831992318252131817223180321317942331785173177625317641731753163174415317342031727263171628317031931699343168419316752231664183165416316472731636233162520316141931602173159418315852231577293156524315562531545233153935315241731513133150522314941631484203147521314682931451041314451931439373142935314152231405293139942313832131376293136114031353173134414313362031324223131521313082931296313128314312741831263183125520312452131239353122114131214233120114031193173118414311772431164183115521311410413113320311273131119313110113831095223108627310742031063173105526310441831033113102521310111403100317309941430987253097316309652130951044309431330935183092936309162330902103089316308852430873173086420308542330845213083114030823173081414308072430793153078521307782930764183075628307494030735163072936307151630704193069725306862430675263066317306511403064317306341430627243061418306052130598293058726305731130564143055419305441930536213052419305131630504213049728304862230473183046318304562030446193043417304262430415223040623303962630388313037418303641630354193034417303362330323193031522303062830294173028520302762830266233025419302452130238293022315302152330203163019135730186203017838301621430154233014314301342030123153011315301041930095253008835300711433006727300521963004312300342030023173001831300094829997262998625299712512996732299552229945242993416299273429918352990726298962629886242987723298651929858372984939298373029825232981520298094029795212978832297711462976625297573229741038297352029727322971733297062329698352968620296741629668322965521296482929631139296283829611143296011452959627295841929571329564192955124529545262953944295213642951104529509422949935294816692947836294622852945114729444202943114729425272941126129401350293911482938136129371772293613522935144429345242933145529321247293115642930733292972629289432927104629261355292511492924522292316572922155529219372920176829191144291816692917733291683729151369291494929139422912114829118372910156929091149290810412907114829067282905124929049442903739290273429019382900105128991985289820962897156528962187289516682894104028931350289283828919422890937288983928881762288794228861765288516702884125128839472882166628812292288019732879944287841928772286287627120287539180287476315287323103287219872871502192870115328698482868381732867231022866177628651045286418832863166728627282861114828601570285911472858311062857104428563814028557352854218328533310828522299285114582850198728491455284848203284713612846482172845178328447835028431566284217702841228728401985283916992838114928379472836136828352612128343515028339382832208528317312830938282914562828167028271563282614652825125928242810228239382822937282111502820937281917812818114328171994281618732815261222814951281341928127292811186328101142280984028089342807834280672428058362804843280314612802522280173128008372799834279862827971047279663027951043279416652793830279251727917262790936278972727886262787620278663227852480278452627835222782144827815212780833277952227788292777124727768402775622277410472773730277210482771124427708442769114527688382767524276693727651675276410422763727276210422761421276094127597282758836275714472756124927557332754104527535212752523275172527507272749728274851927479392746833274512522744114827436302742424274173827407372739839273819852737727273662527358482734522273351927321241273110422730419272994227287322727251112726145527256242724725272383727221562272132138272051927191030271826104271717632716421271515662714940271313562712135627111041271052227095182708211042707622270672827056292704315270352527025282701730270010422699421269842026975212696521269531426944192693441992692126326911041269011452689931268829122268729136268618632685186026849412683729268217672681104326802710126791245267815552677176026761560267516562674735267318772672841267112592670166426692189266816742667271062666841266584126649312663114526621460266123972660146126591151265841826579362656178526553514826541045265313442652208926512712826501576264920892648114326479362646218126452410026448462643209426421451264116762640251082639938263822982637125226364152635623263417692633371442632221022631938263022852629177226281041262714482626251012625935262415612623134526221243262113462620702622619114426181244261722862616104026154192614104326138292612832261113502610114226095252608623260712522606166626051157260493826039382602726260193526001142259920752598103725977322596124925956302594833259311572592199225911143259084025892383258863125877342586166925851041258412512583146525821045258114722580146125791261257812512577629257616752575158325748392573842257252925718332570735256993425681142256793625667372565939256473225638352562732256183425608372559735255813552557731255683125555252554114525539372552733255183725508432549208325481247254711462546188225451455254413502543135625421045254116612540730253983725381772253710492536104025351147253483925331357253218802531135125301559252962925288382527155325262282252562225241352252372725225262521135725201353251911422518735251783725166242515104825147292513104425128372511845251094225091459250883525071458250610442505157225041142250373125024192501115025001979249913532498125924971875249620852495935249417672493125024928382491828249012472489187024886232487156524861452248562124847222483134924829422481113624801765247914622478114224779352476103824751244247413562473620247231524717322470124724696272468836246773024668312465134424641239246328104246216622461517246020712459418245882824579372456176824551244245412482453157524522710524519362450933244962024489352447176524461575244551924448372443186924421249244110462440134224391461243819762437261152436837243516592434621243351924321249243112392430104224291367242853024271559242662324258332424146024238342422628242184124209392419197424181135241752124169292415517241410352413218724127272411103524108302409519240883124072132406351302405229324046202403519240262024014142400211239931223983122397310239628239551823942102393416239231023915152390518238941923881140238773223865202385414238413482383518238210372381103923801144237952323789372377519237618682375415237482923737302372124423714192370631236941523685232367122366419236514462364104523639432362523236141723601038235962423584162357944235641423554202354937235352423526272351725235094123496332348833234752223469312345728234483923431362234225982341935234016742339836233893423378292336103623358432334103823338312332125623311861233093323291146232811462327125123261152232529129232431623238332322941232111482320729231973623181041231793723161460231514552314103523131354231212462311104023101450230916502308835230783423061246230511482304114723038352302165323019342300936229962922981149229783422961038229512402294114122931876229283522911038229014572289524228815572287113822869322285830228411512283104222829342281626228062522798342278114622771345227614432275145222741345227383022721352227114522270517226951922681522674192266249222651868226462522631048226294222611466226011492259525225814652257114722565272255114822541549225383522521977225112492250207822491351224831022476232246155322453102244135022431346224225912241292240103422399382238351482237940223610512235177622341248223324103223213462231929223016642229103822288272227156522261243222510362224824222362122221137222112512220934221920852218124922171149221613492215843221419752213301182212189222111983221014542209105122081365220713592206261112205281222204166322031152220213672201231022200937219911392198207921978302196156221951963219482821931657219212502191124121901350218911502188147021872812321861248218528129218430129218315542182238121818372180175821797252178331512177321422176135621753817321742210921733412721721980217118752170197821691148216893921677302166166121651042216462721631144216211462161165821606272159313215815692157114221564192155217221542290215353021528352151187021509452149946214814612147940214616672145197821441463214323922142147121412711421401147213914602138155821372692213612532135114521341037213314532132197621319302130135021291454212811402127125321261357212593621241456212312462122146021211142212013602119124821189372117136321161139211515702114178121132287211215572111187321101454210993521081996210710412106156421051358210425113210321922102187421011884210013522099156820981455209716712096944209525100209451920939452092942209119762090198220891258208821872087630208613482085104420841159208318672082724208113482080165720791156207817712077229020768342075135920741248207313552072125020719482070104520691253206812512067251082066936206511502064124520631252206218712061135320601468205921822058731205713592056231162055843205494220531671205211492051231102050115720491776204813602047931204612572045219520444192043832204214512041125320402291203917752038124920379422036735203511432034197120331566203252020312294203022842029135720289442027241072026155120251865202472720231156202213622021249420201152201912482018166920171356201617672015941201410412013840201218762011156420101557200919832008176820073213120062089200516812004241032003135920021043200119912000114519991451199873919976291996251101995251191994186819931575199219711991291091990271031989104219881562198721981986229219852074198424931983135419821565198117691980166119791463197817721977177119762396197512581974196519739371972734197112571970634196910381968124319671148196612511965732196414581963176719628311961728196016671959126319581561195752519561878195510371954115319531873195214461951281221950321181949104319482291194712641946156719452090194484419431982194221981941218619401569193994019381349193711551936732193510411934625193310391932727193142219301149192921100192813491927157119261671192513471924104419239481922145919217311920840191983019187361917186819169421915419191452219136241912728191183419103191909627190831419073191906420190542119045211903156319027361901519190014691899624189831918976301896530189552518945281893524189251918913151890521188984118883191887524188662518855231884418188362318824221881940188014621879423187872918774161876520187562918746241873626187252318718291870732186983518687281867937186641818655221864626186383018621040186131718605201859830185842018571141185651918554201854104618534181852417185162418506241849520184811391847931184672718454221844936184312451842728184183318407251839742183862918371263183611421835834183411521833729183252118317371830836182993918287261827523182683318257281824729182393918228341821937182072718198311818739181773018166251815419181413601813103618126311811632181010501809114218081251180714641806261091805945180413601803839180293918011354180018611799261141798155817971355179615611795943179425107179321861792125317914211790125017891884178813491787125517861559178517831784441871783341381782518178114561780229017791662177872517775231776104317751678177417781773291121772331431771371571770135017691148176826117176721861766197517651676176414541763167217624191761156417601871175916681758135817578321756218217551974175425101175319891752145317513913917501355174951193174828106174783817461152174519671744167417432394174273017411572174019101173913541738734173715581736271181735421821734451881733115517322710717311986173094217293512117281454172753017261558172515561724209017232511217222711117212410117202611517191560171841917172394171619791715291231714176717131459171273017111149171010361709626170814571707211051706471691705145517049351703939170220721701627170012471699125616981146169793916962384169510391694221011693218116921347169112491690135116891870168811531687187216863713916851350168416631683248416823312316811145168062516791248167812441677527167615651675166216743011016732811116722488167126114167017661669177116681474166762916661035166517721664939166373516621772166183316601461165915541658124716572911016562292165511391654155316531457165222961651115016508411649251051648187016472086164632127164510461644261041643261121642271151641113816401041163917681638198416373213116361873163510421634134316331036163219681631238916301976162923911628943162732138162694216251777162418731623198016224201621177616209381619135416188341617124316161668161514591614155716137301612251061611166316101663160916641608631160752216064191605167316043181603941160217691601156116001042159983515982611015977291596146815951766159412461593104315921872159120771590187515891557158893715871036158652015851657158412441583249415829361581942158094615791044157863115771037157618861575208215741665157319791572937157123781570361371569218215681142156715741566271101565831156412571563301181562113015611343156027109155913481558155415575221556114815551460155413481553948155218681551156315501244154984115481873154711471546187015452385154422831543281111542176815411250154014611539218115381865153772815361665153516611534188215331452153218631531197515301972152919631528247615271556152619841525238615242073152311481522269415211042152019731519115515181758151712521516186615151038151414591513311231512103815112392151020811509291131508114015079351506116115051467150472715039411502241001501115015002310014993914614981665149714621496166414951875149427951493104814921356149111471490229314893112714881664148719851486828148525981484935148310361482419148111451480238714792485147816551477938147627100147510451474156414731460147214531471156014702194146983314688301467104414662285146524109146414611463728146227118146111511460291311459168314585261457104814561352145522851454733145317641452103914516261450167714491148144810381447146914462293144517871444166014433413614421359144193514402596143915611438259014371042143615651435421143410361433421411432197614312073143010441429156314285221427165814262184142511431424135214231139142212531421228114207301419124914181563141720871416104214151145141411471413156014121245141119811410166614092283140817601407299714061763140510391404114814032711414021663140110461400188913992711813981672139711451396431981395261131394411661393228413921668139117711390291231389145413881865138739138138610421385178713842710413831886138214661381157413806301379157113781462137723101137628126137529113137426991373522137241913711554137014601369217913681656136712541366188213651778136422102136318771362521991361941136031127135927109135817611357186113562288135520841354161091353371741352156113512710113502386134924117134812541347168513461667134516651344177413432299134225128134127113134016711339166913381459133718881336301321335198613342390133326103133217801331135613301476132911461328188213271674132618711325251121324843132327118132225103132120931320114713191567131893713171252131646190131512621314241071313241321312261251311321681310167913091910513081667130713641306177313051664130412551303261141302221181301198213001662129911441298104512971781129622951295124712942293129314561292166512911563129016641289178612881571128714701286147712851352128423113128315711282431761281167012802912212793113412783616012771984127629139127514601274156412732310212722310712712912312702811312691240126818831267239612663317012652097126483112631044126216801261241101260239912591883125824102125711451256115912552093125418791253136812521039125113561250167712492310512481874124726133124622981245321351244146412439411242229512411885124013571239452091238135412372594123611461235103912342078123326107123227115123193712302076122912531228125012273313412268351225145512241043122312441222103812211782122018681219177412189371217136712161874121536140121417761213136712121361121119881210208812093514912083315012071046120616661205165912041881120321981202135812012193120012521199197211981769119716741196198211951048119412611193199511921358119121951190114911891039118883611871254118624971185626118421861183208111821254118163011801358117923103117822991177186711761152117573311742310111731151117211471171114711706341169178211681889116741911661148116516691164841116323891162731116112501160104411597321158125211571047115693911552699115414641153125611527331151728115012551149291251148281041147371531146104011452288114411401143518114284011417311140146911393012211381042113794711363013211351364113452711331564113226104113119791130105211294017211281477112719801126114111251879112419811123271181122177311212093112043200111983211183214111174322211163012911154117011141563111314591112156911111146111039172110918741108228911071363110636153110520891104156511034116511022310911011885110094010991036109824991097291391096116010951143109423901093138010921247109122941090104710892288108816761087211001086166610855221084841108319771082312108142010803171079425107862510771141107611551075114010745221073114610724161071734107073010699321068626106762410661136106518651064934106316711062941106123102106019791059104410589381057940105618851055188210541359105316641052135910516331050125310494215910482293104719831046241071045381561044840104373610421354104111461040135310391563103863310371666103683710352396103425113103335132103213661031251071030177110292711310287301027113910261458102516571024147110231359102211441021113910209321019217610181772101729123101615651015835101432145101338146101210451011199510102087100915681008147210071362100618871005104810042811010033615010021570100110421000231049991462998401619973715799611589951974994114799329110992261119911664990167898916699882294987311389862083985734984124898312549822813098152698025105979177097812549771566976736975416974521973135097217579711673970114896911569689459676279666369651246964104396314579621350961149604199592186958291049578329569399551666954166495319779523713895135144950146194984494817759471775946351499454218094427118943836942371429411351940281229393912893840167937231069361670935311459342083933229593226117931209693031128929197592872792718719269379251038924281349238389223615192110419209419192811091829118917156991624100915209691412599133011691210409111139910186390911489082310590712629062395905221009041360903219090225103901135390013448998448981559897943896165389518658941568893441878921359891166989012628891769888291288874920188622102885441718841666883178188216598819568808448797348782110087714588761152875229387425928731253872186587118698701554869950868145886724106866838865391608644517586312478622310386152186093285927105858103685717738561248855177185422958533111385214598512277850217484963584827108847157184625105845176584428103843843842156484114568402390839942838207983714638361157835124683415628331771832228283119678301050829281148282290827146682613608252711182419768239398221660821176882011478193213381810418171243816125781514548141368813371378127328111756810936809929808249280793780625100805104180413568039448021353801166680031138799125379811427971252796144979514697944197931142792241027911147790291087894515378817707872297786156678522867841361783642807821559781229978026128779522137782086777241007762185775934774261007731673772114577193777027119769208676851196767241047662411676513727642092763168276245205761125276018697597407581467757166375621897552612875415707531978752104275117717502490749165874825987478407462596745341397441978743198974220927413112974025947392410473812627374721873613677351363734166873327110732217773112547302410972911487281368727381587261580725281167242310472310457223313672151228720166671926117718311407174119571615687152611371468281713197171214497111364710124970924887081468707135270634140705401627042610670393870213567011664700249969914626981352697176969621100695187569415706932392692291076913013469042157689188068824926872511968632141685452076842410768374068210476812711768019866796228167843201677311376766127867553242674249767341967250191671157367012506692612966818876675421666624996651144664125066311436621361661156666014586592513165826136657147365614606551457654832653341286526316512210365019906493716264817786478436462210064514496441453643114864218926411145640188563916586381991637361616363313763514716346286332078632291306313816363014626291249628104062732129626114362522102624291266234017862212456211773620166661920726182195617732616735615211096148366131143612206761120816102697609331356081454607114660613506051979604218260314546027306011567600229459920106598622815972396596311225951040594126459327128592837591331725904017058916705886023558732162586361685852812858422885831761582155758122775802287579301355781356577241015761249575187357436143573482045722098571311395702193569197556817635671149566728565189256432156362756227107561197756023105559166555816735571565556301255552913255425102553201005522095551113855018805491037548114354720945461040545145454420695432912154238177541944540146453949205538146153712435361555535156853418855331578532321585312292530401925291988528271085271256526135352524995248345231360522146152158264520421855195426551817635171149516178351535157514241065132090512147051122107510135550918795088829950771271506136350515715041370503199150237186501167950014584992811549816824972912549641949511574943012149321854927304917294904318848914584882095487114548621100485115748493848320864822199481241084802399479125547828120477937476229547530122474361464731774472125347122874701154469156446817774671569466114746519784641354463167446233151461947460207345925107458832457135345621684551875454301214537284521453451371574502189449752914482510644740166446198444562644413644431050442198744121884402499439271074381251437136043663343524105434941433629432135443115704302310442913714281155427529426527425136242416614231245422943421176842015694191360418104741712574161149415218841428127413311254122398411187741094040915844081459407351524061148405231134041144403114940210434011781400146539914703983415739713543961774395156939420773931350392259939110423901147389114438824993871556386249138514623841143383937382947381188338013523792912637814623777293763314637513673742812037329120372271163719363703614436983436832115367177936611523659393641354363136636214613612075360167035932129358628357155435625114355725354154735373235211593511360350311323496303489463472086346834345198034445187343535342237934173334021913392081338837337136033620803351763334209233315523323513833124109330186632972732811483271147326146232526963242279323271133222186321259232015533191565318208131711503161888315261223142610731318723126543111150310241073092412530829116307943306146830516663041347303155430246197301135030011372991874298115329772429613295419294491962932711829228103291321382901295512891554288145228717722861454285198728411452834518628217792813013428028112279208927815572771665276136827530125274351482732712327239174271114427024922692497268391482676724926643169265241182642410226350189262228726152208260941259271222581577257602402563011425543165254542172531669252938251281062507312496342482711624715652468442453514024425111243472002422512224164288240331472394520323830114237461932364017723572923413542331465232146623116812302712222939182228261182272612322616722255724722425932232210422230127221492142202093219207421817722171249216166721511492141252213145921217652112510321083520914572082497207124920626110205301212047329020314662022210720115652006241992513019813591972712019617871956528619417771934418519232123191156119016551891354188167718793918638163185512661841458183116118229122181259318015621791866178228917711501761768175239617412571733112317243187171935170937169136416811571672091166248916594216410451631266162135016111531606321591787158311381571766156197515572715414731533213015234146151451961502189149155414830127147146314610371451979144311351431563142155414127114140177013993313818741371681136177613514651343012213322115132198313118671301258129157012831112127104612624103125114712414561231252122301131213114112017581191872118177611733123116187311517591141961113259811213651111249110743081092289108104410710441061255105187210425102103944102176710127131100115199301199827107972610896104695281389413639349231921571912915090105289135488239187241028611458593684231018319778237141811157801045792497781762771871762380752083749457312547213547115707024108696025768281186718776620956518906473063156062271216173760830591253581050571884561969551258548385384752105551741508424918794814694710514617684511434419864319804213634123101401248391570382811137197036136035208234391553334145321366312078302399291253282510227198626619251772241157237342216732119772072919114318125117104916114715125314114713833121252118471072791384197944631954194312321224181419”

4.2.6 Rewriting the full text of Quran at verse level by replacing the number of letters of each word with the words

For all the key coding pattern based codes do far, as per the rule, we have to test the even odd coding pattern. We test even odd coding pattern regarding this verse as explained in detail in Chapter 4.1.1. Let’s recall this verse:

89:3 by the even and the odd (Quran).

Since we have observed a miracolous system of codes with even odd coding pairs so far, I also hypotheszed that ther might also be a key coding pattern left in this verse that has key role in this key coding based system with even odd pairs we have witnessed so far. When I checked, I observed this special coding pattern.

This verse has 2 words each has 6 letters. When we write the number of letters in each word along with chapter, verse and word information instead of the total number of letters per verse, we observe this multiple of 19 key coding pattern of this core verse:

89 | 3 | 2 | 6 | 6

893266 /19 = 47014

Then, when I test this key coding pattern over the full text of Quran, I discovered that it also exist in it considering the 6236 numbered verses. Moreover, it also has the compulsory even odd coding as will be presented in the following chapter after this one.

This coding pattern is also closely similar and has strong relation to the evidence code of the Ultimate Code presented in Chapter 4.2.2.1. In code 4.2.2.1, we had witnessed that we could rewrite Quran by concatenating the 6348 representation numbers of each verse at the verse level. In this code of Chapter 4.2.6, we will observe a similar rewriting coding, but with more deep resolution of the text. This time instead of using the number total letters per verse, I will literally replace each word with the number of letters of each word and rewrite the text of Quran. This further reassures the rewriting of code 4.2.2.1 and shows that not only the total number of letters per verse but also the order of each word in a verse pattern has 19 the similar 19 based design. This fact answers any potential objections such that “why is there no coding that shows the order of the word are also under 19 based design?”. This code, Evidence 4.2.6, answers that question by proving that there is also a coding at the number of letters per word resolution and we can rewrite Quran also with the same pattern of code 4.2.2.1 but now with the information of the order of words per verse. Also, this fact is based the second type of the text with 6236 numbered verses. Therefore, considering code 4.2.2.1 and code 4.2.6 together, they support each other and assures that the text of Quran is under 19 based design up to its letters and thus intact and unchanged. Moreover, there is also further code, Code 4.2.3.1, that further shows that the pattern of code 4.2.2.1 works again if we use sum instead of concatenation operation while coding per verse. Considering all those three similar rewriting based coding patterns, we witness a very strong 19 based rewriting design that shows that there is 19 based system in the full text of Quran up to its last letter with the current order of chapters, words.

Considering the 6236 numbered verse of Quran, here is the illustration of the coding pattern of the big coding representation number as shown below:

[Chapter 114 | Last Verse of Chapter 114 | Total Words in Last Verse of Chapter 114 | Number of Letters of Words in Last Verse of Chapter 114] [Chapter 114 | Verse 5 of Chapter 114 | Total Words in Verse 5 of Chapter 114 | Number of Letters of Words in Verse 5 of Chapter 114] . . . . . . . [Chapter 1 | Verse 2 in Chapter 1 | Total Words in Verse 2 of Chapter 1 | Number of Letters of Words in Verse 2 of Chapter 1] [Chapter 1 | Verse 1 in Chapter 1 | Total Words in Verse 1 of Chapter 1 | Number of Letters of Words in Verse 1 of Chapter 1]

Here the “|” symbol stands for the concatenation operation of the numbers of its both sides. The neighboring brackets also concatenated.

If we use the real numbers in the above formula, it would be like this:

[ 114 | 6 | 3 | 6 5 2] [ 114 | 5 | 5 | 5 4 2 5 4] . . . . . . [1 | 2 | 4 | 8 2 3 5] [1 | 1 | 4 | 6 6 4 3]

And, the final number after all the concatenation would look like this:

11463652 1145554254 . . . . . . 1248235 1146643

114636521145554254 . . . . . . 12482351146643

Here is the proof of this fact:

x <- nQuran
tmpwr <- c()
for(i in 1:nrow(x)){
  word<-unlist(str_split(x$text[i]," "))
  tmpwr <- c(tmpwr,paste0( rev(sapply(word, nchar) ), collapse = "") )
}

cat("Tail of the representation numbers of each verse with number of letters per its words: ", tail(tmpwr))
## Tail of the representation numbers of each verse with number of letters per its words:  5342 53 53 6722 54254 652
cat("Head of the representation numbers of each verse with number of letters per its words: ", head(tmpwr))
## Head of the representation numbers of each verse with number of letters per its words:  6643 8235 66 534 6544 865
tmp <- paste0(x$chapter,x$verse, x$vwords, tmpwr)
cat("Tail of this big number at verse level: ", tail(tmp))
## Tail of this big number at verse level:  114145342 1142253 1143253 114446722 1145554254 11463652
cat("Head of this big number at verse level: ", head(tmp))
## Head of this big number at verse level:  1146643 1248235 13266 143534 1546544 163865
tmpr <- paste0(rev(tmp), collapse = '')
as.bigz(tmpr) %% 19
## Big Integer ('bigz') :
## [1] 0
cat("The number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmpr))
## The number of digits on this big number is 111098

As we see the remainder of mod 19 is 0 and thus it is multiple of 19. It has a similar approach to code 4.2.2.1 but using the second type of the text, the 6236 numbered verses. It also goes further in the letters resolution of the text by using the number of letters per word resolution. This is the maximum resolution we could look at in a text with the natural numbers of a text.

Since the key coding pattern is suitable to consider the text type of the numbered 6348 verses too, we have two trials and one success in this evidence based on the key coding pattern with letters information. Let’s add them into the counters for probability calculations.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  2
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 1

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, Evidence 4.2.6 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself.

Also, here is the “111098” digits length big number:

“11463652114555425411444672211432531142253114145342113553342311345528231133533423113243222113145342112453423311234433211222541121434221115532352111435571113433451112633434211115333331103753383441102764326551101564333109643353109554264310945524331093542643109246242109148422108346252108235431081367310772771076362510755562251074274107357433310724634410714644510647326326410634532810624664710612461055354610544426610534645510525525431051756333231049353210483554104747344104637431045462531044462631043454241042454341041444331033967578655310324337210311610285625621027463721026265102556362310244633210233633102237431021276101112531011043253101925410184732410174542310164742410154766510145775431013472531012272101117100115553421001046224100976224344100845534100745334100645472100534251004342510032491002249100124999863335439976343543996675654599543433994374599343274992375699147553988213333354434467524344369879632586552986166225464329632552985166346667552647353984116623236554398334349826544424981126636963255329755543249749322444684973633235497255425397155427396195654239618284961725596163555961568642339614534343961345325961237329611553325961033349693445968463329673632966457239655422739643634963364496243273961534344958485449574635395695334865539554646295465427539533654952254951286948353494735449464452294544523944342694334449423436941442439311443549310443649394436493835559373445936445439354535593456223793353334293233369311692212459220563363921964424439218454449217268921635349215463629214344892134763392123552921164343439210267929274928473249272679262749254542492434529234753392234379213436911536439114766455769113774444349112365291113744911045233919452429183767917353491635369153537914363691335379123536911266902035359019675275690183755901798767552329016452629015352590146523252901324290124625390113653901027790926690845243907533225906444549056344225904532753903333590245424901454428930246892935268928555335892748552892643543892553542689245645248923962475555489225336348921633533389204335689194346789185743638917566223891610535444623489151153556362374891439328913543353891236478911462458910372689956555589866254248973633896643332389563333228943336893266892235891168826465228825365288244664688234442388223653882144344882044354881944364881844364881764353648816266881526688142668813363488123534881145442881035328892568883554887632434288664234338854432488435448832558823554881474428719357387185653328717353787164666287154433487144424287136434422871246544871126887103425879464248782668779435434323876343687534458743645873343587234348714633386174568486162458615346486143623861333438612353686113537861064332238693743868454338675853248664432386543276864645332286326586246253861277852235328521444228520446258519552552851825585174644285163434851536528514366385134542385124533285111465375244386552851014644444622985528591043235683248589665623453857649623385644522855363585437538532658522768513637842595333865538424345684234534584224655284216626534842046233841943246841834368417333684163643841565233238414542223841356423384122558411354484106445424849464368484555484756542484697433437428453455844454258433354842345584135638336665263283353673833466625568333465638332665255483316575374833048344832986552565283284834483273526832661083335832545425832456462483233673832244372832128583202548319452538318653742383177624434283164654283156854243831486526332383137763644383127442324383114546583103853839254838442538376436423836583543835244834574533833566264832675373583128382199356443423821865325228217553253821647423821535378214443638213443728212362682112658210375382946623828643242282745544826764327428255542348243564823346482236748213663812988244236381285624338127583322812626481255454238124555323812346634812236638121342481206452332811944443811834368117343681162568115364381144523481133554811234648111346481103454819343381834848173464816346481534648143464813346481236648113453804246625804124680404455580392758038355480376535443803625780352548034542533803336448032393580312468030246802925780282558027334780264355280254355380244537680235423338022453328021365280203462801945442801844322801745273801624480152458014256801335328012343380113543801034348092438084442480744343806342480536238044664280344453802364280125379469524362635794556243479443733794346233794256462779414625379409525434324793946263793836647937332479364336579355327537934466447933393579322677931475447930453367929455557928365379276562435792664353227925576445792446434792325479223442792124479203655791945336791864232237917533534791663663527915444427914382479134542579125533357911445347910572846799257798355479727679637437952497942497932497922497912497840165352654425435583783994334334537838145462323723954378371053626636827836554324783565344627834255783326678322757831357278305536367829457337828357678275552547826254782536537824653446278233646782224778214644278204556578194656578186665243781756353278162657815463257814553827781335567812454567811356678103556789355678826878726778645543785373278427378347324782365278128277504644477493853774866263347747385377465645747745385377444844377436643574774236367741554272774038537739563333773858753377373853773648343773546233773438537733335477324644477316524342773063422377729662423777283853772775396546772627577254554377243853772338467722353377214442777205432637719385377183944771737627716374377153853771455325377132547712343377113454771034647793464778346477735647763424775249774249773249772249771249763110553395242476301155342442363762995334335327628967544567376278546675527626754525537625564335762495244333457623666453376228654433327621135546325573446762075554244761996566365557618474447617676344676165663267615874632555761466656567613107344427346761256353676118646532467610775442437691053444244647687666336776777334765766768443447658663326727646675863763754536637621055765427537611164325237332754076423534753957573475385444327537643242375365342757535452427534352475335543327532353475314333375304653375293656752836337527332475264743375255534237524355575233543752235547521266752047523751945522751845564751746452751
