2742388424452342442553427322745435664283736862442345447423629423545534232237363725765433562335662626866728768554587877544221754553332236263263421115645335437442017556843636663437534193554345462483885652382477346523325542418245536543653433355333765654172055445446426265654364416145534257643748741522534425736285345596275741413443454555643341318654467524456433443412884454244332344325253324535544322352543333235432535433333332253543235432435433333332273234411715534242543445286323443255423355553232332323355437545433244634238235724641013574626447565249155484755545252554813643638986463447196532323983347983346463755457755486533843362667375744536533774516643674853434775344145554332333476543286343742266343554623327726343421654337376366737754129553428274465555354453254455423200116546776554231993064424353554456236543543543632331982173433432446752443455331977644624431967625545231954363454325752449746675266276632542324434234373194147423735343625431932072673463545552756544319211528363542343191215446534246832864654653190117557576832231899432356834318820444626736236264365523187216245427646735765554333186246323366353653526552777263185236436633355524373655553231841267685423335331832864283468423522556635435342553182965343643331812264552486525644425534333180304635685473252732223424245365533179364346635564242544537433526434423844323178174444834473344555331771244444528565231762244462334344445245275533175116426737474431741543254573624425831731764456667352525335317215436465562327385317111834243442583170196235335236269424535316913643526442555331681664256272527268553167336345623286744552954256244266346563166986457536331652043234263222334652575316425443325376775546254328342331638634543523162136446424334544316121623423242732334332433316018874442642363343462315930934243544527374442754333334244315876445234315714633542632442543156374635545624345535255235252538656625542315521444244345247747534552315475644562266224773553546242255235233262522625335223252326824355662645454432542315325634562352365337626733536231524083325434845264256424525232652853357244543151198445762422563555425315068336423149136873655625542314810835644644631471985377452863445235333146218358353442635345343253145248644643344643355443424333144278464433535373732345423243433143126573523255443142138546544456252314168555463140248325545554653764435233623139964275635331386764543313713853375263523231361583446752454256531352363523534364379456525536313413835528597626531331174685442537313256574731315844563130136546665625542312916445425434523822431281265625423522331279686255245312617664323532673434433125156824546352766233124136824645263842312310654645445431221287446552473231211144565844243312021463424552663364535462311928644426525275444455437773754231183164263424643727324245725256255423117236644537653352434663262331161864255644273744255231159845633263311415826728626875656311314635444553632453112356643324874565537554246524424352355431111162276833362311023878434463335762686553343109116444523822431081184443546443310710642443655431061764366736655445443310514443675232866633104148266268753534531033465534444752433566763454254476354483102136535352455542310117643335535544545643100156736655256255423992063543554732442526322398136234545626322397258234333546252534434374543396108464453332395118233573743239411826332543533932464278527423243732374336239215424332635363462391246233443525345352434365523901472664247273552389114443733255338896236442463879669445265386188542576262673544433851382623343473433842962443342428544386687343543542383146554682243543538278263343381338244736544367382643445254263754333801364236768862633792864466437544322555427664524323782963543743223432276223627775643377274446373543463623425548446523769734355423375366354374725355354323442652254465226333748652542643733244542543522437262334243522533363372176547635534556325537111654774626323709654562632369136363537263253368138355654658542367148233553473673236620625453233463323465423651664423875372626323643264665343264543424343436544366322363694435336215663434332345332361258344552777787363524232343360782333243591552232424344343235876662453357118325678655435613623376255755435531734455632733553655552636634243235468354463539827675344352206455445393436235443435186437534235019746424653433572333634945642343226263637446576544453555523434245237336348588766347235224543342444336332432434678355255345218376254346435542428423442072533444752533455523343882664542342138437564242843341208645354345543433242334017424443475534243233392082565425555427244386338156434442222335353373544424424322432342345375534564573547336246727264464754434546324643351866333554222432554233474453254333118353735354233211832435374623311444563546845422330267454475455223324353242323332922432355238225455262252232827644447445233242434383268842327214442542555245526562543262543233544244244355425454523251562342325332473432415652525753552553323206344525544356255532332211623376274553211845652665724774565232026745645536363786553533453533192664434543545523236555374352318186623326555923323433176811999831611544635444653152474542656467524443554247231424534566436876652897627253313297553224254553665544253652333231296443775523111464574675526524310165426442737442552391374242332454343815633442336236324374674343432224652943643676635273625484622643644423613662332437264235116235234424234186245443455527553323311875433556433276423324311322864985376373534234226345253534543462527246264235344422285276546656423342558532932443632284284323542543542752622535238223228332463543463763345654545336555333432282129433547463446343443737734545855423735754344435256263423733675732725384552362696462326225254443343433454446644342433645674334735542228115623423242433646228014642336353542332279176362744436424662322781464252325455542227719623533435365678655222761144232575544227545642556334353236325435454453545534276443362565227417623533435473767652273304243326365627662666524824426572272286255332634363638326342444543227120463572453337763257522270155283543325242632269167434354436334264226813445535558755722673043427362365636635236452526554222663575634447335754356722427524642324254226527463534523554465346274567654226439854255333624546445455654354445657625542226311435364236532262246235334353333626224427652261244454355345225353444276532260394442546524432342455253346433443643427332259674323424324446263635537535526535344233324434234234465343433635343252225843854253446233626443735433544373254423273432322572464255573528785653726553422562444536267635584342542525222555065365368533334246353632453444225238222333526423324225422829533333234232736554222535242444724333253257476232525524335477434655443243355532252983454644322512783324455455435435754555444722501585377445445665422496082544534532245455366534253562544533644523345233433347423753422483064234322855342335425376243253422474344542445652455642352333363455243545332425342246549454535653486263442533357365325234425434345243273253232245166554556274444422224494442744272243286254453334262543453436255323224276553444224167338492240274455262422543435353584664662239156622534754626432238863667736223735463425553645364444252352453536232832236258338546446375362622652542223547444277622442746436463646233824944362626422545432234254635862445435445457666466223364463427468525354378253643654255333645253654253342875274732436575922323362545534456544322438563752735565422314543342746257625435447444634333437573662685565422303064644444523272643534443322335322294682644437344325464344534344535234836233365266562228404454578543466232538565422724325233345769222774443653222613444353454625522251444564374726472222414445537652844632223168464746764355336222227948342453265453736268322628222139755555853455355634234563863735235543863222026444274336264588333527287622219267563444526486247564352752722181644544554427665522217576425567627464344245382526396352474343466724442343423465272216256254532345243334624333653221522424332636498993262264722143044323433356643777552453545625222134964342455423735544547623255335337453556457674453532212204442457355655276655322112064435232444343272732221017644454962324623622209124442776232532208164333756345265542220711745456442532206126545655432342205146325655455234422041763342234566245253220325644746434334343352437424722028645534352201145444634624442522002442622362444253432664775421991244424954326221982673424353766347525442462453219730742665337453263424343334433744219673644274666543233543535424553235263437435432424254232254334543663526363374621951483427737534427219422724274655244755348666521931583353633554423821926444363219125844873383663835237732883821901383242639544272189276546726542446265344556226272188176565525763367576321876555554447344372658353652526526535375343277544546744433453426356433218617652821043544443544218544665234858534353443424332533654338526536344532184326423363233443544754342433254337521831555525333653554221821644424335542432332181134442753454543218016733898643255335321799557424624217838443335354253645863422337766546265355422177517265555477296368646563964986333548795653244763652432176144436275356343321751153638767655217429444637346353626255427624426522173254442433333343442337456534217215644237725245542217118623332543423444554217022634626346462425442633421691162243638664216817433375634552345422167235272355745436346332265421661273665652654221653164435352642553333356437643242532164436456636766422435352532624435435244675768322216396623324362162962364424621611366944554365522160116645466755321592087465625523267262652215824444344344244352523452752215798265425552156106443355735215512848772465249215413624525442436321531182427685542215266327682151176622776776544546321503166555763455335544465424663434332149176354332446634343321481943234254336237862442147782533242146146347453763767521453283335242327543455365335523365544214434635434243765534654246634364862443221434545642754334353364353536425353465355655357437521422164342476325546252527521411565363524423323321403063543424533434245252458668726221391462474745434292213810624442434421371966349422553632524532136316244334242743544386687343543545213515823357322652456213415653635244233233213327624546875444542625325532542213217653535354232647342131983534323221301883624628443237324321291666337767554454542128176633537525363267421271466333448527743212630645435256333565432724544342733212522669844287364742755555321241984423533555336637532123186235633443432342462122128364554567322121158262432656266752120314332422252443754524322543736343211910652436557321182464642665352534362464625421171152245434684211614622682222644462115124442433567642114304462436236372332562444424533432113317354735455362534653336475337465211217623533334343344232111186427527352432354262110174634243532763656721093343234254437643423263245732726324221081864238553324336626221071743324323368324243210619432342435244352324221052565254264542325428363255322104134497665625542210312652343266543210274652624254262226354635284433226235532625843434533263655734355658463363384272101226256444655243434432454210010626244446629910833435446429812834366583432297188544335444344643222962563454262723334253653435482959945643463294176425653254365342229327642726526562765574724556753292116542562845429130642324663243543537543454435334290274493346524234244244436262652892683452552545538326434432454288106266452366287286656864234565477434664266454286136236443766655285496354363357466233434243476487543756386576245766542284156562626636627532832965453626567456986361043627355328210642555865628113642556626432328023622436244434436265355262792463346433454274323627665427811532353662552779635244264276236443285433953353445554427519635232724464433362827437635434424343535434373537234328333263227311655664446652721064245484532712465375345432554354424443327017743245552223433352691883545444335234333526823627334334244433223433352672082425434754626425433266976535335826512645355246554264138256543533262263155532747245567532622462353343545456532985655226160664334477456553424685555233463254249366675254334334443424243260286525343274642324453755455463259186536245537334345542582086734364574434563643257186654637252474576562567655327225515657744332424243254276623546333467636586543254332537658645325286533245225112654256246463250106552795353249184424436876638522732481962334435443432342462471283645545673224686454545524588336576924410646556655724378276567242865477463241186554663243634355362401475635655456732239106425557656238176235334333374546423711662344532352361933555243456534384772351982663535344455343252341382473536468432332364352568343333386486323232126633623332652311564256748352473423028622433255446544245555243833322919433363663525522334222813642626276556322720825527422432763243652263983233525523444447554424375545352442624222534643554472532543544245475244328655422413848564566362322320642432764255535332432222365636334722536254755334221125552654465422202543234286443355443434474542191994553726276445362422186623332217176252664342544644521611653743676552157672636421416834435834445554421319624724373355533533421276248243211116345526233421012653444446362291063636356472811723575442532712444574546343261162622854552258826423352412628424344366238674676652277333263211317973573555416386515465441435341326612482351146643”

4.2.8 The Seven Pairs Codes discussion

I discussed the potential importance of “seven pairs” in Quran in the previous chapter, Evidence 4.2.4. Let’s recall the verse related with it:

15:87 Surely, We have given you the seven pairs with the great Quran. (Quran, B. Saglam, kuranmeali.com)

In the main chapter, so far, we witnessed 8 total key coding pattern based evidences that are suitable to test the follow up even and odd coding pattern. Just check all the “even odd” terms including chapters under the main chapter to see those 8 code pairs as even odd codes are presented right after their predecessor code. As we witnessed, we observed 8 total even and odd coding evidences based on these 8 key coding pattern based evidences. Namely, in total we have 8 out 8 successes regarding the coding pairs of key coding pattern based evidence and their compulsory even odd codings. This appears to be a miraculous design if we pause and think again carefully. The total number of suitable key coding pattern based evidences to test their even odd coding is 8. For all those 8 codes, we witnessed their even odd coding pair. God knows best but this miraculous 8 pairs coding design might potentially be related with the seven pairs mentioned in the verse 15:87.

In the system I presented, I observed one more coding pair than 7. The 8th one might not be the part of the seven pairs if this verse if really mentioning about the system of these coding pairs or one of the pairs might also be the results of a random event, which makes the 7 pairs observation stronger and more reliable.

We can compute the probability of observing such 7 pairs of code, as there are no other trials could be done regarding the rules, we have 7 successes out of 7 trials with probability p=( 1 / 19x19 ) = 1/361 = 0.00277. Then using the Binomial test we can calculate the probability of such a miraculous observation as 1.25e-18 as follows:

tmp <-binom.test( 7, 7, p = 1/(19*19),
                 alternative = c("greater") )

tmp1 <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)

print(paste("The probability of", 7, "successes out of", 7 ,
            "(with p=1/361) is:", tmp1) )
## [1] "The probability of 7 successes out of 7 (with p=1/361) is: 1.25e-18"

If we want to be more conservative and take p=( 2 / 19x19 ), the probability is calculated as 1.6e-16.

If we want to be extremely conservative and take p=( 4 / 19x19 ), the probability is calculated as 2.05e-14.

We can also compute the probability of observing the 8 pairs of codes so far, as there are no other trials that could be done regarding the rules, we have 8 successes out of 8 trials with a conservative probability p=( 2 / 19x19 ) = 2/361 = 0.005540166. Then using the Binomial test we can calculate the probability of such a miraculous observation as 8.88e-19 as follows:

tmp <-binom.test( 8, 8, p = 2/(19*19),
                 alternative = c("greater") )

tmp1 <- formatC(tmp$p.value, format = "e", digits = 2)

print(paste("The probability of", 8, "successes out of", 8 ,
            "(with p=1/361) is:", tmp1) )
## [1] "The probability of 8 successes out of 8 (with p=1/361) is: 8.88e-19"

A much more conservative case with the probability 4/361 would result 2.27e-16.

4.2.9 Pairing at chapter level data with the totals based key coding pattern

Under this main chapter I will present 2 related pairing coding pattern based evidence, which are also based on the key coding patterns we observe from the total numbers of the full text of Quran.

This key coding pattern is based on the pairing coding pattern mentioned in Chapter 3.2.1. For convenience and its importance for this chapter, I present the descriptive numbers again here in the following tables.

dfnums <- data.frame(c,v,V,w,W,l,L)
# Table:
knitr::kable(dfnums, booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table of the totals of all the 7 main descriptive numbers of the text of Quran.')
Table 4.8: Table of the totals of all the 7 main descriptive numbers of the text of Quran.
c v V w W l L
114 6236 6348 77797 78245 330709 332837

Let’s first remember the main numbers of the text of Quran. There are 4 main numbers of the text, which are number of chapters, number of verses, number of words and number of letters. However, as explained in detail in Chapter 3.2.1, Quran has a different structure, which makes it possible to be defined in two different forms regarding those main numbers of each form. Specifically, if we prefer to describe Quran with numbered verses only then we have these 4 descriptive numbers in order:

\[c, v, w, l\]

\[114-6236-77797-330709\]

In fact most of the scholars mentions Quran with regard to the numbered verses and cites verse number as 6236. However, some scholars like to mention all the verses including the unnumbered Basmala verses and thus cite the verse number as 6348. In that case the 4 main numbers are as follows in order:

\[c, V, W, L\]

\[114-6348-78245-332837\]

These represent the two different text types of the text of Quran regarding its textual structure. In fact, both of the scholars are correct as long as they emphasize the difference.

Also, I ordered the 4 main numbers naturally from chapters towards letters by following the general rules as described in Chapter 3.2. Again, according to the rules described in Chapter 3.2, there are only two ways we can pair these two main descriptive numbers by concatenating them either way as follows:

  1. \[c, v, w, l, c, V, W, L\]

\[114623677797330709114634878245332837\]

  1. \[c, V, W, L, c, v, w, l\]

\[114634878245332837114623677797330709\]

There are only two possible pairings and both of the number pairs above are multiple of 19. This means that they both are in harmony and with the 19 based coding system. As per the rules, I consider them as the key coding patterns and will test the same coding pattern over the full text of Quran considering both verse and chapter level data.

Verifying the key coding patterns of Chapter 4.2.9: For testing the mode of big numbers, I always use the special R package, gmp (Lucas et al. 2019), for the computation of big numbers. As a double check, one can also manually copy and paste these big numbers into a web application (“Good Calculators” 2019) for a double check if wished. I test both of the big numbers of the key coding patterns below:

#First number
tmp <- paste0(c, v, w, l, c, V, W, L, collapse = '')
tmp
## [1] "114623677797330709114634878245332837"
cat("The mod 19 of this long number is ", as.numeric(as.bigz(tmp) %% 19))
## The mod 19 of this long number is  0
cat("The precise result of the division is found as follows:") 
## The precise result of the division is found as follows:
cat(as.character(div.bigz(tmp, 19)))
## 6032825147227932058664993591859623

Similarly, we can prove for the second number.

#First number
suppressWarnings(require(gmp)) 
tmp2 <- paste0(c, V, W, L, c, v, w, l, collapse = '')
tmp2
## [1] "114634878245332837114623677797330709"
cat("The mod 19 of this long number is ", as.numeric(as.bigz(tmp2) %% 19))
## The mod 19 of this long number is  0
cat("The precise result of the division is found as follows:") 
## The precise result of the division is found as follows:
cat(as.character(div.bigz(tmp2, 19)))
## 6033414644491201953401246199859511

We witnessed that the two big key coding numbers of Chapter 4.2.9 are multiple of 19. Feel free to double check it by running the codes yourself or by just copying and pasting that big number into an independent big number calculator, such as this (“Good Calculators” 2019) and test it yourself.

In the following two subchapters, I present two different evidence codes that are based on the above mentioned 2 key coding patterns of Chapter 4.2.9. I will add the total numbers of trials and successes into the counters here for both of the subchapters. Considering the aboe twp key coding patterns, we observe two evidence codes in the full text of Quran, one at chapter and the other at verse level data and both pairings are from the text type of 6348 verses towards the numbered 6236 verses. Overall, we have 4 trials and 2 successes considering the two key coding patterns and their follow up successor trial codes. Let’s add them into the counters as well.

# Counters for all the key coding patterns
key_codings_tested_nums <- key_codings_tested_nums +  4
key_codings_success_nums <- key_codings_success_nums + 2

4.2.9.1 Pairing all the numbers per chapter

In Chapter 4.2.9, I showed the pairing key coding pattern based on the total numbers of the text of Quran. As per the rules we have to test those key coding patterns in the full text of Quran considering chapter and verse level numbers. In this subchapter, I will present the evidence code that is the successor code of those key coding patterns in the full text of Quran considering the chapter level data. As we see below, when we pair all the numbers of the chapter level data from the text type of 6348 verse towards to the text type of 6236 verses and the resulting big evidence code number is also multiple of 19.

tmp1 <- paste0(dfVCwl$Chapter_index,dfVCwl$Verse_sum,
              dfVCwl$cwords, dfVCwl$cletters)
cat("Head of numbers from the numbered verses", head(tmp1))
## Head of numbers from the numbered verses 1729143 2286614026249 3200350114985 4176376316332 5120283712206 6165305612726
tmp2 <- paste0(dfVCWL$Chapter_index,dfVCWL$Verse_sum,
              dfVCWL$cWords, dfVCWL$cLetters)
cat("Head of numbers from all the verses", head(tmp2))
## Head of numbers from all the verses 1729143 2287614426268 3201350515004 4177376716351 5121284112225 6166306012745
tmp <- paste0(tmp1, tmp2)
cat("Head of the paired numbers", head(tmp))
## Head of the paired numbers 17291431729143 22866140262492287614426268 32003501149853201350515004 41763763163324177376716351 51202837122065121284112225 61653056127266166306012745
cat("Tail of the paired numbers", head(tmp))
## Tail of the paired numbers 17291431729143 22866140262492287614426268 32003501149853201350515004 41763763163324177376716351 51202837122065121284112225 61653056127266166306012745
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = '')
cat("Mod 19 of the number is 0 as seen:")
## Mod 19 of the number is 0 as seen:
as.integer(as.bigz(tmp) %% 19)
## [1] 0
cat("The number of digits of the final number is: ", nchar(tmp))
## The number of digits of the final number is:  2415

As we witnessed, this big evidence code number is multiple of 19. Here is the “2415” digits length number of this evidence:

“172914317291432286614026249228761442626832003501149853201350515004417637631633241773767163515120283712206512128411222561653056127266166306012745720633411443572073345144548751242538787612465406912925051111591292505111151010918397589101101843760811123194678171112419507836121111795730712112179973261343853354513448573564145283035391453834355815996572882151006612901161281844783216129184878511711115586643171121562666218110158365521811115876571199897139351999975395420135135353992013613575418211121174509421113117851132278127953142279128353332311810524483231191056450224641319575424651323577325778963878257890038972622713205630262281324564927931159479027941163480928881438593028891442594929699784317297098243363060817347230618213491313455021713135554219032303721563323137615823373130357883374130758073454884359434558883613354577832383546782325736837303068368473430873718286538993718386939183888735306538897393084397511774869397611814888408512265108408612305127415479433654155798338442538603522425486435414389836360943908403628445934614744460350149345374882085453849221044635645266746366492686473854224234739546244248295602510483056425294918353153349193571552504537315075046377152651603601546516136415655249312132452503161343536236014335363364145254553421469545634614885578352164755793561666569637917565697383177557295752545573057925645822475204658234792065592444719705925451198960133521560601435615796114226966611523098562111777686212181787631118180163121858206418242109164192461110651228912036513293122266122541105661325811246730333134767313371366685230112896853305130869522601133695326411527044217971704522199071282279657129231984722828611097229290112873202008547321204873745625610357457260105475401646767541168695763124310877632247110677501818417751185860784017479678411788157946179785794718380480421335528043137571812910443581301084548219813338220853528336169750833717376984251084458426112464852210946985231134888617612548618652738719722968720763158826923828827964018930139584893114360390208234290218636191155425391165827292217131492227533393114016593124418494827102949311219583416295938181961972288962076307975301159763413498894404989984239983615899940177100114016910012441881011136160101124017910282812310293214210331473103418921049331341041037153105523971056271161064177710652196107725114107829133108310431084146210962799109731118110319801104239911152381111627100112415471125196611352373113627921146208011472499”

In the following Evidence 4.2.9.2, we will see that this pairing coding pattern also exist at verse level too and not specific to only chapter level, both of which are based on the predecessor pair key coding pattern of the total numbers as shown in Chapter 4.2.9. Also, ee already added the numner of trials to the counters in Chapter 4.2.9.

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, as all the others, Evidence 4.2.9.1 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself. In case if I find out Evidence 4.2.9.1 had been available in another article, then, in such a case, I surely add a citation and update the online version of this book.

4.2.9.2 Pairing all the numbers per verse: Evidence

In Chapter 4.2.9, I showed the pairing key coding pattern based on the total numbers of the text of Quran. As per the rules we have to test those key coding patterns in the full text of Quran considering chapter and verse level numbers. In this subchapter, I will present the evidence code that is the successor code of those key coding patterns in the full text of Quran considering the verse level data. As we see below, when we pair all the numbers of the verse level data from the text type of 6348 verse towards to the text type of 6236 verses and the resulting big evidence code number is also multiple of 19.

In the previous chapter, Evidence 4.2.9.1, we had witnessed a similar evidence code in the chapter level data. In this subchapter, I will present that a similar pairing key coding pattern based evidence code also exist in the verse level data too. This is despite the fact that the two text types have different total verse counts as 6348 and 6236 and their data lengths do not match to pair and concatenate. I had already described how the unequal data are paired in the rules section. Let’s first see again the table that shows the total numbers of each category per verse in the numbered verses as I will concatenate these numbers of both category.

knitr::kable(head(unQuran, n = 9), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of all 6348 verses of Quran.')
Table 4.9: Table head of all 6348 verses of Quran.
VerseI chapter verse vwords vletters text
1 1 1 4 19 بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم
2 1 2 4 18 الحمد لله رب العالمين
3 1 3 2 12 الرحمن الرحيم
4 1 4 3 12 مالك يوم الدين
5 1 5 4 19 إياك نعبد وإياك نستعين
6 1 6 3 19 اهدنا الصراط المستقيم
7 1 7 9 44 صراط الذين أنعمت عليهم غير المغضوب عليهم ولا الضالين
8 2 0 4 19 بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم
9 2 1 1 3 الم 
knitr::kable(head(nQuran,  n = 9), booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = 'Table head of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.')
Table 4.9: Table head of numbered 6236 verses of Quran.
VerseI chapter verse vwords vletters text
1 1 1 4 19 بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم
2 1 2 4 18 الحمد لله رب العالمين
3 1 3 2 12 الرحمن الرحيم
4 1 4 3 12 مالك يوم الدين
5 1 5 4 19 إياك نعبد وإياك نستعين
6 1 6 3 19 اهدنا الصراط المستقيم
7 1 7 9 44 صراط الذين أنعمت عليهم غير المغضوب عليهم ولا الضالين
8 2 1 1 3 الم
9 2 2 7 27 ذلك الكتاب لا ريب فيه هدى للمتقين

Now, in a similar manner to Evidence 4.2.9.1, I will concatenate numbers of all categories regarding all and only numbered verses. Since, this evidence is about the total verse numbers 6348 and 6236 of both text types, as an exceptional usage per the defined general rules, I will use the general verse indexes to be able to concatenate the unnumbered Basmala verses as well. Because otherwise, there is no real representative number to be assigned to the unnumbered Basmala verses within the total of 6348 verses and thus we can not correctly concatenate their corresponding counterpart in the numbered verses at the 6236 verses. Otherwise, the one-to-one verse data corresponding in the pairing of the key coding pattern but we cannot represent the additioal 112 unnumbered Basmala verses in the verse level data. Therefore, in order to represent them as well as per the rules, in any such pairing we use the general verse indexes instead of the special verse indexes.s Let’s elaborate on this more.

So far, we have observed that the evidences were mainly by concatenating the numbered verses version of the text of Quran and the full version of the text that includes the unnumbered Basmala verses too. This seems to be one of the main patterns in the 19 based coding system of the text of Quran. We have observed this pattern at every level so far, from total numbers of each of the descriptor numbers of the text to per chapter level too. Now, the question is, can we see the same paired concatenation coding pattern in the verse level as well. While pairing, we need to consider what numbers we are going to assign to the unnumbered Basmala verses at the beginning of the 112 chapters while pairing to its corresponding pair as we did in the predecessor key coding pattern. Since the unnumbered Basmala verses are unnumbered, we should not use any other number, even 0, to really represent them. As a single solution to this point, we can fairly utilize the general verse index of each verse for all the verses, because even the unnumbered verses have a unique general verse index in an order out of the 6348 verses. I mentioned this process as a general rule in Chapter 3.2.1 for the paired codings at verse level. This way, we solve the first problem but how about the other issue of concatenating the unequal length verse numbers of both text types (6348 vs 6236)? As per the rules, we use a natural approach as usual. If you try to concatenate two vectors where one of the vectors is longer than the other, then by default, R programming language keeps concatenating by starting over the smaller vector again. In a sense, the larger vector wraps the smaller vector as a circle. As an example, let’s say we have two vectors a an b. The longer vector a has 5 elements as this a=(1,2,3,4,5) and the shorter vector b has three elements as this b=(7,8,9). Then, if we concatenate a and b, the natural way is to start using the elements of the shorter vector from the beginning again. A a result, the concatenation of a and b gives us this vector ab=(17, 28, 39, 47, 58). This is the natural way and also the default behavior of R as well. This means I did not even need to write a special code to perform this concatenation task and just simply concatenated them as if they are equal. In this evidence, we will test exactly this and see if the pairing of the descriptive numbers of the text of Quran per verse level data is also under the 19 based coding system of the text of the Quran. Here is the proof that shows success on this evidence code too:

# unQuran for 6348 verses
x<- data.table(unQuran)
tmp1 <- paste0(x$chapter, x$VerseI,x$vwords, x$vletters)
# nQuran for 6236 verses
x<- data.table(nQuran)
tmp2 <- paste0(x$chapter, x$VerseI,x$vwords, x$vletters)
tmp<-paste0(tmp1,tmp2)
# To see what is going on in concatenation
head(tmp)
## [1] "1141911419" "1241812418" "1321213212" "1431214312" "1541915419"
## [6] "1631916319"
tmp1[6235:6238]
## [1] "996235419" "996236420" "996237318" "996238416"
tmp2[6235:6236]
## [1] "1146235520" "1146236313"
tmp[6235:6238]
## [1] "9962354191146235520" "9962364201146236313" "99623731811419"     
## [4] "99623841612418"
#
tmp <- paste0(tmp, collapse = '')
print("Test if mod 19 of the code number is 0:")
## [1] "Test if mod 19 of the code number is 0:"
as.integer(as.bigz(tmp) %% 19) 
## [1] 0
#Digitsum is not used as evidence but just presented as a fact.
as.integer(digitsum(tmp) %% 19) 
## [1] 0
cat("number of digits on this big number is", nchar(tmp))
## number of digits on this big number is 117196

In the above analysis, you can see that the digit sum of this big number is also multiple of 19 as a fact.

For the reference, to the best of my knowledge, Evidence 4.2.9.2 is first time presented to the literature in this book, and it has been hypothesized, tested and discovered by myself. In case if I find out Evidence 4.2.9.2 had been available in another article, then, in such a case, I surely add a citation and update the online version of this book.

You can access this big number from the following link: https://github.com/quran2019/Quran19/blob/master/5_5_BigNumber.txt

One can just copy the big number and paste it into a web based big number calculator and test it herself.

As we witnessed, this big evidence code number is multiple of 19. Here is the “117196” digits length number of this evidence:

“1141911419124181241813212132121431214312154191541916319163191794417944284192813291329727210727210847211847211125221212522128332138332131147214114721412532151253215114721611472161049217104921712512181251218114321911432197292207292201977221197722116732221673222734223734223115722411572241772225177222561922661922619862271986227251022282510222812532291253229239923023992302078231207823113662321366232341452333414523339155234391552342082235208223513602361360236197023719702372811123828111238157023915702391248240124824023101241231012411363242136324219802431980243198624419862441143245114324517682461768246105124710512471469248146924818792491879249842250842250741251741251105525210552528472538472538382548382541258255125825519692561969256188425718842571050258105025812532591253259830260830260737261737261271212622712126215602631560263730264730264189026518902652095266209526618772671877267281182682811826860257269602572692410827024108270157027115702711354272135427212542731254273945274945274208327520832752380276238027618712771871277176227817622782497279249727910452801045280115728111572813714128237141282197728319772832310128423101284936285936285114528611452862410228724102287239128823912881354289135428910522901052290291502912915029115712921571292492312934923129313632941363294281382952813829510462961046296261082972610829727107298271072983011929930119299115121001151210027131210127131210117672102176721029442103944210325102210425102210418722105187221051255210612552106104421071044210710442108104421082289210922892109743082110743082110124921111249211113652112136521122598211325982113196121141961211417592115175921151873211618732116331232117331232117177621181776211818722119187221191758212017582120311412121311412121301132122301132122125221231252212314562124145621241147212511472125241032126241032126104621271046212731112212831112212815702129157021291258213012582130186721311867213119832132198321322211521332211521333012221343012221341465213514652135177621361776213616812137168121371874213818742138933213993321391770214017702140271142141271142141155421421554214215632143156321433113521443113521441979214519792145103721461037214614632147146321473012721483012721481554214915542149218921502189215045196215145196215134146215234146215232130215332130215314732154147321547272155727215519752156197521561766215717662157311382158311382158178721591787215963221606322160115321611153216113502162135021621266216312662163104521641045216494221659422165248921662489216620912167209121671157216811572168136421691364216993721709372170935217193521714318721724318721723112321733112321731257217412572174239621752396217517682176176821761150217711502177228921782289217818662179186621791562218015622180259321812593218129122218229122218211612183116121831458218414582184512662185512662185381632186381632186939218793921871677218816772188135421891354218916552190165521901561219115612191321232192321232192441852193441852193177721941777219465286219565286219517872196178721962712021972712021971359219813592198251302199251302199624220062422001565220115652201221072202221072202146622031466220373290220473290220430121220530121220526110220626110220612492207124922072497220824972208145722091457220983522108352210251032211251032211176522121765221214592213145922131252221412522214114922151149221516672216166722161249221712492217177222181772221820742219207422192093222020932220492142221492142221301272222301272222221042223221042223259322242593222457247222557247222516722226167222262612322272612322272611822282611822283918222293918222292712222302712222301681223116812231146622321466223214652233146522331354223413542234729223572922354017722364017722364619322374619322373011422383011422384520322394520322393314722403314722406428822416428822412512222422512222424720022434720022432511122442511122443514022453514022458442246844224615652247156522472711622482711622486342249634224973122507312250281062251281062251938225293822521669225316692253542172254542172254431652255431652255301142256301142256602402257602402257157722581577225827122225927122225994122609412260522082261522082261228722622287226250189226350189226324102226424102226424118226524118226543169226643169226667249226767249226739148226839148226824972269249722692492227024922270114422711144227139174227239174227227123227327123227335148227435148227430125227530125227513682276136822761665227716652277155722781557227820892279208922792811222802811222803013422813013422811779228217792282451862283451862283114522841145228419872285198722851454228614542286177222871772228714522288145222881554228915542289129551229012955122903213822913213822912810322922810322922711822932711822934919622944919632941332954193295724329613329611533297724329718743298115332981137329918743299135033001137330046197330113503301155433024619733021347330315543303166633041347330414683305166633059433306146833062911633079433307241253308291163308241073309241253309115033102410733106543311115033111872331265433122610733131872331326122331426107331418883315261223315115033161888331620813317115033171565331820813318155333191565331925923320155333202186332125923321271133322218633222279332327113332326963324227933241462332526963325114733261462332611483327114733277273328114833281866332972733292410933301866333035138333124109333115523332351383332209233331552333317633334209233342080333517633335136033362080333683733371360333720813338837333821913339208133397333340219133402379334173333415353342237933424518733435353343198033444518733448343345198033452086334683433469463347208633476303348946334831132334963033491360335031132335011593351136033517323352115933521547335373233537253354154733542511433557253355155433562511433566283357155433573212933586283358167033593212933592075336016703360146133612075336113663362146133621354336313663363939336413543364115233659393365177933661152336632115336717793367834336832115336836144336983433699363370361443370271163371936337129120337227116337228120337329120337313673374281203374331463375136733757293376331463376146233777293377291263378146233781352337929126337918833380135233809473381188333819373382947338211433383937338314623384114333842491338514623385155633862491338624993387155633871144338824993388114733891144338910423390114733902599339110423391135033922599339220773393135033931569339420773394177433951569339513543396177433963415733971354339714703398341573398146533991470339917813400146534001043340117813401114934021043340211443403114934032311334041144340411483405231133405351523406114834061459340735152340715843408145934089403409158434091877341094034102398341118773411311253412239834122812734133112534132188341428127341411493415218834151257341611493416104734171257341713603418104734181569341913603419176834201569342094334211768342112453422943342216613423124534231362342416613424527342513623425529342652734261155342752934271371342811553428231043429137134291570343023104343013543431157034316293432135434329413433629343324105343494134346333435241053435136034366333436125134371360343727107343812513438249934392710734392188344024993440198734412188344110503442198734421364344310503443626344413643444198434456263445401663446198434462510634474016634477529134482510634482189344975291344937157345021893450145334513715734517283452145334523012134537283453187534543012134542168345518753455135334562168345683234571353345725107345883234582073345925107345994734602073346033151346194734611674346233151346213543463167434631978346413543464114734651978346515693466114734661777346715693467156434681777346811543469156434692287347011543470125334712287347117743472125334723614634731774347330122347436146347422953475301223475937347622953476281203477937347712553478281203478239934791255347924108348023993480219934812410834812086348221993482938348320863483115734849383484211003485115734851145348621100348620953487114534871458348820953488431883489145834897293490431883490730349172934912185349273034923012134932185349311573494301214494291253495115744951682449641944962811544972912544971458449816824498167944992811544993718645001458450019914501167945011370450237186450215714503199145031363450413704504712714505157145058829945061363 3637110714597110822897110815637110918747110941170711103917271110301297111111467111143222711121569711123214171113145971113832711141563711144320071115411707111520937111630129711161773711174322271117271187111832141711181981711198327111918797112043200711201141711212093711211980711221773711221477711232711871123401727112419817112410527112518797112519797112611417112626104711271980711271564711281477711285277112940172711291364711301052711303013271131197971131947711322610471132104271133156471133301227113452771134146971135136471135731711363013271136840711379477113751871138104271138114071139301227113922887114014697114010407114173171141371537114284071142281047114351871143291257114411407114412557114522887114572871146104071146733711473715371147125671148281047114814647114929125711492699711501255711509397115172871151104771152733711521252711531256711537327115414647115410447115526997115512507115693971156731711571047711572389711581252711588417115973271159166971160104471160114871161125081161188971162731811621782711632389811636347116484181164114771165166981165114771166114881166115181167419811672310181168188981168733811691782811691152811706348117018678117111478117122998117211478117223103811731151811731358811742310181174630811757338117512548117611528117620818117718678117721868117822998117862681179231038117924978118013588118012548118163081181836811821254811821039811832081811831149811842186811842195811856268118513588118624978118619958118712548118712618118883681188104881189103981189198281190114981190167481191219581191176981192135881192197281193199581193125281194126181194219381195104881195135881196198281196219881197167481197188181198176981198165981199197281199166681200125281200104681201219381201331508120213588120235149812032198812032088812041881812041988812051659812051361812061666812061367812071046812071776812083315081208361408120935149812091874812102088812101367812111988812119378121213618121217748121313678121318688121417768121417828121536140812151038812161874812161244812171367812171043812189378121814558121917748121983581220186881220331348122117828122112508122210388122212538122312448122320768122410438122493781225145581225271158122683581226261078122733134812272078812281250812281039812291253812291146812302076812302594812319378123113548123227115812324520981233261078123313578123420788123418858123510398123522958123611469123694181237259491237146481238135491238321358123945209912392298812401357912402613381241188591241187481242229591242231059124394191243167791244146491244135691245321359124510399124622989124613689124726133912471879912481874912482093912492310591249115991250167791250114591251135691251241029125210399125218839125313689125323999125418799125424110912552093912551680912561159912561044912571145912578319125824102912582097912591883912593317091260239991260239691261241109126118839126216809126212409126310449126328113912648319126429123912652097912652310791266331709126623102912672396912671564912681883912681460912691240912692913991270281139127019849127129123912713616091272231079127231134912732310291273291229127415649127416709127514609127543176912762913991276157191277198491277231139127836160912781352912793113491279147791280291229128014709128116709128115719128243176912821786912831571912831664912842311391284156391285135291285166591286147791286145691287147091287229391288157191288124791289178691289229591290166491290178191291156391291104591292166591292114491293145691293166291294229391294198291295124791295221189129622959129626114912971781912971255912981045912981664912991144912991773913001662913001364913011982913011667913022211891302191059130326114913031679913041255913043216891305166491305261259130617739130624132913071364913072410791308166791308126291309191059130946190913101679913101252913113216891311937913122612591312156791313241329131311479131424107913142093913151262913152510391316461909131627118913171252913178439131893791318251129131915679131918719132011479132016749132120939132118829132225103913221146913232711891323147691324843913241356913252511291325178091326187191326261039132716749132723909132818829132819869132911469132930132913301476913301888913311356913311459913321780913321669913332610391333167191334239091334271139133519869133525128913363013291336229991337188891337177491338145991338166591339166991339166791340167191340168591341271139134112549134225128913422411791343229991343238691344177491344271019134516659134515619134616679134637174913471685913471610991348125491348208491349241179134922889135023869135018619135127101913511761913521561913522710991353371749135331127913541610991354941913552084913555219991356228891356187791357186191357221029135817619135817789135927109913591882913603112791360125491361941913611656913625219991362217991363187791363146091364221029136415549136517781013655229136618821013662699913671254101367291139136816561013682812691369217910136923101913701460101370146291371155410137115711013724191013726301013735221013731574101374269910137414661013752911310137518861013762812610137627104101377231011013771787101378146210137810421013791571101379391381013806301013801865101381157410138114541013821466101382291231013831886101383177110138427104101384166810138517871013852284101386104210138641166101387391381013872611310138818651013884319810138914541013891145101390291231013901672101391177110139127118101392166810139218891013932284101393104610139441166101394166310139526113101395271141013964319810139611481013971145101397103910139816721013981763101399271181013992997101400188910140017601014011046101401228310140216631014021666101403271141014031981101404114810140412451014051039101405156010140617631014061147101407299710140711451014081760101408104210140922831014092087101410166610141015631014111981101411124910141212451014127301014131560101413228110141411471014141253101415114510141511391014161042101416135210141720871014171143101418156310141821841014191249101419165810142073010142052210142122811014211563101422125310142210441014231139101423207310142413521014241976101425114310142542141101426218410142610361014271658101427421101428522101428156510142915631014291042101430104410143025901014312073101431156110143219761014322596101433421411014339351014341036101434135910143542110143534136101436156510143616601014371042101437178710143825901014382293101439156110143914691014402596101440103810144193510144111481014421359101442167710144334136101443626101444166010144410391014451787101445176410144622931014467331014471469101447228510144810381014481352101449114810144910481014501677101450526101451626101451168310145210391014522913110145317641014531151101454733101454271181014552285101455728101456135210145614611014571048101457241091014585261014582285101459168310145910441014602913110146083010146111511014618331014622711810146221941014637281014631560101464146110146414531014652410910146514601014662285101466156410146710441014671045101468830101468271001014698331014699381014702194101470165510147115601014712485101472145310147223871014731460101473114510147415641114741036101475104511147593510147627100111476259810147793811147782810147816551114781985101479248511147916641014802387111480311271014811145111481229311148241911148211471114831036111483135611148493511148410481114852598111485279511148682811148618751114871985111487166411148816641114881462111489311271114891665111490229311149039146111491114711149123100111492135611149211501114931048111493241001114942795111494941111495187511149572711149616641114961467111497146211149711611114981665111498935111499391461114991140111500231001115002911311150111501115012081111502241001115022392111503941111503103811150472711150431123111505146711150514591115061161111506103811150793511150718661115081140111508125211150929113111509175811151020811115101155111511239211151119731115121038111512104211151331123111513269411151414591115141148111515103811151520731115161866111516238611151712521115171984111518175811151815561115191155111519247611152019731115201963111521104211152119721115222694111522197511152311481115231863111524207311152414521115252386111525188211152619841115261661111527155611152716651115282476111528728111529196311152918651115301972111530218111153119751115311461111532186311153212501115331452111533176811153418821115342811111153516611115352283111536166511153623851115377281115371870111538186511153811471115392181111539187311154014611115408411115411250111541124411154217681115421563111543281111115431868111544228311154494811154523851115451348111546187011154614601115471147111547114811154818731115485221115498411115491554111550124411155013481115511563111551271091115521868111552134311155394811155311301115541348111554301181115551460111555125711155611481115568311115575221115572711011155815541115581574111559134811155911421115602710911156021821115611343111561361371115621130111562237811156330118111563937111564125711156419791115658311115651665111566271101115662082111567157411156718861115681142111568103711156921821115696311115703613711157010441115712378111571946111572937111572942111573197911157393611157416651115742494111575208211157512441115761886111576165711157710371115775201115786311115781036111579104411157993711158094611158015571115819421115811875111582936111582207711158324941115831872111584124411158410431115851657111585124611158652011158617661115871036111587146811158893711158872911158915571115892611011159018751115908351115912077111591104211159218721115921561111593104311159317691115941246111594941111595176611159531811159614681115961673111597729121597522111598261101215986311115998351215991664111600104212160016631116011561121601166311160217691216022510611160394112160373011160431812160415571116051673121605145912160641912160616681216075221216071243121608631121608834121609166412160913541216101663121610938121611166312161117761216122510612161242012161373012161319801216141557121614187312161514591216151777121616166812161694212161712431216173213812161883412161894312161913541216192391121620938121620197612162117761216212389121622420121622196812162319801216231036121624187312162413431216251777121625104212162694212162618731216273213812162732131121628943121628198412162923911216291768121630197612163010411216312389121631113812163219681216322711512163310361216332611212163413431216342610412163510421216351046121636187312163632127121637321311216372086121638198412163818701216391768121639251051216401041121640841121641113812164111501216422711512164222961216432611212164314571216442610412164415531216451046121645113912164632127121646229212164720861216472911012164818701216481247121649251051216491554121650841121650146112165111501216518331216522296121652177212165314571216537351216541553121654939121655113912165517721216562292121656103512165729110121657629121658124712165814741216591554121659177112166014611216601766121661833121661261141216621772121662248812166373512166328111121664939121664301101216651772121665166212166610351216661565121667629121667527121668147412166812441216691771121669124812167017661216706251216712611412167111451216722488121672331231216732811112167324841216743011012167416631216751662121675135012167615651216763713912167752712167718721216781244121678115312167912481216791870121680625121680135112168111451216811249121682331231216821347121683248412168321811216841663121684221011216851350121685103912168637139121686238412168718721216879391216881153121688114612168918701216891256121690135112169012471216911249121691627121692134712169220721216932181121693939121694221011216949351216951039121695145512169623841216964716912169793912169721105121698114612169814571216991256121699626121700124712170010361217016271217011149121702207212170273012170393912170314591217049351217041767121705145512170529123121706471691217061979121707211051217072394121708145713170815601217096261317092611512171010361317102410112171111491317112711112171273013171225112121713145913171320901217141767131714155612171529123131715155812171619791317165301217172394131717145413171841913171835121131719156013171994213172026115131720198613172124101131721271071317222711113172211551317232511213172345188131724209013172442182131725155613172527118131726155813172615581317275301317277341317281454131728135413172935121131729191011317309421317301572131731198613173173013173227107131732239413173311551317331674131734451881317341967131735421821317351152131736271181317368381317371558131737281061317387341317385119313173913541317391355131740191011317403913913174115721317411453131742730131742198913174323941317432510113174416741317441974131745196713174521821317461152131746832131747838131747135813174828106131748166813174951193131749187113175013551317501564131751391391417511672131752145314175214541317531989141753167613175425101141754197513175519741417552186131756218214175626117131757832141757114813175813581417581350131759166814175937157131760187114176033143131761156414176129112141762419141762177814176316721417631678141764145414176410431417651676141765523141766197514176672514176721861417671662141768261171417682290141769114814176914561417701350141770518141771371571417713413814177233143141772441871417732911214177317831417741778141774155914177516781417751255141776104314177613491417775231417771884141778725141778125014177916621417794211417802290141780125314178114561417812186141782518141782251071417833413814178394314178444187141784156114178517831417851355141786155914178615581417871255141787261141417881349141788186114178918841417891354141790125014179093914179142114179183914179212531417921360141793218614179394514179425107141794261091417959431417951464141796156114179612511417971355141797114214179815581417981050141799261141417996321418001861141800631141801135414180110361418029391418021360141803839151803625141804136015180473014180594515180573914180626109151806831141807146415180772714180812511518089371418091142151809834141810105015181093914181163215181172914181263115181272814181310361518138331418141360151814523151815419151815726151816625151816939151817730151817836151818739151818737151819831151819521151820727151820729151821937151821115215182283415182283415182393915182311421518247291518241263151825728151825629151826833151826742151827523151827725151828726151828833151829939151829728151830836151830124515183173715183193615183252115183242215183372915183372715183411521518349311518358341518351139151836114215183652015183712631518376241518386291518386241518397421518394171518407251518404181518418331518411046151842728151842420151843124515184351915184493615184411411518454221518454201518467271518468301518479311518475201518481139151848317151849520151849104015185062415185083015185162415185162615185241715185252215185341815185341815185410461518549371518554201518557281518565191518568351518571141151857732151858420151858829151859830151859523151860520151860626151861317151861624151862104015186262915186383015186352015186462615186441615186552215186572915186641815186642315186793715186714621518687281518689401518698351518694221518707321518706231518718291518714181518725231518725231518736261518736251518746241518745241518756291518753191518765201518768411518774161518775211518787291518783151518794231518795191518801462151880524151881940151881528151882422151882525151883623151883530151884418151884630151885523151885319151886625151886624151887524151887146915188831915188851915188984115188973615189052115189015631518913151518915211518925191518924211518935241518934201518945281518943191518955251518953141518965301518966271518976301518973191518983191518988341518996241518997281519001469151900624151901519151901522151902736161902942151903156316190318681519045211619047361519054211619058301519064201619068401519073191619077311519083141619081459151909627161909948151910319161910104415191183416191113471519127281619121671151913624161913157115191452216191413491619154191619152110016191694216191611491619171868161917422161918736161918727161919830161919103916192084016192062516192173116192110411619221459161922732161923948161923115516192410441619241349161925134716192594016192616711619261569161927157116192721861619281349161928219816192921100161929198216193011491619308441619314221619312090161932727161932156716193310391619331264161934625161934229116193510411619351043161936732161936321181619371155161937281221619381349161938144616193994016193918731619401569161940115316194121861619411037161942219816194218781619431982161943525161944844161944156116194520901619451263161946156716194616671619471264161947728161948229116194883116194910431619491767161950321181619501458161951281221619517321619521446161952125116195318731619531148161954115316195412431619551037161955103816195618781619566341619575251619571257161958156116195873416195912631619599371619601667161960196516196172816196112581619628311619622396161963176716196317711619641458161964177216196573216196514631619661251161966166116196711481619671769161968124316196815651619691038161969135416197063416197024931619711257161971207416197273416197222921619739371619732198161974196516197415621619751258161975104216197623961619762710316197717711619772910916197817721619781971161979146316197915751619801661161980186816198117691619812511916198215651619822511016198313541619836291619842493161984739161985207416198514511619862292161986114516198721981619871991161988156216198810431619891042161989135916199027103161990241031619912910916199116811619921971161992208916199315751619933213116199418681619941768161995251191619951983161996251101619961557161997629161997156416199873916199818761619991451161999840162000114516200010411620011991162001941162002104316200217671620031359162003135616200424103162004166916200516811620051248162006208916200611521620073213116200724941620081768162008136216200919831620091156162010155716201072716201115641620111865162012187616201215511620138401620132410716201410411620149441620159411620151357162016176716201622841620171356162017229416201816691620185201620191248162019156616202011521620201971162021249416202111431620221362162022735162023115616202394216202472716202412491620251865162025177516202615511620262291162027241071620271253162028944162028145116202913571620298321620302284172030219516203122941720311257162032520172032931162033156617203313601620341971172034177616203511431720351157162036735172036231101620379421720371149162038124917203816711620391775172039942162040229117204084316204112531720412311616204214511720421359162043832172043731172044419172044218217204521951720451468172046125717204613531720479311720471871172048136017204812521720491776172049124517205011571720501150172051231101720519361720521149172052251081720531671172053125117205494217205412531720558431720551045172056231161720569481720571359172057125017205873117205813551720592182172059124817206014681720601359172061135317206183417206218711720622290172063125217206317711720641245172064115617206511501720651657172066936172066134817206725108172067724172068125117206818671720691253172069115917207010451720701044172071948172071134817207212501720726301720731355172073218717207412481720741258172075135917207519821720768341720761976172077229017207794217207817711720789451720791156172079519172080165717208025100172081134817208194417208272417208216711720831867172083145517208411591720841568172085104417208513521720861348172086188417208763017208718741720882187172088219217208912581720892511317209019821720901358172091197617209115641720929421720921041172093945172093199617209451917209493517209525100172095145417209694417209618731720971671172097155717209814551720982287172099156817209917811721001352172100157017210118841721011139172102187417210213631721032192172103937172104251131721041248172105135817210513601721061564172106114217210710411721071460172108199617210812461721099351721091456172110145417211093617211118731721111357172112155717211212531721132287172113114017211417811721141454172115157017211513501721161139172116930172117136317211719761721189371721181453172119124817211910371721201360172120114517212111421721211253172122146017212226921721231246172123155817212414561721241460172125936172125114717212613571721262711417212712531721271471172128114017212823921721291454172129146317213013501721301978172131930172131166717213219761721329401721331453172133146117213410371721349461721351145172135945172136125317213618701721372692172137835172138155817213853017213914601721392290172140114717214021721721412711418214111421721421471182142156917214323921821433131721441463182144627172145197818214516581721461667182146114617214794018214711441721481461182148627172149946182149104217215094518215016611721511870182151730172152835182152939172153530182153114817215422901821541978172155217218215518751821564191821561980182157114218215734127182158156918215822109182159313182159381731821606271821601356182161165818216132142182162114618216233151182163114418216372518216462718216417581821651042182165837182166166118216623811821677301821671554182168939182168301291821691148182169281291821701978182170124818217118751821712812318217219801821721470182173341271821731150182174221091821741350182175381731821751241182176135618217612501821773214218217716571821783315118217882818217972518217919631821801758182180156218218183718218183018218223811821822079182183155418218311391821843012918218493718218528129182185231021821861248182186136718218728123182187115218218814701821881663182189115018218928122182190135018219026111182191124118219113591821921250182192136518219316571821931051182194828182194145418219519631821951983182196156218219618921821978301821973011818219820791821981975182199113918219984318220093718220013491822012310218220111491822021367182202124918220311521822032085182204166318220493418220528122182205125118220626111182206113718220713591822076211822081365182208824182209105118220910361822101454182210124318221119831822111565182212189218221282718221330118182213103818221419751822141664182215843182215929182216134918221613461822171149182217241031822181249182218124818221920851822191776182220934182220105118222112511822219401822221137182222351481822236211822239381822248241822241034182225103618222529182226124318222625911822271565182227134618222882718222813501822291038182229310182230166418223015531822319291822316231822321346182232310182233241031822331351182234124818223420781822351776182235124918223610511822361977182237940182237835182238351481822381549182239938182239114818224010341822405271822412918224111471822422591182242146518224313461 923481446192349633202349121923509412023505231923517252023514151923526272023526311923535242023534191923549372023541244192355420202355730192356414202356829192357944202357415192358416202358186819235962420235951919236010382023609371923614172023615231923625232023621144192363943202363103919236410452023641037192365144620236551820236641920236613482023671220236741420236852320236852020236941520236973220237063120237011402023714192023714192023721244202372518202373730202373515202374829202374310202375415202375416202376186820237621020237751920237751820237893720237828202379523202379310202380114420238031220238110392023813122023821037202382211202383518202383414202384134820238462020238541420238551920238652020238662020238773220238722932023881140202388351302023894192023892132023905182023908312023915152023915192023923102023928302023934162023931035202394210202394727202395518202395218720239628202396103520239731020239751720239831220239892920239931220239952120240021120240011352024014142024011974202402620202402939202403519202403841202404620202404628202405229320240583420240635130202406146020240721320240783320240883120240862320240951920240915592024108302024105302024111035202411136720241272720241210422024132187202413123920241410352024141249202415517202415519202416929202416621202417521202417165920241811352024188372024191974202419261152024209392024201976202421841202421146120242262820242213422024238342024231046202424146020242412492024258332024251869202426623202426837202427155920242751920242853020242815752024291367202429176520243010422024309352024311239202431620202432124920243293320243351920243393620243462120243427105202435165920243515752024368372024361248202437261152024371244202438197620243817682024391461202439937202440134220244082820244110462024414182024421249202442207120244318692024435172024448372024441662202445519202445281042024461575202446123920244717652024471344202448935202448831202449620202449730202450933202450836202451936202451627202452271052024521247202453157520245373220245412482024543152024551244202455620202456176820245613562024579372024571244202458828202458103820245941820245993520246020712024601142202461517202461146220246216622024621765202463281042024631136202464123920246494220246513442024651349202466831202466722202467730202467621202468836202468145220246962720246915652024701247202470623202471732202471187020247231520247212472024736202024738282024741356202474838202475124420247512502024761038202476176720247793520247793520247811422024782085202479146220247918752024801765202480125920248111362024811353202482942202482197920248313492024831150202484722212484731202485621212485114220248614522124861572202487156521248710442024886232124881458202489187021248983520249012472124901459202491828212491942202492838212492845202493125021249383720249417672124941044202495935212495729202496208521249610482024971875212497624202498125921249883720249913532124997352025001979212500114220250111502125011353212502419212502135721250373121250352621250411422125047272125051572212505135221250610442125066222125071458212507228221250883521250815532125091459212509838212510942212510629212511845212511155921251283721251213512125131044212513188021251472921251413572125151048212515839212516624212516114721251783721251710402125187352125181049212519114221251917722125201353212520837212521135721252173021252252621252216612125237272125231045212524135221252413562125256222125251350212526228221252614552125271553212527188221252883821252811462125296292125291247212530155921253020832125311351212531843212532188021253283721253313572125337332125348392125349372125351147212535114521253610402125365252125371049212537831212538177221253873121253983721253913552125407302125407352125411661212541837212542104521254283421254313562125437322125441350212544835212545145521254573221254618822125469392125471146212547737212548124721254893621254920832125491142212550843212550934212551837212551735212552733212552833212553937212553529212554114521255484221255552521255583921255683121255615832125577312125571675212558135521255862921255973521255912512125608372125601261212561834212561146121256273221256214722125638352125631045212564732212564146521256593921256512512125667372125661041212567936212567166921256811422125687342125699342125696312125707352125702383212571833212571840212572529212572114321257384221257319922125748392125741157212575158321257583321257616752125766302125776292125771249212578125121257873221257912612125791037212580146121258020752125811472212581114221258210452125829352125831465212583726212584125121258493821258510412125859382125861669212586115721258773421258716662125886312125881252212589238321258962321259084021259052521259111432125911142212592199221259213502125931157212593832212594833212594829212595630212595104321259612492225961040212597732222597228621259810372225981244212599207522259911442126001142222600702622126019352226011346212602726222602124321260393822260313452126049382226041561212605115722260593521260616662226062510121260712522226071448212608623222608104121260952522260917722126101142222610228521261113502226119382126128322226122210221261382922261337144212614104322261417692226154192226156232226161040222616415222617228622261712522226181244222618229822261911442226199382226207026222262025108222621134622262116762226221243222622145122262313452226232094222624156122262484622262593522262524100222626251012226262181222627144822262793622262810412226281143222629177222262920892226302285222630157622263193822263127128222632221022226322089222633371442226331344222634176922263410452226356232226353514822263641522263617852226371252222637936222638229822263841822263993822263911512226402510822264014612226411676222641239722264214512226421460222643209422264311452226448462226449312226452410022264584122264621812226468412226479362226472710622264811432226481674222649208922264921892226501576222650166422265127128222651125922265220892226528412226531344222653187722265410452226547352226553514822265516562226561785222656156022265793622265717602226584182226581555222659115122265912452226601461222660271012226612397222661104322266 67228329613522832973311928329718812832981976283298207728329910422832991886283300114428330026106283301271082833011349283302155028330223922833032610628330362928330411482833048342833052911028330515552833061559283306126528330727109283307157428330820822833081350283309207328330925972833102510028331017732833119332833112082283312145728331215662833131575283313177528331417732833148402833151869283315188428331629108283316136428331712522833176332833181051283318735283319944283319114228332010482833201458283321167528332172828332213522833221558283323188128332319782833242077283324218728332518862833251362283326261062833268402833271349283327177028332823922833282910928332962928332926105283330834283330281022833311555283331217828333212652833321670283333157428333317652833341350283334261132833352597283335146728333617732833361875283337208228333719662833381566283338155928333917752833391660283340840283340196328334118842933411328334213642933421040283343633293343115628334473529334410432833451142293345124528334614582933461042283347728293347127028334815582933482190283349197829334974328335021872933503112028335113622933516372833528402933521886283353177029335311612833542910929335416692833552610529335564028335628102293356135628335721782933572711828335816702933581352283359176529335913472833602611329336019722833611467293361832283362187529336217592833631966293363136028336415592933642076283365166029336527117283366196329336612442933674192933671887293368132933681457293369104029336923103293370115629337062729337110432933711570293372124529337216672933731042293373239029337412702933741250293375219029337573029337674329337617742933773112029337773929337863729337816772933791886293379136929338011612933802812429338116692933811988293382640293382124329338313562933838422933842711829338410452933851352293385218929338613472933862511229338719722933871989293388832293388135229338917592933891459293390136029339016622933912076293391156429339227117293392199129339312442933931265293394188729339463829339514572933951356293396231032933
